Title: Muhanga: Koperative itwara abagenzi yahaye abanyamuryango 1,800,000 Frw yo kubagoboka
Body:
Ubuyobozi  bwa  Koperative yo gutwara abagenzi mu modoka i Muhanga (Muhanga Transport Cooperative) bwahaye Abanyamuryango 60 inkunga ibafasha kubona Imibereho muri ibi bihe batari mu kazi kubera ingamba zo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Iyi nkunga ya 1 800 000 yagiye ihabwa bariya banyamuryango ba MTC hifashishijwe uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwa Mobile Money, buri wese akaba yahawe 30 000 Frw.
Umuyobozi wa  MTC mu Karere ka Muhanga, Munyankindi Arstide avuga ko aba banyamuryango bari batunzwe n’amafaranga bakuraga mu mirimo bakora yo gutwara abagenzi ku buryo bumva ko ubu imibereho itaboroheye.
Munyankindi avuga  ko ayo bahawe uyu munsi ari imisanzu bagiye batanga y’ubwizigame.
Yagize ati “Ibikorwa byo gutwara abagenzi n’urujya n’uruza byarahagaze, aba banyamuryango kuri ubu bari mu ngo nta kazi bakora ni yo mpamvu tubahaye amafaranga yo kugura iby’ibanze bakenera umunsi ku munsi.”
Kandenzi Vérena umwe mu bagore batatu bari muri iriya koperative avuga ko iyi ngoboka iziye igihe kuko bamwe muri bo bari batangiye kuremererwa n’imibereho kubera kumara icyumweru n’igice badakora.
Ati “Iyi ngoboka iranshimishije kuko itari iteganyijwe kuba noneho ije muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe ni ikintu cy’ingenzi.”
Hatangimana Samuel avuga ko baryaga ari uko bagiye mu kazi none bakaba bamaze iminsi badakora none bakaba batorohewe no kubasha kubona ibyo ingo zabo zisanzwe zikenera mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Hatangimana ati “Dufite ikibazo cyo gusohora amafaranga nta yandi twinjiza.”
Koperative 12 z’ubwikorezi mu Rwanda  zahawe Miliyoni 50 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda nk’uko Umuyobozi wa RFTC, Col Twahirwa Louis Dodo yabibwiye Umuseke.
Ibi bibaye mu gihe indi koperative itwara abagenzi muri Kigali yo yatangaje ko yahagaritse by’agateganyo abakozi bose bayo mu gihe cy’iminsi 90 ngo kubera igihombo batejwe n’ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus.
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo k’igihugu gisinzwe amakoperative (RCA/ Rwanda Cooperatives Agency) buherutse gutangaza ko ubusanzwe mu makoperative hari amafaranga abanyamuryango batanga yitwa ay’ingoboka bityo ko iki ari cyo gihe cyo kuyakoramo kugira ngo kigoboke abanyamuryango.
Inzego z’ibanze na zo mu bice binyuranye by’igihugu zimaze iminsi ziri gutanga inkunga y’ibiribwa ku miryango isanzwe ibayeho kuko yakoze imirimo ya bubyizi.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga

Title: KBS yahagaritse by’agateganyo amasezerano y’abakozi bose iminsi 90
Body:
KBS yahagaritse abakozi bayo bose mu gihe cy’amezi atatu kubera ibihombo yatejwe na Coronavirus, abashoferi bavuga ko basanze amabaruwa ateguye basabwa gusinya, ubuyobozi bwo bukavuga ko ikemezo bwagifashe bwabanje kukiganiraho n’abakozi.
Abahagaritswe ni abakozi bose, ubuyobozi bubyita ko icyabaye ari ugusubika akazi mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, ariko abakozi bakazahembwa uku kwezi kwa Werurwe.
Umwe mu bashoferi ugiye kumara imyaka itatu muri KBS, avuga ko akeka ko iki kemezo cyafashwe kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus, akizera ko igihe ibyo gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo byavaho, yenda na bo basubira mu kazi.
Ati “Ntibafashe igihe cyo kudusobanurira iby’ikemezo, badutumyeho turi benshi (66) dusanga amabarwa arateguye aranditse hanyuma barayaduha duhita dusinya urumva ko nta kindi warenzaho.” 
Undi mushoferi avuga ko kiriya kemezo KBS yafashe kiri mu masezerano yabo y’akazi ko bashobora guhagarika akazi igihe habayeho ubukungu buke biturutse ku mpamvu runaka.
Yabwiye Umuseke ko batarahembwa ariko ko bategereje ko igihe bahemberwa kigera.
Ati “Dutegereje iminsi 90 twahawe nirangira tugasubira mu kazi.”
Undi Mushoferi wabwiye Umuseke ko abakozi bose bahagaritswe, yavuze ko bafite amabwiriza ko uku kwezi bazaguhembwa ariko ngo nta mafaranga barabona.
Yagize ati “Sindi mu baganirijwe, ariko mbere bari bababwiye ko bagiye muri Konje, ariko nta mpinduka nk’izi zari bwabeho mbere y’iki cyorezo cya coronavirus.”
Amaze amaze imyaka itandatu muri iyi Sosiyete, avuga ko atabona ikibazo cyo guhohoterwa mu kemezo sosiyete yabo yafashe kubera ko ngo isuku ibatunga na yo ntikora.
Ati “Ntabwo watekereza ko niba icyorezo cyahejeje abantu mu ngo, imodoka zidutunze tukaba tutari kuzitwara, ntekereza ko nta guhohoterwa kurimo, waba uhohotewe gute isuka igutunze uri kumwe na yo aho iparitse uhareba itahava ngo igende kandi dutunzwe n’uko amapine yikaraga?”
Kuri we nyirabayazana y’igarikwa ry’akazi ni icyorezo cya Covid-19, ngo igihe Leta yakuraho ikemezo cyo gufunga ingendo bizeye ko bazasubira mu kazi.
Rudasingwa Victor Umuyobozi Mukuru wa KBS yemereye Umuseke ko ayo makuru yo guhagarika abakozi ari yo.
Ati “Ntabwo ari ukubahagarika ni ugusubika amasezerano by’agateganyo kubera ko tutarimo gukora.”
Yavuze ko ubwo Leta yahagarikaga urujya n’uruza binyuze mu mabwiriza adasanzwe y’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe, KBS yaganiriye n’abakozi bayo ku kemezo cyafashwe cyo kubahagarika amezi atatu.
KBS ifite imodoka nini zirenga 120 zitwara abagenzi mu Mujyi wa Kigali muri Zone I. Abakozi bose ngo bahagaritswe hasigara abatekiniye bake bazajya batsa ziriya modoka.
 
Amafoto@NKUNDINEZA
Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abarokotse Jenoside basaba ko ubutabera bahabwa bugera no ku guhabwa indishyi
Body:
Taliki ya 30 Mutarama  2020, Urukiko rwa Rubanda rw’i Buruseli rwanzuye ko Neretse Fabien, rwahamije ibyaha bya jenoside agomba gutanga indishyi z’ibihumbi magana atatu na cumi na birindwi  by’amayero (317 000Euros) arenga gato miliyoni magana atatu na cumi na zirindwi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda (317 000 000 RWF).
Ni nyuma y’amezi abiri aburanishwa n’uru rukiko, rwaje kumukatira igifungo k’imyaka 25 amaze guhamwa no kugira uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.
Izi ndishyi, nk’uko ikinyamakauru www.dhnet.be kibitangaza, zatanzwe zigabanyije hagati y’ama-Euro ibihumbi bitanu n’ibihumbi mirongo itatu na birindwi (5000 Euros et 37 000 Euros). Mu kuyabara, urukiko rwagiye rureba abo uwasabye indishyi yabuze muri jenoside, isano iri hagati yabo na we, cyangwa bakareba niba uyisaba yarakomeretse muri jenoside bihuye n’ibyo Neretse yahamijwe nk’icyaha.
Fabien Neretse ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 yahamwe n’ibyaha bya jenoside nyuma y’amezi abiri aburana mu Rukiko rwa rubanda rw’i Buruseli mu Bubiligi, ahanishwa imyaka 25 y’igifungo.
Yitabaje Urukiko Gasesamanza (Cours de Cassation) ngo rumurenganure. Uru rukiko ariko rureba ingingo z’amategeko zaba zitarubahirijwe ntirusubira mu mizi nk’izindi nkiko.
 
Bigera ku ndishyi inkiko zikaruca zikarumira 
Mu mwaka wa 2018, 2017 ndetse na 2016 abandi Banyarwanda bakekwagaho ibyaha bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi na bo baraburanishijwe mu bihugu by’i Burayi. Muri bo harimo, Théodore Rukeratabaro wakoreye ibyaha ahitwa Winteko, Nyakanyinya na Mibirizi,  akaba yaraburaniye mu Busuwisi. Tito Barahira na Ngenzi Octavien bakoreye ibyaha bya Jenoside mu yahoze ari komini Kabarondo, baburanira mu Bufaransa ndetse na Pascal Simbikangwa na we waburaniye mu Bufaransa.
Rukeratabaro yahanishijwe igifungo k’imyaka 25 ariko ahita ajurira. Ku byerekeye indishyi mu bantu 230 bari bazisabye urukiko rwasanze 16 ari bo bazikwiye.
Ndagijimana Laurent uhagarariye abacitse ku icumu mu karere ka Rusizi, agira “Nta rukiko mpuzamahanga nigeze mbona ruha agaciro ikibazo k’indishyi.” 
Kuri we nubwo indishyi zitaba izigaragara zikaba nk’ikimenyetso, ariko byatanga ihumure ku bakoretse jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi aho kwirengagizwa cyangwa hakagaragara ubushake buke bw’inkiko zababuranishije mu kuzikurikirana.
Ati “Ubu hemejwe 16 bagomba kuzihabwa. Ariko se bizakorwa?”
Impungenge azihuje n’abandi barokotse jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bo muri Rusizi. Abahamwe n’ibyaha bangije ibikorwa byabo; barabasahura cyangwa bagahagararira isahura ry’imitungo yabo, bakabicira ababo ariko inkiko zikagarukira gusa ku kuvuga ngo umuntu yaburanishijwe.
Kuri bo kuburanishwa ni kimwe ariko no guhabwa indishyi ni ikindi kigomba kwitabwaho.
Gusa nk’uko bitangazwa n’umwe mu Banyamategeko, Rukeratabaro yaburanye nk’utishoboye byose abyishyurirwa na Leta ya Suwede. Byumvikane ko nubwo hari abarokotse basaba indishyi byakozwe mu nyungu z’ubushinjacyaha kuko bigaragaza nyine imbere y’urukiko ko hari abagizweho ingaruka n’ibikorwa by’uregwa.
Indishyi zo ku muntu utishoboye nk’uko yaburanye abigaragaza “ntizaboneka.”
Iki kibazo ni na cyo gikomeza kugaruka ku rubanza rw’abahanishijwe burundu ku cyaha cya jenoside ari bo Ngenzi Octavien na Tito Barahira. Bitandukanye na Rukeratabaro udafite umugore, ntagire ababyeyi ariko akagira abavandimwe ku buryo utamenya ibijyanye n’imitungo ye, kuri aba babiri, abarokotse jenoside ba Kabarondo bavuga ko bafite ibikorwa muri kariya gace byakabaye bitangwamo indishyi kandi bibyazwa inyungu ubu n’imiryango yabo.
Ibi ni byo bituma abarokotse Jenoside bavuga bati “twishimira ko nyuma y’igihe hari intambwe iterwa tukabona abaduhekuye baraburanishwa nyuma y’imyaka myinshi ariko haracyari ikibazo cy’uko twe ababuze ibyacu tugomba kubyishyurwa.”
Kuri bo, nubwo ikibazo cyo guhabwa indishyi kikiri ingorabahizi no mu gihugu imbere ngo hagombye kubaho uburyo bishyirwamo ingufu kuko abasigaye nubwo batagaya ubufasha bahabwa na Leta, ngo ibyo ababo bari bariyuhiye akuya babyishyuwe, na bo byabagoboka bagafasha Leta kudakomeza guhora ari yo batezeho amakiriro buri gihe.
Umuhuzabikorwa w’Umuryango RCN Justice et Democratie, Ntampuhwe Juvens asobanura ko ababuranye muri izo manza ari bo bagenerwa indishyi.
Kuri Juvens “Mu rubanza nshinjabyaha uwarutanzemo ikirego ni na we urusabamo indishyi. Gusa nanone ashobora gutanga ikirego gisaba indishyi mu rundi rubanza yifashishije umwanzuro w’urubanza rwaciwe ruhamya icyaha uregwa.”
Gusa uyu wifashishije urundi rubanza rwaciwe agaragaza ko ibyakozwe n’uwahamwe n’icyaha byamugizeho ingaruka kugira ngo ikirego ke cyakirwe.
Nubwo izo nzira zinyurwamo bamwe bazinyuramo nk’uko bisabwa, ngo kubona indishyi byo ni nko kubonekerwa haba ku manza za jenoside zibera hanze, izaburanishijwe n’urukiko Mpuzamahanga rwashyiriweho u Rwanda rwa Arusha cyangwa izibera mu gihugu.
Kuri bamwe ngo ikibazo k’indishyi kimeze nk’icyarenze inzego zose zirebwa na cyo.
HATANGIMANA Ange Eric
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: I Burundi habonetse abarwayi ba mbere ba Coronavirus
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Burundi uyu munsi yemeje ko muri kiriya gihugu habonetse abantu babiri bafite ubwandu bwa Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Aya makuru yatangajwe ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2020 nk’uko byatangajwe na Minisitiri w’Ubuzima wa Kiriya gihugu, Dr Thaddée Ndikumana.
Yavuze ko aba bantu babiri bari bashyizwe mu kato muri Hoteri ya Bumerec yo muri kiriya gihugu.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ya kiriya gihugu yasabye Abagituye guhagurukira isuku no kutegerana kugira ngo bahangane n’iki cyorezo kigeze muri iki gihugu gisa nk’ikiri mu bya nyuma kigezemo.
U Burundi bubaye igihugu cya nyuma cyo mu karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo kigezemo iki cyorezo kuko cyabanje kugera mu bihugu na DRC, u Rwanda, Kenya, Tanzania ndetse na Uganda.
Kugeza ubu Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zirayoboye mu kugira umubare munini w’abanduye COVID-19, igakurikirwa n’Ubutaliyani bwo buza imbere mu kugira umubare w’abo kimaze guhitana.
Imiabre iheruka iragaragaza ko kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura iki cyorezo ari 845 651 mu gihe abo kimaze guhitana ari 41 437 naho abamaze kugikira ari 176 520.
