Title: COVID-19/Rwanda: Habonetse abandi barwayi 5 barimo 4 bakoze ingendo i Dubai
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iratangaza ko uyu munsi tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2020 habonetse abandi barwayi batanu bafite ubwandu bw’Icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) barimo bane baje mu Rwanda baturutse i Dubai.
Itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima risanzwe rigaragaza uko icyorezo cya Coronavirus gihagaze mu Rwanda, rigaragaza ko bariya barwayi bane baje bavuye i Dubai bahise bashyirwa mu kato.
Rivuga kandi ko undi umwe yahuye n’undi umwe na we wagaragayeho ubwandu bwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda na we ariko akaba yarahise ashyirwa mu kato.
Uyu mubare w’abarwayi bashya batanu uhise utuma abafite ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo bose mu Rwanda bahita bagera kuri 75.
Iri tangazo risanzwe risohoka mu masaha y’umugoroba, iry’uyu munsi ryari ritegerejwe na benshi dore ko bacyekaga ko iki cyorezo cyaba kiri kuranduka kuko ejo hashize Minisiteri yari yatangaje ko nta murwayi wari wasanganywe ubwandu bushya.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko abarwayi bose bari kuvurirwa ahantu habugenewe kandi ko bari koroherwa ndetse ngo abenshi muri bo ubu nta bimenyetso bya kiriya cyorezo bagaragaza.
Mu cyumweru gishize iyi Minisiteri yari yatangaje ko umwe mu bari kwitabwaho ashobora kuzasohoka mu bitaro muri iki cyumweru kuko azaba yakize neza.
ITANGAZO RYA MINISITERI Y’UBUZIMA RYO KU WA 31/03/2020
 

UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Kayonza: Icyuzi cya Ruramira kigiye gukama bashakishemo imibiri y’abazize Jenoside
Body:
Abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi batuye mu murenge wa Ruramira mu Karere ka Kayonza bavuga ko mu cyuzi cya Ruramira hatawemo imibiri y’Abatutsi bicwaga muri Jenoside yo muri 1994. Iki cyuzi kiri hafi gukama, imirimo yo gushakisha no gutaburura imibiri igatangira.
Iki cyuzi kiri  ahahoze Segiteri Nkamba, Komini Kabarondo muri Perefegitura ya Kibungo.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Ruramira witwa Gatanazi avuga ko amakuru y’uko muri kiriya cyuzi harimo imibiri y’abazize Jenoside bayabwiwe n’abayirokotse bahoze batuye muri kariya gace.
Ati: “Amakuru atangwa n’abacitse k’icumu mu murenge wa Ruramira. Nibo batanga ubuhamya ko mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi  hajugunywemo Abatutsi.”
Gatanazi avuga ko imirimo yo gukamya kiriya cyuzi yatangijwe kandi igikorwa na RAB ikaba iri hafi kurangira.
Ndetse ngo nta cyumweru gisigaye ngo irangire neza.
Ku ngingo yo kumenya igihe imirimo nyirizina yo gutaburura imibiri izatangirira, Gatanazi yavuze ko kiriya cyuzi nikirangiza kumuka neza aribwo bizatangira.
Imirimo yo gutangira gukamya kiriya cyuzi yatangiye muri Nyakanga, 2019.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Kicukiro: Umurundi bamusanze amaze iminsi 2 yarapfiriye mu nzu
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri taliki 31, Werurwe, 2020 abaturage bo mu mudugudu wa Multimedia mu Kagari ka Gasharu mu Murenge wa Kicukiro, Akarere ka Kicukiro basanze umugabo witwa Armel Ntwari bahimbaga Micomyiza ukomoka mu Burundi yarapfiriye mu nzu. Baherukaga kumubona taliki 29, Werurwe, 2020.
Uwo yakodeshagaho inzu yabwiye umukuru w’Umudugudu witwa Mustafa, ko Micomyiza baheruka kuvugana ku Cyumweru ubwo yari atashye.
Mustafa ati: “ ‘Landlord’ (uwo akodeshaho inzu) we yambwiye ko bavuganye ku Cyumweru ariko akabona undi avuga arira asa n’uwasinze.”
Kuva icyo gihe ngo ntibongeye kubona Ntwari hanze.
Mustafa avuga ko abaturanyi ba Micomyiza bibajije icyo yabaye kuko yari asanzwe ari umuntu usabana n’abandi bagira amakenga.
Bibajije icyatumye ataza ku kiriyo cy’umwe mu baturanyi be birabayobora batangira gushaka amakuru ye.
Avuga ko  uyu munsi aribwo bamubonye yarapfuye.
Polisi n’Urwego rw’igihugu ry’ubugenzacyaha bageze aho yari atuye kugira ngo umurambo we ujyanwe gusuzumwa ndetse hakusanywe n’ibimenyetso byafasha mu iperereza.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muri Kigali gusa abacuruzi 135 bamaze gucibwa amande ya Miliyoni 10Frw
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda iratangaza ko igenzura ryakozwe kuva tariki ya 17 Werurwe kugeza tariki 30 Werurwe 2020 rimaze guhana abacuruzi 135 bo mu mujyi wa Kigali bakaba baraciwe amande ya Miliyoni 10 Frw.
Iri genzura ryatangiye tariki 17 Werurwe 2020, ryahe rikurikira itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yibutsaga abacuruzi n’ibigo by’ubucuruzi kubahiriza amategeko asanzweho arimo ayo kurengera abaguzi.
Kuva icyo gihe hakomeje gukorwa amagenzura mu bice bitandukanye yanagiye anafatirwamo abacuruzi n’ibigo by’uburuzi bagiye barenga kuri ariya mategeko bamwe bakuriza ibiciro bitwaje ibihe bidasanzwe Abaturarwanda byatewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Nyuma y’iminsi ikenda hatangiye iri genzura hari hamaze gucibwa amande ya Miliyoni 7,5 yagiye acibwa abacuruzi banyuranye biganjemo abo mu turere twa Muhanga na Musanze.
Minisiteri y’Inganda yashyize hanze itangazo ryiyongera ku yandi menshi iherutse gusohora agaragaza umubare w’abacuruzi bagiye bafatirwa muri ibi bikorwa n’amande bagiye bacibwa.
Iri tangazo rigaragaza abacuruzi bafatiwe muri ibi bikorwa ejo hashize tariki ya 30 Werurwe mu mujyi wa Kigali, rigaragaza ko ejo hahanwe abacuruzi 12 bose hamwe bakaba baraciwe amande ya 670 000 Frw.
Ku gisozi mu karere ka Gasabo hafashwe abacuruzi batatu bacibwa amande ya 300 000 Frw bose hamwe, Kabeza mu karere ka Kicukiro hafatiwe batanu baciwe amande ya 210 000 Frw bose hamwe, Kimisagara ho hafatiwe babiri baciwe 60 000 Frw.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda ivuga ko kuva tariki ya 17 Werurwe mu mujyi wa Kigali gusa hamaze guhanwa abacuruzi 135 bakaba barahanishijwe gucibwa amande ya 10 200 000 Frw.
Kuva mu Rwanda hatangira ibihe bidasanzwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus kibasiye Isi, Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yakomeje kugira inama abacuruzi kutabyuririraho ngo bazamure ibiciro ariko na none mu bice binyuranye by’igihugu abaturage bakomeje gutaka izamuka rikabije ry’ibiciro by’ibiribwa.
Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) ruherutse guhumuriza abacuruzi n’abaturarwanda muri rusange ko ibicuruzwa byiganjemo ibiribwa bitazigera bibura kuko imodoka zibyinjiza mu Rwanda zibivanye mu bihugu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda zikomeje kwinjira nk’ibisanzwe.
Sosiyete y’u Rwanda y’Ubwikorezi n’ingendo byo mu kirere, RwandAir na yo yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza uburyo kwinjiza ibicuruzwa mu Rwanda biva hanze bizanywe n’indege zibivana mu bihugu bya kure.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Amahame ya Jean Calvin wazanye impinduka zabaye imvumba mu bukungu bw’Isi
Body:
Inyandiko ya Dr MUNYANSANGA Olivier/Umwarimu muri PIASS
Jean Calvin (1509-1564) ni umwe mu batangije amavugurura ahambaye muri kiliziya by’umwihariko ayakorera mu mujyi wi Geneve mu Busuwisi. Ni umuhanga wavukiye i Noyon mu gihugu cy’Ubufaransa, yize indimi (harimo ikilatini n’ikigiriki), filozofiya, amategeko n’iyobokamana. Abyiga muri kaminuza zi Paris, Orléans ni Bourges mu Bufaransa.
Mu mwaka 1536 yasohoye igitabo cy’amapaji 10 000 cyiswe Christianae religionis institutio (Institution de la religion chretienne) kirimo amahame n’imyemerere ivuguruye y’abakirisito, aza kugihindura mu rurimi rw’igifaransa mu 1541. Ni kimwe mu bitabo byaciwe, kiramaganwa mu gihugu cy’ubufaransa.  Yaje guhunga ajya mu mujyi wi Geneve aho yaje gukomeza amavugurura akarishye y’abaporotesitani yari yatangijwe na Martin Luther mu Budage, Ulrich Zwingli i Zurich, Guillaume Farel i Geneve.
Mu mwaka w’i 1538, Guillaume Farel na Jean Calvin barirukanywe kuko abantu b’i Geneve batihanganiye imitegekere, amabwiriza n’imyifitire ikarishye bahabwaga. Nyuma y’igihe gito bahavuye, akavuyo karavutse, bongera guhamagara Jean Calvin mu 1541 kugira ngo agaruke asubize ibintu mu buryo mu mujyi wi Geneve. Mu 1559 yashinze Academie de Geneve yaje kubyara Kaminuza y’i Geneve.
Calvin yemeraga ko ubwami bw’Imana bugomba kujyaho ku ngufu hakoreshejwe uburyo bwose kuko Imana ari yo itegeka kandi yaremye Isi. Abantu bose batuye i Geneve bagomba kumvira amategeko mashya y’idini. Kuva mu 1541 kugeza 1564, Jean Calvin yayoboye idini na leta y’i Geneve kumara imyaka 23. Aho yanenzwe na bamwe kuba intagondwa no kurengera no kutorohera abari bafite ibitekerezo binyuranye n’ibye.
Yakoze ibintu byinshi bitandukanye. Muri iyi nyandiko turagaragaza amahame atatu yaranze Jean Calvin anafatwa nk’ayatumye amateka y’Isi ahinduka:
Mu mwaka w’i 1541, mbere y’uko Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790) umwe mu bakurambere w’umuhanga muri Amerika avuga mu 1736  ko « igihe ni amafaranga » (time is money), Jean Calvin yatanze amabwiriza y’uko abaturage bagomba gukoresha igihe cyabo buri munsi. Asaba ko kubahiriza igihe n’isaha bigomba kuba umuco n’itegeko mu mujyi wi Geneve no mu nsengero zose.
Byatumye mu bice byinshi by’uwo mujyi hamanikwa amasaha manini yo kwifashisha kubahiriza isaha n’igihe. Rimwe mu mategeko ryamaze hafi imyaka 250 ryubahirizwa mu mujyi wi Geneve,  ni uko izuba rirenze, inzogera y’isaha yagomba kuvuga abantu  bose bagasubira mu ngo zabo. Nyuma y’isaha eshatu z’ijoro nta muntu wari wemerewe gusohoka kujya kubyina, no kwirangaza.
Ibintu bihenze nk’imitako yo mu mazu, imyambaro, imisatsi, imikufi, impeta, inkweto zihenze byari bibujijwe. Gusabiriza byari bibujijwe. Abasabiriza barafatwaga bakigishwa imyuga, bakabashakira akazi bakanabashyingira. Kugira ngo ibi bishoboke byatewe n’umuco wo gukorera hamwe n’umutima wo kuzamurana abantu b’i Geneve bari bafite icyo gihe nk’uko byemezwa n’umwalimu w’amateka wo muri Kaminuza y’i Geneve Michel Grandjean.
Kwivuza byari ubuntu ku bakene, hubatswe n’ibitaro bikomeye byo kubafasha mu 1536, ibiciro ku masoko bikagenzurwa, amasaha y’akazi akagenzurwa. Kujyana abana ku ishuri biba itegeko, abakoraga ubupfumu barabarwanya. Ibyo byose byakorwaga kugira ngo Imana ihabwe icyubahiro.
Ku muntu ufite imyimerere ihamye, wizera ko yaremwe n’Imana, gukora n’imwe mu nshingano za mbere afite. Umuntu yaremewe gukora, ntabwo yaremewe kwicara cyangwa kwinezeza. Ku bwa Jean Calvin yavugaga ko imitungo yose tubona ni yo abantu bahawe n’Imana, ibaha n’ububasha bwo kuyiyobora no kuyikoresha. Byanga bikunda rero igihe kimwe bagomba kuzatanga ibisobanuro by’uko iyo mitungo yacunzwe n’uko yakoreshejejwe.
Umutungo kuri Jean Calvin, utangwa n’Imana, umuntu akagira inshingano zo kuwongera binyuze mu murimo akora ntabwo ari Imana ishinzwe kuwongera. Umuntu nadakora ntabwo uwo mutungo uziyongera. Umuntu iyo akora bituma yegera Imana kuko aba yatangiye kurema. Umurimo ni itegeko ku muntu wese, kuko yaremewe gukora kuva Isi yabaho, ntabwo yaremewe kwicara no gupfusha igihe ubusa.
Kwicara no kuzerera ntacyo ukora, ntabwo ari kamere muntu, umurimo ni bwo buzima ntabwo ari umuruho nk’uko bamwe babifatana ahubwo ni inshingano za buri wese, umurimo utuma umuntu yigenga akanegera Imana. Imana ntishobora guha umuntu icyo atikuriye mu maboko y’umurimo we. Umuntu agomba guha agaciro ibyo yasanze, akabyongera hanyuma akabisaranganya neza. Kugira ibintu, ubutunzi, ubumenyi, ubushobozi, ibyo byose ni ibikoresho Imana itanga kugira ngo bigirire akamaro abantu muri rusange. Cyane cyane mu gucunga uwo mutungo waba ari wawe cyangwa uwa rubanda kugira ngo utangizwa, cyangwa upfushwe ubusa.
Kuri Jean Calvin, umunezero n’ubuzima bwiza bizanwa n’umirimo umuntu akora. Kwicara no kudakora bikazana umwiryane n’umubabaro. Umuntu wese afite inshingano zo kongera agaciro ibyo Imana yaremye n’ibyo asanze ku isi byakozwe n’abandi.
Iri hame ryatumye ibintu bihinduka ku Isi kuva mu kinyenjana cya 16 na nyuma yaho kuko abazi gukora bakagendera ku ndangaciro za Jean Calvin, batangiye kunguka byinshi bishoboka. Cyane cyane ko bakoraga bubahiriza amategeko n’amabwirizwa n’indangagaciro z’idini.
Yaba abikorera cyangwa abakorera abandi, kugenzura no kugenzurwa cyane byahindutse umuco. Abantu bayoboka ubuzima bufite intego. Icyo gihe abantu babwirwaga ko batagomba gukorera ku jisho cyangwa gukora bashaka kwikiza umukoresha, ahubwo ko umuntu agomba gukora nk’uwikorera atirebaho, areba inyungu rusange. Abakurikirina inyungu zabo gusa baramaganwa. Jean Calvin yatsindagiye cyane ko abantu bagomba gukora bakabona byinshi bibafasha bikanafasha n’abandi ariko asaba ko gushaka inyungu n’ubutunzi bitagomba gutwara umutima w’umuntu.
Kuri we mu gukunda gukora ni ho haturuka ubutunzi. Service yose ihabwa umuturage igomba gutegurwa neza igatangwa mu buryo bunoze. Gukorera umuturage no kumurengera kuri Jean Calvin ni ikintu gihambaye kigomba gukorwa.
Inshingano rero ya mbere y’abacalvinists yabaye gushyira hejuru icyubahiro cy’Imana, bikanyuzwa mu mirimo itandukanye bakora, igakorwa kandi muri gahunda, mu bwenge no mu bwitange.
Gukora cyane unoza nta kujenjeka ni byo byaranze abacalvinists mu binyenjana bishize kandi byagize impinduka zihambaye ku bihugu bya Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu Buholandi mu Busuwisi n’ahandi henshi. Amafaranga yabaye ikimenyetso cyerekana ko ukora cyangwa udakora, ubwitange ufite ku murimo kuko gukora cyane unoza bituma Imana ihabwa icyubahiro. Umudage Max Weber (1864-1920) yaje kwandika igitabo mu 1904 yise “Protestantism Ethics and the Spirit of Capitalism” avuga ko amahame ya Jean Calvin yo gukora cyane, kwihambira no kwizirika yatumye abantu babona umutungo mwinshi urenze igipimo ari na ho haturutse ingengabitekerezo ya capitalism.
 
Jean Calvin yari umunyamategeko uhesha agaciro akanarengera ikiremwamuntu. Abayoboke be bose guhera i Geneve bari bafite inshingano yo gukiza isi bakayirinda akarengane, hubahirizwa amategeko kugira ngo isi irusheho kuba nziza.
Kubaha itegeko ni ko kwigenga kwa mbere no kugira umutekano urambye kuko ririnda abantu guhohoterwa no kurenganywa. Avuga ko umugambi w’Imana ari uko abantu bagira ubuzima bwiza n’ubutabera butuma basaranganya ibyiza Imana yabahaye. Ubwo butunzi bugomba kongerwa, ubukene bukagabanuka, buri muntu akagira agaciro n’ubuzima bwiza. Umuntu agomba kurenga inyungu ze bwite akarengera inyungu rusange. Umuntu agomba kubanza kumenya no kwemera ko afite agaciro. Akemera ko kugira agaciro ari umutungo kamere w’umuntu wese, agaha agaciro abandi hanyuma akemera ko hari n’inshingano abagomba.
Abantu kugira ngo babane neza ni uko amategeko akurikizwa uyarenzeho agahanwa. Umugiriki Socrate (-470 -399) na we yarabyemeraga kuko mu rubanza rwe ruzwi cyane, bucya agomba kwicwa yabonye uburyo bwo gucika gereza, ntiyabikora kuko yari yaramaze ubuzima bwe bwose yigisha kubaha no kurinda itegeko. Rimwe mu mategeko ni ryo ryamuhannye. Kuri Socrate kutaryubahiriza ni ukudatanga urugero rwiza.
Jean Calvin yemera ko Imana yaremye umuntu imuha ububasha bwo gutekereza no kumenya guhitamo ikibi n’icyiza kuko umuntu wese yaremanywe itegeko rikomeye rimubashisha kubana n’abandi neza, “ntiwemerewe gukorera undi ibyo utifuza ko bagukorera” iryo ni itegeko karemano. Ibyo wumva wakorewe byiza nawe wabikorera undi bishobotse ukanarenza. Jean Calvin yagize abayoboke b’Aporotesitani benshi cyane ku isi bamwe bitwa aba Calvinists, aba Réformés cyangwa aba Presbyterians.
 
Andi makuru mwayabona hano:
Dr MUNYANSANGA Olivier/Umwarimu muri PIASS

Title: Nyabihu: Habonetse imirambo 2 y’abagabo bikekwa ko bakubiswe n’inkuba
Body:
*Umwe basanze afite telefoni ku gutwi
Mu masaha ya mu gitondo ku wa Mbere taliki 30 Werurwe, 2020 abaturage babonye imirambo y’abagabo babiri,  mu Mudugudu wa Gitikinyoni, Akagari ka Basumba mu Murenge wa Bigogwe, muri Nyabihu, bikekwa ko bakubiswe n’inkuba.
Bariya bagabo ni abo mu Karere ka Nyabihu mu Murenge wa Kabatwa ariko inkuba yabakubitiye mu murenge wa Bigogwe.
Ba nyakwigendera umwe ni Nkundakozera w’imyaka 34 yari uwo mu Kagari ka Ngando, Umurenge wa Kabatwa muri Nyabihu, undi ni Munyamfura wari afite imyaka 40 y’amavuko ni uwo mu kagari ka Gihorwe, muri uriya Murenge wa Kabatwa.
Bari bagiye gutwika amatafari. Umwe muri bo bamusanganye telefoni ku gutwi aho yari aryamye yapfuye.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Bigogwe, Jean Paul Gahutu Tebuka avuga ko amakuru yahawe n’umugore wa Nkundukozera, witwa Claudine Kazeneza ari uko umugabo we yagiye gutwika amakara ari kumwe na mugenzi we.
Ngo ahageze baravuganye bisanzwe ariko nyuma haza kugwa imvura, uriya mugore yabwiye ubuyobozi ko batongeye kuvugana nyuma yaho.
Abaturage babonye imirambo bwa mbere babwiye ubuyobozi bw’ibanze ko basanze Munyamfura afite ku gutwi telefoni yari afite mu ntoki.
Amakuru Umuseke ufite avuga ko bariya bagabo bari barahawe ikiraka n’uwitwa Celestin Ngizwenimana.
Tebuka Gahutu Jean Paul uyobora Umurenge wa Bigogwe aho imirambo yabonetse yagize ati: “Turongera kwibutsa abaturage ibibi byo kwitaba telefoni mu mvura. Turababwira ko byongera ibyago byo gukubitwa n’inkuba.”
Avuga ko imirambo ya ba nyakwigendera yajyanywe ku Bitaro bya Ruhengeri kugira ngo isuzumwe mbere y’uko ishyingurwa.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Amb. wa USA mu Rwanda ati “Mugume mu rugo nanjye ni ho ndi gukorera”
Body:
Peter Vrooman uhagarariye Leta zunze ubumwe za America mu Rwanda yasabye Abanyarwanda gukomeza kumvira inama za Leta zo gukorera mu ngo zabo, bakirinda gusohoka nta mpamvu yihutirwa. Na we akazi ari kugakorera iwe.

Kuri Twitter yanditse ati: “Ubu ndi gukorera mu rugo hano mu Rwanda. Kuguma mu rugo ni yo gahunda tugakumira coronavirus.”
Ambasaderi Peter Vrooman yatangiye imirimo yo guhagararira igihugu ke mu Rwanda taliki 30 Werurwe, 2018. Yari asimbuye Madamu Erica Barks- Ruggles.
Taliki 30, Ukwakira, 2017 nibwo Perezida Donald Trump yemeje ko Vrooman ari we uzahagararira igihugu ke mu Rwanda, ariko taliki 15 Gashyantare, 2018 Sena iramwemeza.
Amb. Vrooman ni umugabo wubatse, umugore we yitwa Johnette Iris Stubbs akaba ari gafotozi (photographer), bafitanye abana babiri, umuhungu n’umukobwa.
Amb. Peter Vrooman avuga Icyongereza, Igifaransa n’Icyarabu.
Yagiye yumvikana ahantu henshi avuga amagambo y’Ikinyarwanda kandi ubwe yemeza ko ari kwiga Ikinyarwanda kandi amaze kukimenya mu rugero runaka.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Ngororero: Yafashwe akoresha ubukwe rwihishwa… ‘yinangiye ku nama yagiriwe’
Body:
Police ifatanyije na DASSO mu karere ka Ngororero bafashe umugabo wo mu Murenge wa Hindiro wakoresheje ubukwe mu rugo rwe kandi muri iki gihe bitemewe kubera gahunda zo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19. Inzego z’ibanze zamugiriye inama kenshi ngo asubike ubukwe aranga, ndetse ngo hari ubwo yashatse kurwanya ‘ayobozi baje kumugira inama’.
Kuva Ibiro bya Minisiteri y’Intebe byatangaza amabwiriza adasanzwe abuza urujya n’uruza, gufunga imipaka no kuva mu ngo nta mpamvu ikomeye, umugabo witwa Rimenyande Jean Damascene we ngo ntiyigeze abikozwa.
Yafashwe tariki ya 29 Werurwe 2020 ubwo inzego z’umutekano zasangaga abantu benshi iwe biteretse inzoga n’ibiryo bateraniye hamwe kandi bibujijwe muri ibi bihe.
Amakuru Umuseke wahawe n’Umunyambanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Hindiro ni uko uriya mugabo yari yateguye gukwa umugore we basanzwe babana tariki 28 Werurwe 2020 (bamaranye imyaka isaga 10), ariko amabwiriza asohotse tariki 22 Werurwe 2020, ubuyobozi bumugira inama yo gusubika ubukwe bwe, kugira ngo atazakira abantu benshi bakaba bakwanduzanya coronavirus.
Rimenyande ‘utsimbarara ku bitekerezo bye nk’uko Umuyobozi w’Umurenge wa Hindiro, Anastase Tuyizere abivuga, ngo nubwo yemeye ko asubika ubukwe, yavuze ko bitazamubuza kwakira inshuti ze yari yatumiye.
Ku wa 26 Werurwe 2020 ubuyobozi bwabonye ibimenyetso ko arimo yenga inzoga yitegura ubukwe, kuko ngo abantu barahasimburanaga bajya gusoma ‘ku nzuoga’ ndetse harimo no kwengwa izindi. Icyo ubuyobozi bwagiriye inama uriya mugabo w’imyaka 36 ngo ahagarika ibyo birori ariko arabyanga, ngo yari ‘yanasinze’.
Mu rugo rw’uriya mugabo ngo harifashije kubera ko ahinga akeza, ndetse akaba afite abamutwerera, ku wa gatandatu ku munsi w’ubukwe nyirizina, ngo yateretse abantu inzoga barinywera nubwo abitabiriye batari benshi.
Umunyambanga Nshingwabikorwa avuga ko urutonde rw’abagiyeyo bakoze rugera ku bantu 12, kandi ngo no ku Cyumweru tariki 29 Werurwe yakomeje kubaha inzoga ari nabwo ubuyobozi bwamutaye muri yombi.
Anastase Tuyizere, uyobora Umurenge wa Hindiro yabwiye Umuseke ko uriya mugabo n’abandi bafatanywe bashyizwe mu Kigo Ngororamuco cya Kabaya kugira ngo babanze kuganirizwa.
Yagize ati “Ntabwo bafunzwe bari mu Kigo Ngoronamuco (Transit Center ya Kabaya), hariya bari hari Transit Center, hakaba station ya Polisi n’iya RIB, bigatuma abantu bitiranya amakuru, ariko bari ku kigo kigishirizwamo indangagaciro aho ku Kabaya.”
Yavuze ko impamvu babashyize hariya ari ukugira ngo babanze baganirizwe, nyuma hafatwe ikemezo cyo kubakurikirana cyangwa kubarekura.
Ati “Ibyo bakoze bishe amabwiriza, ibyo ntitukibikekeranya ni icyaha, ariko ni abaturage, turabanza takabaganiriza, tukareba n’ibyo amategeko avuga, tukareba niba bataha, niba se bacibwa amande cyangwa niba bakurikiranwa mu byaha nshinjabyaha, akajya muri RIB.”
Umwe mu baturanyi be wo mu kagari ka Kajinge yabwiye Umuseke ko uriya mugabo iwe, hari abagore babiri bamufasha mu kwakira abatwerereye, bakanabatekera.
Polisi n’inzego z’ibanze basaba abaturage kwirinda kwegerana cyane mu rwego rwo kwirinda kwanduzanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Amakuru ya mbere avuga ko uriya mugabo hamwe n’abagore babiri bafungiye kuri RIB ku Murenge wa Kabaya mu Karere ka Ngororero mu Ntara y’I Burengerazuba.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: G20: Ba Minisitiri b’Imari baraganira ku isigasirwa ry’Ubukungu bw’Isi bwugarijwe
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri taliki 31, Werurwe, 2020 abaminisitiri b’imari naba Guverineri ba za Banki nkuru z’ibihugu 20 bikize kurusha ibindi ku isi( G20) barakora inama bige uko hafatwa ingamba zo gusigasira ubukungu bw’isi bwugarijwe n’icyorezo COVID-19.
Mu cyumweru gishize abakuru b’ibi bihugu bagiranye inama mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga bemeranya ko hagiye gukusanywa miliyari ibihumbi bitanu by’amadolari ya USA ($5 trillion) kugira ngo ahabwe ibihugu byugarijwe n’iki cyorezo ku isi hose bityo ubukungu bw’isi ntibuzahare cyane.
Ubwami bwa Arabia Saoudite (buyobora uyu muryango muri iki gihe) buvuga ko bariya ba Minisitiri b’Imari na ba Guverineri ba za Banki z’ibihugu bigize G20 baraganira uko imikoranire yanozwa kugira ngo ibikorwa byo gukumira COVID-19 ikomeje kubangamira ubukungu bw’isi bigere ku ntego zabyo.
Mu nama yahuje Abakuru b’ibihugu bigize G20 harimo na Perezida wa USA, Donald Trump na mugenzi we w’u Burusiya, Vladimir Putin.
Bombi basabwe n’umwami wa Arabie Saoudite Salman gukorana kugira ngo ubukungu bw’ibihugu byabo bukomeze kunganira ubw’ibindi bihugu byugarijwe na COVID-19.
USA ubu ni cyo gihugu gifite abaturage bari kwandura cyane, Leta ya New York ni yo yibasiwe cyane.
Ibiganiro hagati ya ba Minisitiri b’imari ba G20 na ba Guverineri ba za Banki nkuru bibaye mu gihe abasesengura ubukungu bw’isi banengaga ibi bihugu kugenda biguru ntege mu gufasha amahanga yibasiwe n’iki cyorezo.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, Antonio Guterres na we aherutse gusaba ko amahanga yarushaho gukorana kugira ngo kiriya cyorezo gikumirwe, akemeza ko kudafatanya mu guhangana na cyo nta ruhande rwabyungukiramo.
Abategetsi bo muri G20 bemereranyijwe kandi ko bagiye gukorana n’inzego z’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga k’Imari (IMF), kugira ngo ibihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere bifashwe guhangana na COVID-19.
Yasabye ko Umugabane wa Africa ari wo wakwitabwaho mu gufashwa gukumira COVID-19 kandi aho yageze bagafashwa kuvura abarwayi bayo.
Iki cyorezo kimaze kwica abantu 37, 500 ku isi hose kandi ntikirahagarara. Igihugu cyapfushije abantu benshi ku isi kugeza ubu ni u Butaliyani, hagakurikiraho Espagne.
Muri Africa, Africa y’Epfo ni yo yibasiwe kurusha ibindi mu gihe u Rwanda ari rwo rufite abanduye iki cyorezo kurusha ahandi mu Muryango wa Africa y’i Burasirazuba, EAC.
International Business Times
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Musanze: Bavoma amazi mabi y’ikiyaga, uwabahaga amazi ngo yarahombye
Body:
Abaturage bo mu Kagari ka Gasakuza, Umurenge wa Gacaca, mu Karere ka Musanze bavuga ko bamaze amezi 10 bavoma mu kiyaga cya Ruhondo, isoko yavonwagamo amazi yahagaritswe na rwiyemezamirimo ngo wavuze ko biri kumuhombya kuko byamutwaraga mazutu nyinshi kugira ngo amazi agere mu bigega.
Ni amazi atari amaze igihe kirekire, bari bayahawe mu rwego rwo kuyabegereza kuko muri ako gace harimo imigezi (amavomo) mike kandi yari yarashaje, ngo hashyizwe umushinga wo gutunganya amazi yo mu isooko yitwa Nyabinyoni, ayo mazi akaba yarakwirakwizwaga mu bigega byo mu tugari twa Kabirizi, Gasakuza ndetse na Gakoro.
Ubu muri aka gace bafite ikibazo gikomeye cy’amazi, ngo abantu barenga 100 bahurira icyarimwe kuri ya migezi bavugaga ko yashaje ndetse amazi yagabanutse cyane.
Abaturage bavuga ko uwari rwiyemezamirimo yababwiye ko ahagaritse kohereza amazi kubera ko ngo yabonaga ari guhomba bitewe n’uko kuvana amazi mu isoko ya Nyabinyoni byamusabaga imashini yakoreshaga mazutu, we akabona atunguka.
Uwitwa Mwitende Pio ati: “Rwihemezamirimo yavuze ko ari mu gihombo ko atakomeza gukwirakwiza amazi mu bigega uko bisanzwe, kuko yakoreshaga mazutu, yavuze ko azongera kuza gutanga amazi ari uko muri aka gace hageze amashanyarazi.”
Akomeza avuga ko amashanyarazi amaze amezi ane ahageze, none na n’ubu iby’amazi byaribagiranye.
Yagize ati “Ubu ni tujya gutonda umurongo kuri kano.”
Utitwa Jean Damascene Kayiranga, we avuga ko mu mudugudu batuyemo wa Kabushanda, na bo amazi yavaga muri ibyo bigega bayabuze.
Ngo bavoma ayo ku masoko ya kera (imigezi ya kera) ariko ngo kubera ayo mazi atizewe, aza ari make cyane, bifuza ko iyo migezi bari begerejwe yasubizwamo amazi bityo bikagabanya umurongo muremure n’amasaha atari make abagiye kuvoma bahamara.
 
Abo mu kagari ka Gasakuza bo nta handi bakura amazi usibye kuvoma ikiyaga…
Akagari ka Gasakuza gaherereye ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Ruhondo, mu myaka yashize abahatuye bari basanzwe bavoma mu kiyaga, abandi bari mu misozi ariko muri ako kagari bo bari bafite imigezi izwi nka Kano, kuri ubu iyo migezi yoze yarakamye nta handi bakura amazi.
Imidugudu ine yose ari yo Karusenyi, Rurambo, Gataba na Gasenyi abayituyemo nta handi babona amazi usibye kuyakura mu kiyaga cya Ruhindo baturiye.
Uwitwa Faustin Mizerero utuye mu mudugudu wa Rurambo aganira n’Umuseke, yavuze ko bamaze igihe kinini batagira amazi, ndetse ngo nta handi bayakura batitaye ko ari meza cyangwa mabi, bavoma mu kiyaga cya Ruhondo, ariko ngo babibwiye ubuyobozi bategereje ikizakorwa.
Ati: “Ndakeka ko ubu umwaka uri hafi gushira amazi twavomaga bayahagaritse ngo kubera ko rwiyemezamirimo yabuze amashanyarazi, ubu nta handi wabona amazi inaha usibye kuvoma ikiyaga, imidugudu ine ni ho tuvoma, nk’ubu muri Ruramba za kano enye zose zarakamye urumva ko dufite ikibazo, twabibwiye ubuyobozi burabizi.”
Andrew Rucyahana Mpuhwe, Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Musanze wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu avuga ko ikibazo abaturage bafite cy’umuyoboro w’amazi Nyabinyoni-Gasakuza bakizi, ndetse ko hanatekerejwe uburyo kizakemuka burundu.
Ati: “Uwo muyoboro tuzi ibyawo, ni ikibazo cyabayeho mu kwezi kwa cyenda (Nzeli) 2019, abo byari mu nshingano bakoreshaga imashini (pompe) ikoreshwa na mazutu, twasanze yarashaje bituma dutekereza uburyo twakora ibishya kandi bizakemura ikibazo ku buryo burambye.”
Avuga ko uwo muyoboro “wateganyijwe mu ngengo y’imari 2020-2021”.
Yagize ati “Twizeye neza ko muri Nyakanga uyu mwaka tuzatangira, iyo mashini yakoreshwaga mazutu tuyisimbuze izajya ikoresha amashanyarazi, tubifitiye ikizere kuko twanavuganye na WASAC ubu hari uburyo tuzabifatanya amazi akongera akaboneka.”
Asaba abaturage kuba bihanganye, bagakora ibishoboka byose ngo birunde ingaruka baterwa n’ayo mazi atari meza, bakajya bayateka.
Ku mazi ya za Kano abasaba kuyayobora neza mu ruhombo akongera akaba menshi.
Emile DUSENGE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga: Ishuri bemerewe na P.Kagame rigeze kuri 98%…Ryitezweho guhindura Ndiza
Body:
Ishuri rizatanga amasomo y’Imyuga  n’Ubumenyingiro (Kiyumba TVET School ) Umukuru w’Igihugu yemereye abatuye mu Murenge wa Kiyumba, imirimo yo kuryuzuza igeze kuri 98%. Abarituriye bavuga ko rigiye kuzamura igice cya Ndiza.
Iri Shuri ryemewe na Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame  muri Nyakanga 2014 ubwo yasuraga Umurenge wa Kiyumba.
Aho riherereye  ni gace k’imisozi miremire ya Ndiza, abahatuye bavuga ko nta mashuri meza y’imyuga  bagiraga ndetse n’ahari akaba atagiraga ayama mashami agezweho muri iki gihe ku isoko ry’umurimo.
Nsanzabaganwa Philippe ati “Inyubako z’ishuri ubwazo zizamuye Umurenge wacu, ndetse rizaha abantu benshi akazi riruhure n’abana bacu bajyaga kwiga mu tundi Turere.”
Umuyobozi w’Ishuri rya Kiyumba TVET School Ingabire Domitille, avuga ko 2% by’imirimo isigaye yakomwe mu nkokora na Coronovirus, akavuga ko nibayitsinda bazasubukura kuko  imirimo ijyanye n’amasuku ari yo isigaye.
Yagize ati “Imyuga izigishwa hano irakenewe, kuko mu mashami mashyashya bemerewe harimo n’iryo gutunganya ibikomoka ku mpu.”
Yavuze ko bateganya guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, kuko aho caguwa iburiye bazajya bakora inkweto bavanye mu mpu z’amatungo zisanzwe zororwa n’banyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe Iterambere ry’ubukungu mu Karere ka Muhanga, Kayiranga Innocent  yabwiye Umuseke ko agace ka Ndiza karimo ibikorwa by’iterambere bifatika kuko  karimo kubakwamo n’ibitaro byo ku rwego rwiza bahawe na Perezida.
Ati “Abaturage bajyaga kwivuriza mu Bitaro by’i Ruli biherereye mu Karere ka Gakenke, ubu iki kibazo ntibizongera kubaho.”
Kayiranga avuga ko hari n’umuhanda Mbuga-Mpimbi-Burerabana na wo watanzwe n’Umukuru w’Igihugu warangiye ubu ukaba ari nyabagendwa.
Usibye Iri Shuri n’Ibitaro bya Nyabikenke bigiye kuzura, Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Muhanga, buvuga ko hari n’umuhanda wa Kaburimbo uzahera mu Cyakabiri-Ndusu bateganya gukora kuko isoko ryo kuwubaka ryatanzwe, ukazoroshya ubuhahirane bw’abaturage n’ abatuye mu bice by’amajyaruguru.

MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga

Title: Bugesera: Mu mudugudu utagikorwamo irondo hadutse ubujura butobora inzu
Body:
Mu Mudugudu wa Kagirazina mu Kagari ka Kanazi, mu Murenge wa Nyamata hadutse ubujura butobora inzu, abaturage bakavuga ko biterwa no kuba irondo ry’umwuga ritagikorwa.
Ni nyuma y’uko mu ijoro ryakeye ryo ku wa 29 Werurwe 2020, muri uyu mudugudu abantu bataramenyekana batoboye inzu isanzwe icururizwamo ibiribwa batwara umufuka w’ibishyimbo wari urimo ibiro bisaga 120.
Abatuye muri uriya mudugudu bavuga ko hari hashize iminsi humvikana ubujura bwo mu mirima, ariko ngo kuba byageze no mu gutobora inzu bigaragaza umutekano utifashe neza, kandi ngo birerekana intera ikibazo k’inzara kigezeho biturutse ku kuba benshi mu baryaga bavuye guca inshuro batakibona aho bapagasa ngo babone uko babaho.
Nyiri iryo duka ryibwe witwa Hakorinshuti agira ati “Nabyutse kare njya guhinga ariko sinari namenye ko baraye banyibye, mu ma saa moya ni bwo umugore yampamagaye ambwira ko bacukuye inzu bagatwara ibishyimbo. Ubujura twumvaga ni ubwakorwaga mu mirima.”
Abaturage bavuga ko kuba ubujura burushaho gufata intera bitizwa umurindi no kuba nta rondo rigikorwa, kandi amafaranga y’umutekano yo ntibahwema kuyishyuzwa.
Umuyobozi w’Umudugudu wa Kagirazina, Manirakiza Gady avuga ko abakoraga irondo ry’umwuga babihagaritse, bitewe n’uko bataherukaga kubona umushahara, ndetse bakabona n’uburyo bwo kubishyuriza budakorwa neza.
Ati “Hashize ukwezi irondo ridakorwa muri uyu Mudugudu (Kagirazina). Nange  njya kumenya ko baretse kurikora nari naraye ijoro mbahiga aho bari ngo tuganire ndababura. Narabahamagaye bambwira ko babihagaritse kubera guhembwa nabi.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyamata, Mushenyi Innocent avuga ko icyo kibazo batari bakizi bitewe n’uko raporo bahabwa igaragaza ko gahunda y’irondo icyubahirizwa muri uriya Mudugudu.
Agira ati “Buri kwezi twakira raporo igaragaza ko irondo rikorwa. Ubu ikigiye gukorwa ni ugukurikirana imikorere yabo umunsi ku munsi.”
Dieudonne NSHIMIYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Min.Shyaka yagaragaje Nyabugogo yera ati “Hose dukomeze gutya, COVID-19 turayitsinda vuba”
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof Shyaka Anastase yagaragaje amafoto ya Nyabugogo itarangwamo umuntu n’ikinyabiziga avuga ko abaturarwanda bakwiye gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19 asaba abantu kuguma mu rugo.
Kuva tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020 saa tanu na mirongo itanu n’ikenda (23h59) mu Rwanda hashyizweho amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVD-19) n’ikwirakwira ryacyo.
Aya mabwiriza yahagarikaga ingendo zaba iz’imbere mu gihugu n’iziva cyangwa izerekeza hanze yacyo, asaba abantu kuguma mu rugo bagasohoka mu gihe ari ngombwa bagiye guhaha cyangwa kwivuza kandi na byo bakabikora bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda kiriya cyorezo.
Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu ishinzwe gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa by’aya mabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe, yasabye abayobozi bo mu nzego z’Ibanze guhaguruka gukomeza gufasha abaturage kutarenga kuri ariya mabwiriza.
Tariki ya 22 Werurwe umunsi wakurikiye ishyirwaho ry’ariya mabwiriza, hari bamwe mu baturage bagiye bagaragara mu bice binyuranye by’igihugu bari mu ngendo zitari ngombwa.
Undi munsi wakurikiyeho, Police y’u Rwanda ifatanyije n’inzego z’Ibanze bagiye bafata bamwe mu batubahiriza ariya mabwiriza ndetse bagahabwa ibihano birimo kubaca amande yo kuba barenze ku mabwiriza ya Leta.
Uyu munsi, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu, Prof Shyaka Anastase yagaragaje Nyabugogo itarimo umuntu utamba cyangwa ikinyabiziba mu gihe hariya ari nk’isangano ry’Umujyi wa Kigali n’ibindi bice byose bigize igihugu. Mu bihe bisanzwe haba hari abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi.
Prof. Shyaka wagaragaje amafoto kuri twitter ye, yayaherekeje ubutumwa bugaragaza ko kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Guverinoma byahamye  kandi binakwiye kuranga ibice byose by’igihugu.
Ati “Kigali itanga ibisubizo:  aha ni Nyabugogo twese tuzi. Ubusanzwe habaga huzuye abantu!  Nidukomeza dutya hose, Covid-19 turayitsinda vuba! Guma mu Rugo, birashoboka.”
Mu kiganiro yaraye agiranye n’ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Itangazamakuru (RBA), CP John Bosco Kabera umuvugizi wa Police y’u Rwanda, yavuze ko icyumweru cya mbere cy’ariya mabwiriza kirangiye ariko ko akomeza kubahirizwa no muri iki twatangiye.
Yagize ati “Ejo ku wa mbere ni guma mu rugo, ku wa kabiri ni guma mu rugo, ku wa Gatatu ni guma m rugo, ku wa Kane ni guma mu rugo, ku wa gatanu ni guma mu rugo ndetse no ku wa gatandatu ni guma mu rugo kugeza igihe Leta izatangariza izindi mpinduka.”
Aya mabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe ni ay’ibyumweru bibiri ariko kugeza ubu imibare y’abanduye Virus itera COVID-19 ikomeje kwiyongera umunsi ku wundi dore koi maze kugera kuri 70 nyuma y’uko ejo hashize habonetse abandi barwayi batandatu.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abashakanye turabasaba gusabaana ariko bibuke kuboneza urubyaro- MIGEPROF
Body:
Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango iributsa abashakanye ko mu bihe nk’ibi byo kutava mu rugo bagomba gusaabaana ariko na none bakazirikana gahunda za Leta zo kuboneza urubyaro kugira ngo birinde inda zitateguwe.
Minisitiri w’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango, Prof. Bayisenge Jeannette yabitangaje mu kiganiro Intambwe Iganje cyatambutse ejo kuri RBA cyagarukaga ku ruhare rw’Umuryango mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Hashize icyumweru nta muntu uva mu rugo baba abakorera Leta n’abikorero kubera ingamba zafashwe zo kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) zisaba abantu bose kuguma mu ngo.
Mu gihe nk’iki kandi abashakanye batava mu rugo ngo bakwiye kwirinda kugwa mu mutego wo kubyara batabiteganyije kuko umugore n’umugabo bahorana ku buryo byakoroha ko babyara inda zitateguwe.
Prof. Bayisenge ati “Turasaba abashakanye ko muri iki gihe bari kumwe mu rugo kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19, bazirikana gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro mu rwego rwo kwirinda inda zitateganyijwe.”
Min Bayisenge agaruka ku nzenya zakunze gucicikana ku mbuga nkoranyambaga muri ibi bihe, bamwe bavuga ko mu bihe nk’ibi umugore n’umugabo bahorana bashobora kuzabona n’umwanya wo kwisanzuranaho n’ibikorwa byo mu buriri bikiyongera ku buryo nyuma y’amezi icyenda hashobora kuzavuka abana benshi.
Ati “Imamvu turi kubigarukaho ni uko abantu bari hamwe, turabasaba gusabana ni ukuvuga rero muri kwa gusabana hashobora kuvamo hashobora kuvamo n’ibindi utateganyije harimo n’inda utateganyije.”
Prof Bayisenge avuga ko ibihe nk’ibi bikwiye kubera umwanya abashakanye wo kuganira ku byafasha ingo zabo gukomeza gutera imbere.
Ati “abari barabuze umwanya bakongera kuganira ku ngingo zo guteza imbere urugo ndetse bakita ku bana.”
Avuga ko ibi byanatuma u Rwanda rugera ku muryango rwifuza ‘Ushoboye kandi Utekanye’.
Ati “Kuko ntabwo waba umuryango ushoboye kandi utekanye bataganiriye ndetse n’ababaga bafite aho batumvikana nk’udukimbirane bakabona n’umwanya wo kuganira kuri ya makimbirane no kuyacoca.”
Avuga kandi ko nubwo uyu mwanya ubonetse mu bihe abantu batifuzaga ariko ukwiye kubyazwa umusaruro ababyeyi bakaganira n’abana babo kuko byavuzwe kenshi ko batababonera umwanya.
Uyu muyobozi wizeza ko iki cyorezo kizatsindwa, akomeza agira ati “Ni byiza ko uzasubira mu kazi uvuga ngo ka kanya naragakoresheje ba bana mbaba hafi, abana ubisanzuraho ubafasha gusubira mu masomo yabo ndetse ubaha n’umwanya wo kukwisanzuraho no kuba bakubaza bya bibazo bataboneraga umwanya wo kukubaza.”
 
Imiryango isanzwe ijegajega bishobora guhumira ku mirari?
Na none kandi hari abavugaga ko mu bihe nk’ibi abashakanye bahorana bashobora kubona utuntu tumwe na tumwe bashobora gupfa ku buryo umwe yaboneraho icyuho cyo kwiyenza kuri mugenzi we.
Abasesengura bavuga kandi ko by’umwihariko imiryango isanzwe ifitanye ibibazo, mu bihe nk’ibi bishobora kutayorohera bikaba byatuma ayo makimbirane akura ndetse bikayishegesha cyane.
Dr Iyamurenge Jean Damascene wo mu kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima RBC, avuga ko bishoboka ko mu bihe nk’ibi umugore n’umugabo bahorana umwe ashobora kubona inenge ku wundi cyane cyane ko bari no mu bihe bigoye by’icyorezo bishobora kubatera ‘stress’.
Ariko akavuga ko badakwiye kugwa muri uwo mutego ahubwo ko uyu ari umwanya mwiza wo kwicara bakarebera hamwe ibibatandukanya bakaba babirenga ahubwo bagashakira ineza umuryango wabo kuko n’urugamba rwo kwirinda COVID-19 barufatanyije.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Kwibuka bizaba ariko nta mugoroba w’ikiriyo n’urugendo rwo kwibuka bizabaho- CNLG
Body:
Komisiyo y’Igihugu ishinzwe Kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG) ivuga ko nubwo igihe cyo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku nshuro ya 26 kigeze Abaturarwanda bari mu bihe bidasanzwe byo kudasohoka mu ngo, nta kizabuza uriya muhango kuba ariko ko hari bimwe mu bikorwa byajyaga biba bitazakorwa.
Mu kiganiro Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa CNLG, Dr Jean Damascene Bizimana yagiranye na RBA, yavuze ko habura iminsi ibariwa ku ntoki ngo abanyarwanda binjire mu gihe cyo kwibuka inzirakarengane zishwe muri Jenoside.
Yavuze ko abantu bari mu bihe bidasanzwe bityo ko n’ibikorwa byo Kwibuka bizabaho mu buryo budasanzwe ndetse bimwe mu byajyaga bikorwa bikazaba bitazakorwa.
Bimwe muri ibi bikorwa bidateganyijwe muri biriya bihe byo kwibuka ni urugendo rwo kwibuka (walk to remember) rusanzwe ruba ku gicamunsi cyo ku ya 07 Mata ndetse n’ijoro ry’ikiriyo ryajyaga rikurikira uru rugendo.
Dr Bizimana ati “Izo gahunda zivuyeho, bivuze ko nta rugendo rwo kwibuka ruzaba haba urwaberaga i Kigali ku rwego rw’igihugu ndetse n’urwaberaga mu turere kubera ko ruhuza abantu benshi kandi bikaba bidakunda muri ibi bihe turimo, ni kimwe n’umugoroba w’ikiriyo wajyaga uba kuri stade Amahoro i Kigali ndetse no mu turere kuri site batoranyije, uwo mugoroba na wo ntabwo uzaba.”
Dr Bizimana wanasobanuye uko ibikorwa byo kwibuka bizagenda muri kiriya cyumweru cyose kizatangira tariki ya 07 Mata, yavuze ko kuri uriya munsi wo kugitangiza, hari itsinda ry’abantu bacye bazajya ku rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ku Gisozi bagaha icyubahiro abahashyinguye ndetse bagashyira indabo ku mva ihari no kwenyegeza urumuri rw’ikizere.
Ati “Habeho n’umunota wo kwibuka, umunota wo kwibuka nugera ni ukuvuga ko abandi twese tuzaba tubikurikira kuri Radio, Television no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, abantu bose aho bazaba bari mu ngo zacu, tuzafata natwe umunota wo kwifatanya n’abari ku gisozi.”
Abanyarwanda kandi babaga bategereje ijambo rw’umushyitsi mukuru wabaga uri muri iki gikorwa cyo kwibuka ukunze kuba ari Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda, Paul Kagame.
Dr Jean Damascene Bizimana avuga ko umunota wo kwibuka uzakurikirwa n’ijambo nyamukuru na ryo rizatambuka kuri Radio na Television no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga kugira ngo abantu bose barikurikire.
Dr Bizimana uvuga ko buriya butumwa buzanahuzwa n’ibihe Abaturarwanda barimo ariko bukanahuzwa no kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, avuga ko iki gikorwa kizaba kigufi ku buryo kitazarenza iminota 30.
Avuga ko no mu turere kandi hazabaho igikorwa cyo kwibuka nk’uko byari bisanzwe ariko na ho hakajyayo itsinda ry’abantu bacye na bo bashyire indabo ku mva kuri site bazatoranya.
Ibi byose bizakorwa hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda no kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ubusanzwe mu cyumweru cyo kwibuka hajyaga hatangwa ibiganiro mu midugudu no mu bigo bitandukanye bigaruka ku mateka yaranze u Rwanda akaruganisha kuri Jenoside ndetse n’urugendo rwo kwiyubaka.
Dr Bizimana avuga no n’ubundi ibi biganiro bizatangwa ariko na byo bigatambuka kuri Radio na Television bikazajya biba buri munsi ku mugoroba muri iriya minsi irindwi.
Na none kandi muri kiriya cyumweru ubusanzwe hajyaga habaho ibikorwa byo kwibuka abiciwe ahantu runaka nk’Abatutsi bavanywe muri Eto Kicukiro bakajya kwicirwa ku musozi wa Nyanza bajyaga bibukwa tariki ya 11 Mata.
Dr Bizimana avuga ko n’ubundi ziriya nzirakarengane zizajya zizirikanwa ariko bikabera mu ngo gusa ikiganiro cyatambutse kuri uwo munsi kizajya gitegura abantu kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa cyo kuzirikana ziriya nzirakarengane.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abarwaye coronavirus mu Rwanda bageze kuri 70
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yavuze ko kuri iki cyumweru abandi bantu 10 bagarageje ko barwaye coronavirus, byatumya imibare y’abandiye icyorezo mu Rwanda igera ku bantu 70.
Abantu batandatu baturutse Dubai, abandi babiri bavuye muri Africa y’Epfo, undi yavuye muri Nigeria, n’undi umwe wakoze ingendo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Africa y’Iburasirazuba.
Ubwandu bushya burakomeza kwiyongera mu gihe u Rwanda rwashyizeho ingamba zikomeye zo gufunga imipaka, guhagarika ingendo z’indege, n’indo z’imbere mu gihugu, ndetse hakaba hariho ingamba z’ubukangurambaga bw’isuku.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko bariya bantu batarembye, bakaba bari mu kato.
Coronaviru imaze gufata abantu 719,414 imaze guhitana abagera ku 33,901 abavuwe bagakira ni 150,918 nk’uko urubuga Worldometer rubitanga mu mibare yo kuri iki cyumweru tariki 30 Werurwe 2020.

Title: Kigali: Hari umukozi wo mu rugo wirukanywe kuko ba Shebuja batakijya ku kazi
Body:
Taliki 24, Werurwe, 2020 hari umukozi wo mu rugo wakoreraga mu murenge wa Gikondo mu Karere ka Kicukiro wirukanywe, bamubwira ko atagikenewe kuko shebuja na nyirabuja batakijya ku kazi, imirimo bayikorera hamwe n’abana. Uyu mukobwa wo muri Ngororero yabwiye TV 1 ko yarenganyijwe. Abo mu burenganzira bwa muntu bamaganye ibyakorewe uriya mukobwa…
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko ibyo abakoresha bamukoreye bidakwiye. Ngo nta muntu w’umubyeyi ushyira mu gaciro wakwirukana umuntu atamuhembye.
Uriya mukobwa yagiriye abandi bakobwa inama yo kutazajya bemera kujya gukorera abanyakigali kuko ngo bafata nabi abakozi babo.
Ati: “Ibintu barimo kudukorera ntabwo ari nk’ibyo umubyeyi yagukoreye. Nawe ubikoreye umwana we ejo yababara cyangwa akakurega. Niyo mpamvu isomo baduhaye ari uko uwo bazajya bahamagara ngo ajye kubakorera atajya ajyayo na bo bakajya babyikorera nk’uko ubu bari kuvuga ngo tuzajya tubyikorera. Nabo bajye birwanaho.”
Bivugwa ko uriya mukobwa iwabo ari mu Murenge wa Ngororero mu Karere ka Ngororero, akaba yari asanzwe akora akazi ko mu rugo mu Murenge wa Gikondo, mu Karere ka Kicukiro.
Abo mu burenganzira bwa muntu bamaganye ibyo kwirukana umukozi muri buriya buryo…
Évariste Murwanashyaka, Umuyobozi ushinzwe gahunda za CLADHO akaba anakurikiranira hafi iby’abakozi bo mu ngo asanga kwirukana umuntu mu bihe nk’ibi bidasanzwe ari ukumuhohotera no kwiburamo ubumuntu.
Avuga ko muri ibi bihe nta muntu wagombye guhohotera undi, ahubwo abantu bagombye gufashanya kugira ngo bazabisohokemo amahoro.
Ati: “Ibi ni ibihe bidasanzwe turimo bisaba kutagira uhohotera undi! Nabonye hari abakozi bo mu rugo birukanywe ngo kuko abakoresha babo bibereye mu rugo, bazabyikorera! Uramwirukana muri ibi bihe se ngo ajye he? Ibi ni ihohotera.  Niba ari ukubafatirana kuko batagira contrat, sinzi?”
Murwanashyaka avuga ko ikibabaje kurushaho ari ukwirukana umuntu ntunamuhe imperekeza, ukamubwira ngo atahe n’amaguru.
Lyhotely Ndagijimana uyobora Umuryango ugamije kuvugira inyungu z’abakozi bo mu rugo witwa Association for the Defense of Human Rights, Sustainable Development and Family Well-Being (ADBEF) yabwiye Umuseke ko kwirukana umukozi muri buriya buryo bishobora kumushyira mu kaga, akaba yahohoterwa mu nzira ataha.
Ikindi kuba baramwirukanye mu gihe bazi neza ko urujya n’uruza rutemewe muri iki gihe abantu bari kwirinda gusohoka ngo batanduzanya COVID-19 byerekana ubumuntu buke babikoranye.
Ati: “Nanjye nabonye ibyakorewe uriya mukobwa birambabaza. Ntabwo bamukoreye ibya kimuntu. Ndasaba Leta kubwira abakoresha ntibirukane abakozi babo kuko abenshi baturuka mu cyaro kandi muri iki gihe urujya n’uruza ntirwemewe.”
Kuva taliki 14, Werurwe, 2020 ubwo mu Rwanda hagaragaraga umuntu wa mbere wanduye COVID-19 Leta yafashe ingamba zitandukanye zigamije kurinda ko handura abaturage benshi.
Imwe mu zikomeye ziherutse gufatwa ni isaba abaturage bose kuguma mu ngo zabo, bakirinda kujya aho bashatse hose, ahubwo hakagenda abafite impamvu zumvikana.
Abemerewe kugenda kandi bagomba kwirinda kwegerana ahubwo hagati y’umuntu na mugenzi we hakabamo byibura intera ya metero imwe.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda habarurwa abanduye COVID-19 bagera kuri 60 ariko bose bivugwa ko nta we urembye urimo.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gasabo: Bahawe impungure na bagenzi babo umwe ati “kuziteka bizatugora”
Body:
UPDATE: Umwe mu bayoboye igikorwa cyo gutanga ubufasha bwatanzwe n’abatuye Umudugudu wa Rukuruzo, avuga ko mbere yo gutanga ubufasha bw’ibigori babanje kubyumvikana n’abaturage, ndetse baba ari bo babasaba kubaha ibigori barebye ko ari ikiribwa gishobora kumara igihe.
Uwavuganye n’Umuseke wadusabye kugira ibanga izina rye, avuga ko abaturage benshi bishimiye iriya nkunga yatanzwe kuva ejo ku wa gatandatu tariki 29 Werurwe, kugeza ku gicamunsi cyo kuri iki cyumweru.
Ati “Imiryango 54 twakusanyije Frw 608 950, ni yo yifashishijwe mu gufasha abaturage barenga 1100 bo mu miryango irenga 300, gusobanurira abaturage iby’inkunga byarakozwe. Igikorwa abaturage bacyakiriye neza cyane ndetse bababazwa n’uko hari abo bitagezeho.” 
Uretse bariya bahawe ibigori, ngo hari imiryango yari ishonje cyane igera ku 9 yo yahawe ifu ya kawunga uriya mudugudu wa Rukurazo mu Kagari ka Kibagabaga mu Murenge wa Kimironko wasaguriwe n’undi Mudugudu byegeranye.
Uretse uburyo Imidugudu yishakamo ubushobozi mu gufasha abakennye bawurimo, hari inkunga Leta yatangiye gutanga mu buryo bwagutse igamije kugoboka abaturage bashonje nyuma y’uko habayeho gahunda yo gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo kugira ngo bareke kuba bakwanduzanya coronavirus, bikaba byaratumye benshi akazi kari kabatunze badakomeza kugakora.
 
Inkuru ya kare: Abatuye umudugudu wa Rukurazo, Akagari ka Kibagabaga mu murenge wa Kimironko mu Karere ka Gasabo bavuga ko ubwo bajyaga gufata ibiribwa baherutse kwemererwa na Perezida  Kagame kugira ngo baticwa n’inzara kubera COVID-19 bahawe impungure n’ibishyimbo. Umuyobozi w’Umurenge avuga ko mu byo P Kagame yemereye abaturage nta mpungure zirimo…
Mu ijambo Perezida Paul Kagame yagejeje ku Banyarwanda ku wa Gatanu taliki 27, Werurwe, 2020 yabasabye kwihanganira ibihe bidasanzwe u Rwanda n’isi yose barimo kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Yavuze ko Leta igiye guha ibiribwa abaturage batishoboye, bari basanzwe barya ari uko basohotse mu ngo bakajya gukora.
Ibi kandi byongeye kugarukwaho na Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu Prof Anastase Shyaka wavuze ko abaturage batishoboye Leta izababa hafi kandi ko ibiribwa mu gihugu bihari, bityo ko ntawe ukwiye kwiheba ngo azicwa n’inzara.
Gahunda yo gutanga ibyo kurya mu batuye Umujyi wa Kigali yatangiye ku wa Gatandatu, taliki 28, Werurwe, 2020 itangira ahantu hatandukanye nko mu Karere ka Nyarugenge.
Kuri iki Cyumweru taliki 29, byakomereje mu turere twa Gasabo na Kicukiro.
Umuturage wo mu mudugudu wa Rukurazo, Akagari ka Kibagabaga muri Kimironko yabwiye Umuseke ko bahawe impungure n’ibishyimbo yita ko ari ibigugu (bitinda gushya).
Ati: “Twababajwe no kuba baduhaye impungure n’ibishyimbo by’ibigugu, mbese nka bimwe uzi byo mu cyaro uteka amasaha atanu cyangwa arenga. Wagira ngo bari kuduhima.”
Avuga ko kuri radio bumvise ko abandi bari guhabwa umuceri, amavuta, ibishyimbo, ifu n’ibindi.
Yongeyeho ko guha umuturage usanzwe akennye ibishyimbo by’ibigugu ngo abitekane n’impungure kandi amakara yarahenze ari ikibazo.
 
Gitifu w’Umurenge ati: “Mu byo Perezida Kagame yageneye abaturage nta mpungure zirimo!”
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kimironko, Jean Sauveur Kalisa avuga ko izo mpungure n’ibyo  bishyimbo bitari mu byo Perezida Kagame yageneye abaturage ahubwo ko ari ibyo abatuye umudugudu  bishatsemo kugira ngo bafashe abakennye aho batuye.
Kalisa avuga ko gutanga inkunga ya Leta bitaragera muri uriya mudugudu, ko batangiriye mu Bibare bakomereza Nyagatovu,.
Ati: “Biriya ni ibintu abatuye umudugudu bikoreye mu masibo yabo kugira ngo bafashe abakennye cyane muri bo. Erega n’ubundi mu byatanzwe na Leta nta mpungure zirimo.”
Avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge bwirinze kwivanga mu kugena ibyo abagize umudugudu runaka bagenera abaturanyi babo bakennye kurusha abandi. Ngo banze gushyiraho igitutu ku bantu ngo bahe bagenzi babo ibi cyangwa biriya.
Jean Sauveur Kalisa avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge bugiye kuvugana n’ubw’Umudugudu wa Rukurazo kugira ngo bububwire ko bwagombye kubanza gusobanurira abaturage ko inkunga bari guhabwa atari iya Leta ahubwo ari iy’abaturanyi babo.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gicumbi: Akurikiranyweho kwica Se wari umaze kumwishyurira ibyo yibye
Body:
*Umusore yemera ko yicishije Se ibuye,                                            *Abaturanyi bo bavuga ko ari umuhini yamukubise
Marcel Muvandimwe w’imyaka 24 y’amavuko avugwaho kwica Se witwa Leonidas Muhingabo w’imyaka 78. Abaturage bavuga ko yamukubise umuhini ariko we akavuga ko yamuteye ibuye riramwica. Byabereye mu mudugudu wa Rukereza, Akagari ka Murama, Umurenge wa Byumba mu karere ka Gicumbi kuri iki Cyumweru taliki 29, Werurwe, 2020 saa sita n’igice z’ijoro.
Abaturanyi babo bavuga ko bumvise umusaza arwana n’umuhungu we mu gicuku, bahamagara irondo rihageze risanga umusaza yakomeretse cyane mu mutwe, ajyanwa ku kigo nderabuzima cya Ruhenda agerayo yapfuye.
Ku wa Gatanu Taliki 27 Werurwe, 2020 uriya musore witwa Muvandimwe bivugwa ko yagiye kwiba mu isantire arafatwa.
Umubyeyi we yamwishyuriye ibyo yibye baramureka arataha.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Byumba w’umusigire witwa Valens Nshimiyimana, yavuze ko uriya musore yabwiye ubuyobozi ko yakubise Se ibuye.
Ati: ”Ni byo urwo rupfu rwabayeho, mu kagari ka Murama, uwo musore ejobundi yari yibye mu gasantire, bamufashe Se ashaka kumwishyurira, nyuma imirwano yabereye mu rugo iwabo mu masaha y’ijoro, uwo musore yavuze ko ari ibuye yamukubise.”
Bamwe mu baturanyi babo, batangaje ko ukurikije uko igikomere cy’uriya musaza cyari kimeze ubwo bamujyanaga  ku kigo Nderabuzima cya Ruhenda, babonaga atari ibuye yakubiswe.
Ubwo  iyi nkuru yandikagwa umurambo wa nyakwigendera wari ukiri ku kigo nderabuzima cya Ruhenda.
Umusore ukurikiranyweho kiriya cyaha yashyikirijwe inzego z’umutekano.
EVENCE NGIRABATWARE UMUSEKE.RW/ GICUMBI

Title: Abantu 6 biyongereye kuri 54 barwaye Coronavirus mu Rwanda
Body:
Mu Rwanda hagaragaye abandi bantu batandatu banduye coronavirus bituma imibare igera ku bantu 60 barwaye Covid-19, iki cyorezo kimaze gufata abagera ku bihumbi 640 ku isi.
Itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima rivuga amakuru mashya ku bantu banduye coronavirus mu Rwanda rigaragaza ko abantu bane mu babonetse uyu munsi banduriye i Dubai.
Umuntu umwe yanduriye muri America (USA). Undi umwe yandujwe n’abantu barwaye iyi ndwara bamusanze imbere mu gihugu.
Coronavirus ku Isi nk’uko bigaragara ku rubuga Worldometer abayanduye bageze ku 645,606 indwara ya Covid-19 imaze guhitana 29,971, abavuwe bagakira ni 139,552.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: P.Kagame yashimye G20 yahaye umwanya Africa mu kurwanya Coronavirus
Body:
Perezida Paul Kagame witabiriye inama y’ibihugu 20 bikize ku Isi (G20) yabaye muri iki cyumweru mu buryo bw’Ikoranabuhanga igamije gushaka umuti w’icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) yashimye iri huriro umwanya ryahaye ubuyobozi bwa Africa Yunze Ubumwe muri uru rugamba.
Perezida Kagame unayoboye Ihuriro ry’Abakuru b’Ibihugu rishinzwe icyerekezo cy’Iterambere ry’Umugabane wa Africa (AUDA-NEPAD) yitabiriye iriya nama ari i Kigali hifashishijwe uburyo bw’Ikoranabuhanga buzwi nka ‘Video Conference’.
Iyi nama yateranye igamije gushakira umuti icyorezo cya COVD-19 cyugarije Isi, yafashe imyanzuro irimo uvuga ko biriya bihugu bikomeye ku Isi byiyemeje gukora igishoboka cyose kugira ngo iki cyorezo gihagarare.
Perezida Kagame wayitabiriye, yashimye abayobozi ba G20 bahaye umwanya Ubuyobozi bwa Africa Yunze Ubumwe muri ruriya rugamba rwo gushaka umuti w’iki cyorezo.
Ati “Ndashima Perezida Emmanuel Macron na shanseriyeri Merkel n’abandi bayobozi ba G20 bifatanyije n’umuyobozi wa AU perezida Cyril Ramaphosa mu guha Africa umwanya wihariye muri mu nama yo gushaka umuti wa Coronavirus ya G20.”
Perezida Kagame kandi yashimye Ubwami bwa Saudi Arabia bwahaye umwanya ihuriro rya AUDA-NEPAD ayoboye.
Umukuru w’igihugu yanaboneyeho kwihanganisha ibihugu bigize ririya huriro rya G20 ryazahajwe bikomeye n’iki cyorezo dore ko ibihugu biri imbere mu kugira umubare w’abanduye n’abapfuye n’Ubushinwa na USA biri mu bikomeye muri G20.
Ati “Turi kubona kandi tunashima ingamba zafashwe mu bihugu binyuranye. Ibi biraduha icyizere ko Coronavirus iza kurandurwa mu gihe cya vuba.”
Perezida Kagame avuga kandi ko iki cyorezo kitigeze kigira ubukana nk’ubu mu myaka yatambutse, Umugabane wa Africa wahagurukiye hamwe ukaba uri gukorera hamwe mu kukirwanya.
Avuga ko ubufatanye n’ibindi bihugu ndetse n’ubushobozi bw’ibihugu bya Africa buzatanga umusaruro wo gushaka igisubizo cy’iki cyorezo mu gihe biri kubaka urwego rw’ubuvuzi rwabyo rukomeye. Yavuze kandi ko komisiyo ishinzwe ubukungu ya AU ivuga ko ibi bizasaba nibura Miliyari 100 USD.
Ati “Tugomba kurangiza iki cyorezo aho ari ho hose kuko giteye impungenge buri wese. Ni ngombwa ko dukorana na G20 mu bikorwa byayo binyuze mu miryango itandukanye nk’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (WHO), Banki y’Isi, n’Ikigega IMF.”
Perezida Kagame avuga ko ashima Dr Tedros uyobora WHO wagaragaje urugero rwiza rw’imiyoborere mu bihe nk’ibi byo kurwanya COVID-19.
Avuga ko inzego z’abikorera zazamuye kandi ziteza imbere ikoronabuhanga rishobora kwifashishwa mu bihe bikomeye nk’ibi ndetse aboneraho gushima G20 ishyize imbere ubushakashatsi bwo gushaka umuti n’urukingo bya COVID-19.
Yavuze kandi ko Isi igomba gushyira ingamba zo gusaranganya imiti n’ibikoresho byifashishwa mu gusuzuma iki cyorezo bikagera ahantu hose hashoboka.
Ati “Mureke dushyire hamwe mu kurandura icyorezo cya COVID-19 kandi twubake inzego z’ubuzima zikomeye kugira ngo dufashe abaturage bacu gukomeza batekanye mu bihe biri imbere.”
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga: Umugabo yagwiriwe n’igikuta ahita apfa
Body:
Ntwari Jean de Dieu w’imyaka 34 y’amavuko yagwiriwe n’igikuta cy’amabuye ahubakwa Ruhurura mu Mujyi wa Muhanga, ahita apfa.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyamabuye, Gakwerere Eraste yabwiye Umuseke ko amakuru y’impanuka yahitanye Ntwari bayamenye saa kumi n’ebyeri zishyira saa moya z’umugoroba.
Gakwerere avuga ko Ntwari, wari utuye mu Murenge wa Cyeza yaje gusura mukuru we utuye mu Mujyi wa Muhanga, amuzaniye ibiryo ageze mu rugo basangira agacupa barangije bajya gutirura amavide, nibwo bageze hafi y’aho imirimo yo kubaka ruhurura ikorerwa igikuta cy’amabuye kigwira Ntwari.
Gakwerere ati: “Umuvandimwe we wari inyuma ntacyo byamutwaye, uwari uje kumusura ni we wahise apfa.”
Avuga ko aho banyuraga hari hafunze kubera ikibazo cya ruhurura imaze gusatira inyubako z’abaturage. Umurambo wa Ntwari  Jean de Dieu uri mu buruhikiro i Kabgayi.
Nkomeje Jean Baptiste nyiri igikuta cyagwiriye Ntwari avuga ko mu minsi ishize bandikiye Ubuyobozi babubwira ko babangamiwe na Ruhurura.
Ati: “Kampani yahawe isoko ryo kubaka ruhurura yashatse gukemura ikibazo kimwe iteza ikindi, n’ubu nta mutekano dufite kuko inzu zacu zigiye kugwa.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga, Kayitare Jacqueline yabwiye Umuseke ko bagiye kwimura ingo zose zikikije ruhurura kuko muri ibi bihe by’imvura ubuzima bwabo bushobora kujya mu kaga.
Ati: “Inzu zabo ziranaganitse ni yo mpamvu twifuza kubimura vuba bishoboka.”
Ubwo twakoraga iyi nkuru, bamwe mu bakodesha inzu ziri hafi ya ruhurura bahise bimuka.
Iyo ruhurura imaze gusenya inzu imwe n’igikoni, Akarere kavuze ko kamaze kwishyura uwo muturage ruhurura yasenyeye agera kuri Miliyoni 19Frw.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga.

Title: Ruhango: 11 barimo Umukozi  w’Akarere bafungiye kurenga ku mabwiriza y’Ubuyobozi
Body:
Mu ijoro ryakeye ryo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 27 Werurwe 2020, Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Ruhango, n’Inzego z’Umutekano baraye bafatiye abantu 11 muri Hoteli banywa inzoga birengagije amabwiriza yo kuguma mu rugo yatanzwe na Minisiteri y’ubuzima. Aba bafashwe barimo umukozi w’akarere.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Ruhango, Habarurema Valens yabwiye Umuseke ko mu igenzura bakoze basanze umuyobozi w’iriya Hoteli n’abandi bantu 10 barimo kunywa inzoga bicaranye batitaye ku mabwiriza aherutse gutangwa yo kwirinda Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Habarurema avuga ko  mu bo bafashe harimo n’umukozi w’Akarere wagombaga kubera abandi urugero ariko akarenga kuri ariya mabwiriza yashyizweho kugira ngo arengere Abaturarwanda.
Ati “Abo bose uko ari cumi n’umwe bari mu maboko y’ubugenzacyaha i Nyamagana, nibasaba imbabazi bazacibwa amande barekurwe.” 
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko mu bukangurambaga bwo kwirinda Coronavirus  bamaze iminsi bakora, abatuye muri kariya karere benshi bamaze gusobanukirwa ingaruka z’iyi ndwara ndetse ko bari kubahiriza ingamba za Guverinoma.
Habarurema asaba abaturage  ko bakomeza kuguma mu ngo kugeza igihe iki cyorezo kizatsindwa.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Ruhango buvuga ko no mu bice by’icyaro batangiye gukurikiza inama bagirwa n’Ubuyobozi ku rugero ruri hejuru, aba bafatiwe muri Hoteli banywa inzoga bakaba batanze urugero rutari rwiza ku baturage.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Ruhango

Title: Gasabo: Imiryango 70 irimo ifite abana bafite ubumuga yahawe inkunga y’ibiribwa
Body:
Umuryango witwa Love with Actions wagobotse ababyeyi 40 wari usanzwe ufashwa kubaho no kwita kubana babo bafite ubumuga, ibikorwa byari bibabeshejeho bikaba byarahagaze kubera amabwiriza asaba abantu kuguma mu ngo birinda ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Hanafashijwe indi miryango 30 ikennye, aba bafashijwe bavuga ko icyorezo kimaze igihe ubuzima bwaba bubi cyane.
Mukanzigiye Vestine, ni umwe mu babyeyi bafite umwana ufite ubumuga, yabohaga uduseke bikamufasha kubaho, abifashijwemo na Love with Actions, umuryango ukorera mu Murenge wa Bumbogo.
Umushinga warahagaze, imibereho ye ngo yari mike. Ngo hari ubwo banaburaraga kubera ko nta hantu bakura ikindi cyo kurya.
Ati “Ibitugoye ni ukubona imibereho, kubona icyo tugaburira abana.”
Kuboha agaseke byatumaga abasha kubona amafaranga yo guhaha bimwe mu biribwa, agatunga umuryango we w’abana batanu n’umugabo we, avuga ko icyorezo kimaze igihe cyateza ingaruka zikomeye ku buzima.
Ati “Coronavirus imaze amezi atandatu twaba twarapfuye.”
Nibarere Pacifique, wo mu Mudugudu wa Akasedogo, Akagari ka Nkozozo, Umurenge wa Bumbogo, avuga ko yari abayeho mu buryo bwo gushakisha abafite akazi bakamuha icyo akora, nyuma ubuyobozi bwasohoye amabwiriza yo kuguma mu ngo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus, na we bimugiraho ingaruka.
Uyu mubyeyi ufite umwana wavukanye ubumuga, aribana kubera ko se w’uwo mwana yabataye.
Gahunda yo kuguma mu ngo kuri we ngo yamugizeho ingaruka kubera ko umwana we ahora akenera ibikoresho by’isuku (pampers).
Gilbert Kubwimana ukuriye Love with Actions, avuga ko imiryango 40 bafashaga ifite abana bafite ubumuga, ngo nyuma yo kwaduka kwa coronavirus byatumye ubukoroikori buhagarara, ndetse n’ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi ku bana babo birahagarara.
Avuga ko uretse kuba bafashije ababyeyi bafite abana bamugaye bakoranaga, hari n’indi miryango 30 ikennye bahawe n’Ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge na yo yafashijwe. Avuga ko n’ubundi bazakomeza kubakorera ubuvugizi, kandi akizera ko nta muturage uzicwa n’inzara kubera ko na Leta y’u Rwanda yagaragaje ko hari ikizere cy’uko ibiribwa bihari.
Ati “Love with Actions idakoze kimwe inzego z’ibanze ziri gukora ibindi, amatorero ari gukora ibindi, imiryango itari iya Leta iri gukora ibindi, impande zose ziri kwegeranya ubushobozi kugira ngo hatagira Umunyarwanda n’umwe upfa biturutse ku ngamba z’uko abantu bagumye mu ngo zabo kubera coronavirus.”
Love with Actions ufasha abana bafite ubumuga bw’ingingo kubagorora, ugafasha n’imiryango yabo kubona ibiyitunga binyuze mu bukorikori. Kuri uyu wa gatandatu inkunga watanze y’ibikoresho by’isuku n’ibiribwa, ngo ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 1.2Frw.
Ku rwego rw’Igihugu hatangiye ibikorwa byo gufasha imiryango itishoboye

Title: Covid-19: Gukoresha ikoranabuhanga bigaragaza ko akazi kadakorerwa mu biro gusa
Body:
Opinion:  Nubwo akazi kahagaze kuri bamwe mu buryo bwo kukajyaho buri munsi kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ariko biragaragara ko gukora bikomeza. Abo byorohera cyane ni abakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Iri rishobora kuba ari igisubizo cy’akazi umuntu akora bitabaye ngombwa ko ahaguruka iwe kandi akagakora neza.
Ntibyari bihagije kugira kandagira ukarabe ku biro ukoreramo cyangwa se kugira alukolo yica udukoko ku kazi ngo ugaragare nk’ufite ubwirinzi ndakuka mu gukumira Covid-19. Kuko umukozi n’ubundi wazaga ku kazi yazaga yanyuze ahandi hantu hatandukanye. Ahenshi ni aho banyuraga mu modoka, mu nzira bagenda n’ahandi ariko basuhuzanya, bakorakora ahakozwe n’abandi, mbese ku buryo ibyago byo kwandura byari byinshi. Gukorera mu ngo ni yo yahise iba ingamba mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu kudakwirakwiza icyorezo. Ibi byoroheye n’ubundi abasanzwe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Nyamara ariko byahaye n’abatarikoresha undi mwanya wo kongera kureba niba koko ikoranabuhanga ridashobora koroshya ubuzima kurushaho kandi akazi kagakorwa neza.
 
Singombwa gutera iperu ku kazi buri munsi (hose)
Ese kubyukira ku kazi buri munsi biracyari ngombwa cyane igihe hari akazi kadasaba ko ugakora agomba kuba ari ku kazi buri gihe? Gusubiza iki kibazo bisaba kubanza kumenya ngo ese ibi bireba iyihe miterere y’akazi. Hari akazi gasaba umuntu byo koko guhora ari mu biro, kuko ibikoresho bisaba kugakora biba biri ku kazi cyangwa kubera ko ibanga ry’akazi impapuro zimwe na zimwe zitagomba kuba zajya mu rugo. Ariko kandi hari ubundi bwoko bw’imirimo budasaba ko abantu babyuka batera iperu ku kazi buri munsi. N’ikimenyimenyi muri iyi minsi hari ababyuka bakorera iwabo aho bahahinduye ibiro byo gukoreramo. Kandi abakoresha babo ndakeka ko ubu batabyibazaho.
Imiryango imwe n’imwe mpuzamahanga itagengwa na Leta ibi yarabitangiye aho abakozi baza ku kazi bagakora inama buri wese akavuga icyo azakora ubundi bagaha abantu iminsi itatu yo gukorera aho bashaka iwabo cyangwa ahandi bashaka ariko badategetswe kuza ku kazi. Ibi rero nyuma yo kuva mu gihe cyashyizweho na Leta cyo kuba abantu bagumye mu rugo (iminsi 14) abakoresha bagombye kubitekerezaho kurushaho. Ibi birinda abantu ibintu byinshi. Niba umukozi yagendaga inshuro eshanu (5) mu cyumweru ajya ku kazi, akaba yajyayo inshuro ebyiri (2) cyangwa izindi zagenwa n’urwego akorera, ibi bituma hari amafaranga abika, azigama yakoreshaga mu ngendo yaba atega cyangwa atwara imodoka ye.
Ufite imodoka ye we anafasha mu rugamba rwo guhangana n’ihindagurika ry’ikirere aho aparika ntiyangize ikirere. Ibi bishobora no gutuma abakoresha batarwana no gushaka za biro nini zibahenze kuko nyine umwanya wo kuhakorera ku bakozi bose utaba ari munini. Birashoboka guhuza za biro umwanya muto ugakorerwamo n’abantu benshi muri icyo gihe gito.
 
Ubucuruzi bukoresha ikoranabuhanga
Bimaze iki guhaguruka i Kigali ugiye kugura ibintu mu Bushinwa (China), ugatega indege ukishyura itike, ukarara amajoro wishyura amahoteli nyamara ariko bishoboka kwicara i Kigali kuri internet ugakora commande ukishyura ukoresheje ikarita ibintu bikakugeraho utishyize mu byago wahura na byo mu nzira, n’amafaranga y’andi akugendaho bikarangira ibyo ugiye kuzana n’ubundi bikugezeho nk’uko byari kukugeraho iyo ubikorera mu kazi kawe aho uri, unagakurikirana uhibereye.
Uyu munsi ni umwanya wo kongera kubitekerezaho abantu bakabona ko kubikora bituma baronka umwanya wabo, bagakurikirana ibikorwa byabo kandi ubuzima bugakomeza. Gusa ibi ntibikuyeho ko ku mpamvu runaka zizwi na nyirubwite ashobora kuba yakwigirayo. Ariko bibaye ngombwa ikoranabuhanga ryakwifashishwa bigafasha mu kuzigama umwanya, n’amafaranga.
Ese ni iki cyaba gitera abacuruzi cyangwa abajya guhaha kutabikora? Ni uko batabizi se? Icya mbere cyaba ari ubumenyi buke ku ikoranabuhanga no kutagirira icyizere ubu buryo bushya bw’ubucuruzi cyane ko bubamo n’ubujura bukoresheje ikoranabuhanga. Ibi rero ku bakiri bato kandi babyize babyumva ni umwanya wo kwishakira akazi aho bashobora kujya bakurikirana ibikorwa by’abo bantu bakaba babibakorera mpaka bigeze Kigali. Ni akazi  nk’akandi. Ibi ariko birasaba ko na Minisiteri ifite ikoranabuhanga mu nshingano zayo, ndetse n’urwego rw’abikorera bafatanya muri iki kintu, bagahugura abacuruzi, kugira ngo ikoranabuhanga ryoroshye ubuzima bwa bo.
 
Ikoranabuhanga mu ngo 
Ikoranabuhanga si ukugira telefoni ifite internet gusa,  gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga cyangwa ibijyanye no kwandikiranaho ku butumwa butandukanye. Muri iyi minsi abantu basabwe kuguma mu ngo, abenshi batangiye kubona ko televiziyo atari ikintu cyiza abana babo bakwigiraho. Ubu rero ni byiza ko abubaka batangira gutekereza ku byumba by’abana cyangwa ibindi byakoreshwa biga bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga cyangwa bikaba za biro zo gukoreramo (ku batarabikoze).
Bimaze iki kugira inzu y’ibyumba birindwi ariko mu gihe nk’iki abana bakabura aho bigira, ugasanga bararwanira muri salon ahaba hari ibishuko bya televiziyo n’ibindi. Ibigo by’amashuri by’inkwakuzi byo byatangiye no kwigisha abanyeshuri babo bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga muri ibi bihe. Bene ibi byumba bifasha abana kwiga nta kibazo. Nyiri urugo nyine asabwa kugurira abana imashini, kubaha internet n’ibindi byakenerwa. Ibi ni ibyatekerezwaho kuko ku bigaragara nyuma y’iki cyorezo hari byinshi bigomba guhinduka mu buryo abantu bari basanzwe bakora cyangwa babayeho.
Mu isi nk’iyi yihuta, ikoranabuhanga riri mu biyiyoboye. Ni ngombwa ko abantu bitegura rero ko mu minsi iri imbere mwalimu n’umunyeshuri bashobora kutazajya bahurira gusa mu ishuri ahubwo bazajya babana no mu ngo biciye mu ikoranabuhanga biyungura umunsi ku munsi (aho bitaratangira).
Gusa ibi birasaba n’ibigo by’amashuri kwitabira ikoranabuhanga ndetse n’ababyigishamo bakarikoresha. Bimaze iki kugira ikigo kitagira website, aho abantu bamenyera gahunda z’ikigo za buri munsi, ibikorwa biteganyijwe… Bene iyi website inafasha kuba yajyaho imikoro yo mu biruhuko bidasabye ko abana baza bikoreye ibifurumba by’impapuro.
Uzakoresha ikoranabuhanga mu bumenyi, mu mikorere ye mu mashuri, nta kabuza azabona ababyeyi benshi bazana abana be kuhiga. Ikoranabuhanga ni ryo zingiro ry’ubumenyi bw’ejo hazaza. Uzacikanwa azaba arera ba kera habayeho.
Nubwo isi iri mu bihe bya coronavirus aho abenshi basabwa kuguma mu rugo, ni byiza ko abenshi batangira gutekereza ku buryo ikoranabuhanga ryababera igisubizo ku bibazo ariko kandi n’iyo ibibazo byaba bidahari, ikoranabuhanga ribe ryakoreshwa mu buryo bwo koroshya imikorere isanzwe abantu bazigame amafaranga, bazigame umwanya ndetse n’igihe cyabo.
Niyonagize Fulgence

Title: Twanyuze muri byinshi, dufatanyije intambara ya coronavirus tuzayitsinda -Kagame
Body:
Mu ijambo Perezida Paul Kagame yagejeje ku Banyarwanda ku bijyanye n’ibimaze gukorwa mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus, yagarutse ku ruhare rwa buri wese mu guhangana n’iki cyorezo avuga ko mu bufatanye bw’abaturarwanda n’ubuyobozi nta kabuza u Rwanda ruzatsinda ‘intambara ya coronavirus’.
Perezida Kagame yabanje gushimira Abanyarwanda uko bitwaye mu byumweru bibiri bishize hagaragaye umurwayi wa mbere wa coronavirus, ngo buri wese hari icyo yakoze, ndetse ashima ubufatanye, ubwitange no kumvira amabwiriza abaturarwanda bakomeje kugaragaza.
Yashimye by’umwihariko abaganga bakomeje kugaragaza ubwitange mu gukumira ubwandu bushya bavura abagaragayeho uburwayi, bagatuma igihugu gikomeza gutekana.
Ati “Uyu munsi hamaze kugaragara abarwayi ba coronavirus 54 mu gihugu cyacu, uyu mubare uzakomeza kuzamuka kuko hakomeza gushakishwa abahuye n’abarwaye iyo ndwara kugira ngo bapimwe ndetse abagaragayeho uburwayi bavurwe. Ubu nibwo buryo bwiza bwo gufasha abashobora kuba baranduye mu rwego rwo kurinda imiryango yabo, ndetse na twe twese aho dutuye.”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ku ngamba zo guhagarika ingendo z’indege, kugabanya urujya n’uruza ku mipaka no guhagarika ingendo z’imbere mu gihugu, mu rwego rwo kugabanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo, ariko avuga ko iyi ndwara yandura vuba kandi mu buryo butarasobanuka, ari na yo mpamvu asaba Abanyarwanda kwirinda.
Yagize ati “Niyo mpamvu mpamagarira buri wese gukurikiza aya mabwiriza yashyizweho na Leta, tukihanganira ingorane zose byaba bitera kugira ngo dutsinde iki cyorezo burundu kugira ngo ke guhitana abantu benshi.”
Ibisabwa ni Kuguma mu rugo, gusiga intambwe ndende hagati y’umuntu n’abandi igihe umuntu asohotse mu rugo ndetse no mu rugo, gukaraba intoki neza kenshi, no kwitaba ubuyobozi igihe umuntu agaragaje ibimenyetso by’uburwayi.
 
Coronavirus yahungabanyije imibereho y’Abanyarwanda bose 
Perezida Kagame yagize ati “Tuzi neza ko ibi bihe bitoroshye, byahungabanyije imibereho y’Abanyarwanda benshi ndetse mu gihugu hose, turabasaba ko mwihangana, turatera intambwe nziza ntidukwiye gutezuka, Leta izakomeze gufasha Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe bitoroshye. Ingamba zarafashwe n’izindi zizafatwa kugira ngo abikorera bubake uburyo bakomeza gukora muri ibi bihe, inzego zitandukanye zizategura uko abatishoboye bafashwa hasigaye kubyihutisha.” 
Perezida Paul Kagame yashimiye Umuryango Mpuzamhanga wita ku Buzima (OMS) uyobowe na Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, ashimira abafatanyabikorwa barimo Jack Ma na fondasiyo ye, ku nkunga bahaye u Rwanda.
Ati “Abanyarwanda dushyize hamwe twivanye mu bibazo bitandukanye mu bihe bitandukanye, ubufatanye bwacu ndetse no kudatezuka birakenewe muri iyi ntambara turimo yo kurwanya iki cyorezo kandi tugomba kuyitsinda, nongeye kubasaba uruhare rwa buri wese mu bikorwa no mu myumvire, ingamba twafashe zatanze umusaruro mwiza, ibyemezo dufata uyu munsi ni byo bizatuma dushobora guhashya iki cyorezo vuba kugira ngo dusubire mu buzima busanzwe.”
Imibare ya Worldometer igaragaza ko Coronavirus imaze kwandura abagera ku 591,280, abapfuye bamaze kuba 26,979, ababashije gukira ni 132,520, iri mu bihugu 202 ku Isi.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abantu 4 biyongereye kuri 50 bapimwemo coronavirus mu Rwanda
Body:
Kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 27 Werurwe 2020, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abandi bantu bane bapimwemo Coronavirus, bituma umubare w’abarwaye Covid-19 bagera kuri 54 mu Rwanda.
Umuntu umwe mu bapimwemo coronavirus yaturutse i Dubai, undi muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za America, abandi bantu babiri ni abandujwe n’abazanye icyorezo bavuye hanze.
