Title: Rusizi: Abagabo 3 bari mu maboko ya RIB bakekwaho gukubita Umuyobozi na DASSO
Body:
Mu Mudugudu wa Gipfura mu Kagari ka Gaheka, abantu batatu batawe muri yombi bakekwaho gukubita Umukuru w’Umudugudu n’Umu-DASSO babasabaga kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kuguma mu ngo.
Umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza avuga ko bafungiye kuri Station ya Kamembe.
Yavuze ko ubutumwa Abanyarwanda bakwiye kumva ari uko kwigomeka ku byemezo by’ubuyobozi ari icyaha gihanwa n’Amategeko, kandi RIB ikaba itazabyihanganira.
Abafashwe ni uwitwa Niyonkuru, Mugaruza na Habyarimana. Bakurikiranyweho gukubita no gukomeretsa no kwigomeka ku byemezo by’Ubuyobozi.
Mayor wa Rusizi, Kayumba Ephrem yabwiye Umuseke ko bariya bayobozi bakubiswe ku wa kane tariki 26 Werurwe nimugoroba, ngo bariya babakubise ni insoresore zitagira akazi, zigometse ku mabwiriza yatanzwe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe.
Yavuze ko bariya bayobozi bari mu bugenzuzi bwo kureba niba nta muntu uri hanze mu Mugi wa Rusizi kugira ngo bamugire inama yo gusubira mu rugo.
Mu Karere ka Rusizi kimwe n’ahandi mu gihugu amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe asaba buri Muturarwanda kuguma iwe mu rugo igihe adafite urugendo rwihutirwa mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, amabwiriza aramara ibyumweru bibiri.
Rusizi ni Akarere gakora ku mupaka uhuza u Rwanda na D.R.Congo ndetse n’u Burundi.
Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abantu ni bo nyirabayazana w’ibyorezo bibugarije
Body:
Abahanga bo mu binyabuzima n’abaharanira kurengera ibidukikije bagera kuri 200 baherutse gutangaza ko indwara z’ibyorezo byikubye inshuro enye mu myaka 50 ishize. Inyinshi ziterwa n’uko abantu bafata inyamaswa bakazivana aho zaremewe gutura bakazorora, abandi bakazirya.
Ikindi abahanga bavuga ni uko ibikorwa bya muntu byo kwangiza ibidukikije byasenye ahantu kamere inyamaswa zabaga bituma zitangira gushaka aho zisuhukira bityo zigenda zirushaho guturana na we.
Uku guturana hagati y’inyamaswa nk’uducurama, udusamujyonjyo (pangolins) na muntu byatumye uyu ubuzima bwe bwugarizwa n’indwara z’ibyorezo yazaniwe na za virus ziba zisanzwe zibanira na ziriya nyamaswa mu mahoro.
Bariya bahanga bavuga ko ziriya ndwara zikunda kwibasira abatuye ibihugu biherereye mu gace k’isi kari hagati y’imirongo mbariro ya tropique na cancer, agace bita zone intertropicale.
Mu ibaruwa yabo basabye Sena ya USA gutora umushinga w’itegeko w’uko ibigo bikora ubushakashatsi ku binyabuzima n’abaharanira ubusugire bw’ibidukikije byahabwa 1% by’ingengo y’imari ya USA ni ukuvuga miliyari 20$ yo gukoresha mu gusana aho inyamaswa zaba zitekanye bityo ntizikomeze gusagarira abantu cyangwa zijye guturana na bo.
Umuhanga witwa Lee Hannah wo mu kigo kitwa Conservation International  avuga ko bizwi ko ibice bituriye iriya mirongo mbariro bibamo inyamaswa zigira virus kurusha ahandi.
Ngo ni ibice bishyuha bityo bikaba indiri y’inyamaswa nk’uducurama, injangwe, imibu, udusamujyonjyo n’izindi zizwiho kubana na virus zica abantu cyane.
Gucuruza izi nyamaswa, ukazivana aho zisanzwe ziba ukazizana mu bantu ni ubwiyahuzi.
Ikindi abahanga bavuga kiri mu bituma abantu bazahazwa na ziriya ndwara ni ugushyuha kw’ikirere no guhumana k’umwuka abantu bahumeka.
Umuhanga witwa Aaron Bernstein wo mu kigo cya Kaminuza ya Harvard cy’ubuzima no kwita ku bidukikije avuga ko ubushakashatsi bakoze muri 2003 bwaberetse ko abenshi mu bishwe n’icyorezo SARS/SRAS (Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome) bari abafite umwuka muke kubera ko uwo bahumetse wari wanduye.
Iki cyorezo kibasiye abo muri Aziya.
Gushyuha cyane kw’ahantu hari hasanzwe ubundi hakonja mu rugero bivugwa ko ari byo byatije umurindi ukwaduka no gukwirakwira kw’imibu yakwije indwara bita Zika.
N’ubwo Zika itandura vuba nka coronavirus ariko uburyo yangiza ubwonko bw’abana batwiswe na byo biteye inkeke.
Umwana warwaye Zika akiri mu nda ya Nyina avukana umutwe muto cyane, urimo ubwonko budapima inusu.
Iyo uyu mwana adapfuye, akura afite ubwenge buke.
Abahanga bavuga ko uko umuntu agira umutwe munini ari na ko agira ubwenge bwinshi n’ubwo hari abo bitagenda gutyo!
Hari abahanga bari kwiga niba umuvuduko coronavirus ifite mu kwanduza abantu mu gihe cy’ubukonje ari nawo yagira mu gihe cy’ubushyuhe.
Hari abibwira ko mu gihe cy’ubushyuhe coronavirus itakwirakwira nk’uko ibigenza mu gihe cy’ubukonje, ariko abahanga babasaba kwirinda kuraguza umutwe!
Axios 
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abanyarwanda 342 babaga Uganda birukanyweyo bashinjwa kubanduza COVID-19
Body:
*Baje baturutse hirya no hino muri Uganda harimo na Kampala,
*Ntawakubiswe ariko bamwe bambuwe ibyabo,
*Bashinjwa n’abo muri Uganda kubanduza COVID-19,
*Bashyizwe mu kato kugira ngo bitabweho.
 Abanyarwanda 342  bakoreraga akazi k’ingeri nyinshi harimo n’ubucuruzi muri Uganda bari mu Rwanda nyuma y’uko ‘ngo birukanywe’ n’ingabo n’abaturage babashinja ko ari bo babazanyemo icyorezo cya coronavirus. Abakoreraga ahitwa Gahenerezo muri Kisoro muri Uganda bageze mu Rwanda ejo taliki 26, Werurwe, 2020.
Abageze mu Rwanda ejo bari 125 ubu bacumbikiwe mu kigo cy’amashuri cya Kagogo kiri mu murenge wa Kagogo muri Burera.
Bamwe muri bariya Banyarwanda bavuga ko bari basanzwe bacururiza muri Uganda, abandi bakorayo indi mirimo.
Agasanteri ka Gahenerezo kegereye cyane umupaka w’ibihugu byombi ndetse abahaturiye barisanzura bakagenderanira nk’abaturanyi.
Kugeza ubu Abanyarwanda 342 ni bo bamaze kugera mu Rwanda ariko ngo hari abandi bagikomeje kuza.
Abazanywe bose bashyizwe mu kato ahantu hatandukanye kugira ngo basuzumwe niba nta COVID-19  bafite nibayibasangana bitabweho.
Umwe muri bo wafatiwe Gahenerezo utashatse ko tumutangaza amazina avuga ko ejo (ku wa Kane taliki, 26 Werurwe, 2020) haje imodoka irimo abasirikare ba Uganda, babambura ibyo bacuruzaga birimo ibikoresho bitanga amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire y’izuba, bababwira ko bataha iwabo, ko ari bo bari kubazanira Coronavirus.
Yemeza ko n’abandi Banyarwanda bajyagayo basubizwaga inyuma shishitabona bababwira ko baje kubanduza COVID-19.
Undi mugore uri muri aba batashye ejo, avuga ko hari bamwe muri bo bakubiswe abandi bacibwa amande ubundi babashyira mu modoka babazana ku mupaka.
 
Guverineri Gatabazi ati: “ Vuba aha hari ingabo za UPDF zaje hafi y’umupaka wacu..”
Umuyobozi w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Hon. Jean Marie Vianney Gatabazi yabwiye Radio Rwanda ko hari ingabo za Uganda ziherutse kuza hafi y’umupaka wa Cyanika.
Izi ngabo ngo zari mu bikorwa byo gufasha mu kwirukana Abanyarwanda.
Gov Gatabazi avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’Intara ayoboye bwatangiye kwakira bariya Banyarwanda mu ntangiriro z’iki Cyumweru.
Ati: “Hari n’abandi bagiye kuza, twabakiriye guhera mu ntangiriro z’iki cyumweru bamwe binjiriye Burera, abandi binjira Gatuna…”
Avuga ko bose bagiye bashyirwa mu kato (isolation centers) kugira ngo niba hari bamwe muri bo banduye bitabweho.
Gov Gatabazi yemeza ko uko itsinda rije ariko barishyira hamwe kugira ngo rihabwe umuganga n’abaforomo batatu cyangwa benshi bitewe n’abarigize uko bangana.
Avuga ko bagiye bashyirwa mu kato ahantu hatandukanye harimo Cyanika, Kageyo, Karambo, hafi ya za Rwesero n’ahandi.
Ndetse ngo hari zimwe muri Hotel zitabajwe. Umuyobozi w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru avuga ko bamwe mu Banyarwanda bakiriye bavuga ko birukanywe bavuye Kampala na Nakivara.
Ikibazo benshi bafite ngo ni uko nta gikoresho cyo mu rugo bafite.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Police yataye muri yombi abagaragaye bakubita umuntu ‘bunyamaswa’ ni ab’i Rubavu
Body:
UPDATE: Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Rugerero muri Rubavu aho biriya byabereye, Nkurunziza Faustin yabwiye Umuseke ko byabaye tariki 25 Werurwe 2020, ngo ‘iyo video itajya ahagaragara ntibyaru kuzamenyekana’.
Yavuze ko uriya mugabo ukubitwa yafatiwe mu rutoki rw’ ‘umukire’ uba i Rubavu mu Mugi abaturage baramuhamagara, na we atabara yitwaje abagabo b’inkorokoro, baramwadukira baramukubita.
Byabereye mu Murenge wa Rugerero, Akagari ka Rugerero, Umudugudu wa Kabarora.
Ati “Video ishobora kuba yarafashwe na ‘Boss’ uwo watanze amabwiriza yo kumuhana, ndetse akanabahagarikira.” Ati “Bamufashe saa munani (amanywa) tariki 25 Werurwe, aho guhamagara ubuyobozi bahamagara uwo Boss, atuye i Gisenyi arazamuka rero [abakire b’ubu bagendana n’ibi-geants], bahageze [bamubwira ko uriya wafashwe yananiranye, yajyanywe mu bigo by’inzererezi birananirana, bamujyana Iwawa biranga] nibwo bya bisore byamwadukiriye birakubita.”
Uyu ‘Boss’ na we ngo arashakishwa ‘uruhindu’.
Bamaze gukubita uriya mugabo, yagumye mu rutoki ahava mu rukerera ahagana saa kenda z’ijoro, “ntiyajya mu buyobozi kuko yari azi ko bamuzi ko yananiranye”.
Ati “Yaragiye yiryamira mu rugo, iyo video idakwirakwira ngo dufatanye gushakisha amakuru ntabwo byari kumenyekana.”
Umugabo wakubiswe yajyanywe kwa muganga i Gisenyi. Abamukubise hafashwe babiri muri bane bari bafashe amaguru n’amaboko, ndetse hafatwa umwe mu bashungeraga, batatu basigaye barimo abari bafashe amaboko n’uwakubitaga baracyashakishwa kimwe na Boss [ushobora kuba ari we wafashe video].
 
Inkuru ya kare: Police y’u Rwanda iratangaza ko yataye muri yombi abantu babiri muri bane bagaragaye bakubita umuntu mu mashusho yagiye asakazwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Amashusho y’abantu bane bari gukubita umugabo bivugwa ko ari umujura, ejo yiriwe asakazwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka Twitter na Whatsapp.
Muri aya mashusho, umugabo umwe aba akubita uwo muntu akoresheje ikibando kinini, akubita nta mpuhwe mu gihe haba hari abandi bamufashe amaguru n’amaboko bamutendetse mu birere.
Aba bantu bakubita uriya mugabo bivugwa ko ari umujura, baba banavuga amagambo, humvikanamo abagira bati “Ntabwo yari yanyara” undi ati “nanyara ni bwo aba azumvise (Inkoni)“ undi na we ati “arajya n’Iwawa” naho abashungereye na bo bamwe bagakubita agatwenge.
Aya mashusho yaraye ashyizwe kuri Twitter n’Umunyamakuru Angelbert Mutabaruka aherekejwe n’ubutumwa buvunyisha ko Police ikwiye kugira icyo ikora kuri bariya bantu.
Mutabaruka yagize ati “Aba bari gukubita uyu muntu baravuga Ikinyarwanda bivuze ko ari mu Rwanda nkaba numva bakwiriye gushakishwa uruhindu bagahanwa.”
Ubu butumwa yabusangije inzego zishinzwe ubutabera mu Rwanda zirimo Police y’u Rwanda, RIB, Ubushinjacyaha Bukuru na Minisiteri y’Ubutabera.
Muri iki gitondo, Police y’u Rwanda yavuze ko yataye muri yombi bamwe mu bagabo bane bagaragaye bakubita uriya mugabo.
Yagize iti “Mwakoze gutanga amakuru. Turabamenyesha ko twataye muri yombi abantu 2 muri 4 bagaragaye muri aya mashusho bakubita Niyonzima Salomon”
Abatawe muri yombi ni Niyonzima Jean Baptiste w’imyaka 30 na Bitwayiki Jean Bosco w’imyaka 37 mu gihe uwitwa Bipfakubaho Francois na Nshimiye bakiri gushakishwa.
Uyu Niyonzima Salomon wakubiswe azizwa ngo ko ari umujura, ni uwo mu murenge wa Rugerero mu karere ka Rubavu, aya mafoto yacicikanye ejo hashize harimo n’amafoto yagaragazaga bamwicaje iruhande rw’ibitoki bivugwa ko yibye.
Aba bari gukubita uyu muntu baravuga ikinyarwanda bivuze ko ari mu Rwanda nkaba numva bakwiriye gushakishwa uruhindu bagahanwa @RIB_Rw @Rwandapolice @Rwanda_Justice @ProsecutionRw @TV1Rwanda @IngabireIm @KARANGWASewase pic.twitter.com/yyap53XnND
— Mutabaruka Angeli (@AngelMutabaruka) March 26, 2020

 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: P.Kagame i Kigali kuri ‘Video Conference’ mu nama ya G20 yize kuri COVID-19
Body:
Perezida Paul Kagame i Kigali hifashishijwe uburyo bw’Ikoranabuhanga ry’iya kure buzwi nka Video Conferenze yakurikiranye inama y’ihuriro ry’Ibihugu 20 bikize ku Isi rizwi nka G20 yize ku cyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) cyugarije Isi.
Perezida Paul Kagame unayoboye Akanama k’abakuru b’ibihugu gashinzwe icyerekezo cy’Iterambere ry’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe  (AUDA-NEPAD), yakurikiranye iyi nama yicaye mu biro bye muri Village Urugwiro.
Iyi nama yakurikiranywe n’abakuru b’ibi bihugu bikize ku Isi, yari iyobowe n’umwami wa Saudi Arabia, King Salman na we wari wicaye mu ngoro ye.
Atangiza iyi nama, King Salman yavuze ko iki cyorezo cyugarije Isi kinakeneye imbara z’Isi yose kugira ngo gihashywe bityo ko abakuru b’ibihugu bikomeye baterejweho umusanzu ukomeye muri uru rugamba.
Ati “Isi iduhanze amaso, mureke dushyire hamwe dukorane kugira ngo duhangane n’iki kibazo.”
Mu itangazo ry’imyanzuro yafatiwe muri iyi nama, harimo ko abakuru b’ibi bihugu biyemeje gukora igishoboka cyose kugira ngo bahashye iki cyorezo no kurinda ubuzima bw’abatuye Isi kandi nyuma yacyo bakazashakira umuti ingaruka kizasiga zirimo ihungabana ry’ubukungu n’ibibazo by’imirimo y’abatuye Isi.
Ku mbuga Nkoranyambaga z’aba bayobozi bakomeye ku Isi, hagiye hatambuka amafoto yabo bicaye mu biro byabo bakurikiranye iriya nama yabaye hifashishijwe iya kure.
Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Canada, Justin Trudeau uri mu kato nyuma y’uko umugore we asanzwemo ubwandu bwa COVID-19, yakurikiranye iyi nama ari iwe mu rugo.
Mu gihe abandi bakuru b’ibihugu bikomeye ku Isi, nka Donald Trump wa USA na  Xi Jinping w’Ubushinwa bo bakurikiranye iyi nama bari mu biro byabo.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Barambaza ngo abakora ibyaha mwabafunga? Ubwo se ntibarwara Corona… – CP. Kabera
Body:
Umuvugizi wa Police y’u Rwanda, CP. Jean Bosco KABERA mu kiganiro kihariye yagiranye n’Umuseke yasabye abaturarwanda kwirinda ibyaha muri iki gihe, by’umwihariko asaba abantu kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kuguma mu ngo. Yakebuye abibwira ko muri iyi minsi hari icyorezo cya Coronavirus uwakora icyaha atahagihanirwa, avuga ko bibeshya.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda Commissioner of Police  John Bosco Kabera avuga ko amabwiriza asaba abantu kuguma mu ngo iwabo ari bwo bwa mbere atanzwe, agasaba abantu badafite uruhushya rwo kugenda bitewe na serivise zihutirwa bagiye gutanga kubihagarika.
Hari ngo abashyira ibyapa byanditseho ‘Pass’ ku bunyabiziga bakagenda, ariko ngo abatahuwe na Polisi bagirwa inama bagasabwa gusubira mu ngo.  Ku rundi ruhande ariko abasaba kubireka kuko abazongera kubifatirwamo bazabihanirwa.
CP Kabera ati “Icyo twakwihutira cyane si ugufata, si uguhana, ahubwo ni ukwigisha. Hari abantu bagiye bafatwa babeshya barigishijwe basabwa gusubira mu ngo zabo. Burya iyo bagutahuye wabeshyaga ubwabyo ni isomo rikomeye.  Buriya uwafashwe na we aravuga ati ejo ninongera bizaba ari ikibazo.”
Yongeraho ko bitabuza ko ababigaragayemo bahanwa, ati “Mwumva abacibwa amande, ariko ntabwo dushaka ko bigera n’aho gufungwa. Abantu benshi bakunze kumbaza ngo ariko ubundi abantu bakora ibyaha muri iki gihe mwabafunga? Ubwo se ntibarwara Corona…Ntituzareka kubahiriza umutekano, ntituzareka gufata ibisambo, ntabwo tuzareka gufata inkozi z’ikibi, nuvuga ngo reka njye gukora icyaha kubera ko hari corona, ushobora no kuyandura, jye numva wabireka.”
CP Kabera yavuze ko hari abantu yumvise bavuga ko icyorezo cya coronavirus kireba abakire, avuga ko ababivuga biganjemo abatuye mu cyaro , ngo ubivuga wese arabeshya, anayobya abaturage kubera ko Virus itarobanura.
Ku wa 21/03/2020 Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe byasohoye itangazo ririmo amabwiriza mashya agamije kugabanya ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo cya coronavirus mu baturarwanda.
Ayo mabwiriza arimo ingamba zo gufunga imipaka mu gihe k’ibyumweru bibiri, gusaba abaturarwanda kuguma mu ngo zabo muri icyo gihe, gufunga amasoko n’amaduka uretse acuruza ibiribwa n’ibintu by’ibanze nkenerwa mu buzima.
Polisi y’u Rwanda isaba buri wese ubufatanye muri iki gihe, igasaba buri wese kubahiriza aya mabwiriza azafasha kurwanya no kurandura burundu Coronavirus.
Ku mugoroba wo ku wa kane tariki 26 Werurwe 2020, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko hagaragaye abandi barwayi ikenda barimo batanu bavuye i Dubai, undi umwe yageze mu Rwanda avuye mu Buholandi, undi yavuye muri USA, abandi babiri bandujwe n’abavanye coronavirus hanze.
Muri rusange abarwaye coronavirus mu Rwanda ni 50, bose bari kwitabwaho mu kato, kandi Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko bameze neza.
Amafoto@NKUNDINEZA 
Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: USA izaha miliyoni $15 uzatuma ita muri yombi Perezida wa Venezuela
Body:
Ibiro bya Guverinoma ya USA bishinzwe ubutabera byasohoye itangazo rigenewe Isi yose ry’uko uzayifasha guta muri yombi Perezida wa Venezuela, Nicolas Maduro izamuhemba miliyoni $15. Imushinja gukingira ikibaba abacuruza ibiyobyabwenge mu gihugu ke no muri Colombia baturanye.
Perezida Maduro yari asanzwe afite ibibazo imbere mu gihugu ke bishingiye ku bihano mu by’ubukungu Venezuela yafatiwe na USA ndetse n’imidugararo ya Politiki.
Kuba USA yafashe kiriya kemezo hari abavuga ko byerekana ko politiki ya Donald Trump yo guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Maduro akoresheje abatavuga rumwe na we nta kintu yagezeho bityo akaba atangije indi turufu.
Ni ubwa mbere USA isohoye itangazo ryo guta muri yombi Umukuru w’igihugu ukiri ku butegetsi.
Umushinjacyaha Mukuru muri USA witwa William Barr yatangaje ko igihugu ke gikurikiranye Maduro ku byaha byo gukorana n’umutwe w’ibyihebe ndetse binacuruza ibiyobyabwenge muri Colombia witwa FARC, ukinjiza ibiyobyabwenge muri USA.
Ibyo biyobyabwenge Barr avuga ko byiganjemo cocaine.
Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga wa Venezuela, Jorge Arreaza avuga ko ibyo Trump ari gukora biri mu rwego rwo kwereka Abanyamerika ko agamije ikiza kuri bo kugira ngo bazamutore.
Yemeza ko ari iturufu ariko idafatika kuko bazi neza ko ababeshya.
Abasesengura politiki ya USA muri America y’Amajyepfo bavuga ko USA nta kindi ishaka uretse gukuraho Maduro igashyiraho undi muntu uzajya ayorohereza gucukura no gutwara petelori yabo.
Venezuela ni kimwe mu bihugu ku isi  bifite petelori nyinshi mu butaka bwayo kandi itaracukurwa cyane. Iki gihugu kiri kandi mu muryango w’ibihugu bitunganya bikanacuruza petelori ku isi witwa OPEC.
USA kandi imaze igihe yarashyizeho amafaranga ku muntu wese wayifasha guta muri yombi abandi bategetsi b’i Caracas (Umurwa mukuru wa Venezuela) barimo Minisitiri w’ingabo, Vladimir Padrino Lopez, uyobora ishyaka ry’Abasosiyalisiti riri ku butegetsi witwa Diosdado Cabello, Perezida w’Urukiko rw’ikirenga, Maikel Jose Moreno Perez, aba bose USA ikaba ibashinja ruswa no kunyereza umutungo wa Leta.
Uzatuma USA ifata Diosdado Cabello ngo izamuhemba miliyoni $10.
Nicolas Maduro yabaye Perezida wa Venezuela muri 2013 nyuma y’uko inshuti ye akaba n’ikitegererezo kuri we Hugo Chavez yari amaze gupfa muri 2013.
Chavez na we ntiyacanaga uwaka na USA. Nyuma y’amatora yo muri 2018, Maduro ni we watangajwe ko yayatsinze. Yari ahanganye na Juan Guaido.
USA n’ibindi bihugu byiganjemo iby’i Burayi bw’i Burengerazuba byemeje ko Juan Guaido ari we watsinze amatora akaba ari we ‘Perezida wa Venezuela wemewe.’
Ibi ariko ntibyashobotse kuko Nicolas Maduro yagumye ku butegetsi ashyigikiwe n’u Burusiya, u Bushinwa na Cuba.
The Reuters
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga: Inzu zo mu Mudugudu w’ikitegererezo wa Cyakabiri zirava
Body:
Imiryango 20 yatujwe mu Mudugudu wa Cyakabiri, Akagari ka Remera, mu Murenge wa Kiyumba mu Karere ka Muhanga, bavuga ko inzu batujwemo ziva. Ubuyobozi buvuga ko bwatangiye gukora ubuvugizi mu nzego zibukuriye.
Iyi Miryango 20 ituye mu Mudugudu wa Cyakabiri, igizwe n’Abanyarwanda birukanywe muri Tanzania, n’abandi batishoboye bavanywe mu duce dutandukanye two mu Karere ka Muhanga.
Babwiye itangazamakuru ko iyo imvura iguye nijoro banyagirwa kuko zose ziva, izindi umuyaga ukaba waratwaye ibisenge, ba nyirazo barasembera.
Abahagaze Emmanuel umwe mu batuye hariya avuga ko hashize imyaka ibiri ari mu busembere, amabati yari asakaye inzu ye yaragurutse, babimenyesheje Ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge ariko n’ubu inzu ye ntirasakarwa.
Yagize ati: “Inzu zose zirava, abubatse uyu Mudugudu ntabwo bigeze bazirika ibisenge, muri 2015 igihe twatuzwaga ibisenge byose byavuyeho babisubijeho ntibongera kubizirika.”
Kakuze Mariam avuga ko mu myaka ishize babanje kugira ikibazo k’inzara kuko batari bafite amasambu bahingamo, iki kibazo cyarakemutse Ubuyobozi bwabahaye aho guhinga.
Ati: “Inzu zose zarahomotse tumaze igihe tubivuga, nta gisubizo baduha kandi dufite ubushobozi buke nta hantu twavana amafaranga yo gusana.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’agateganyo w’Umurenge wa Kiyumba, Nteziyaremye Germain avuga ko bakoze raporo igaragaza ikibazo izo nzu zifite, bayohereza ku Karere.
Avuga ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyatumye igikorwa cyo kubasanira kidashyirwa mu bikorwa nk’uko babyifuzaga.
Yagize ati: “Twabanje gukemura ibibazo by’ibanze bari bakeneye tubaha amasambu, abandi tubashyira muri gahunda y’abaturage bahabwa inkunga y’ingoboka, ikigiye gukurikira ni ugusana izo nzu.”
Abaturage bavuga ko nta amashanyarazi n’amazi meza bagira kandi aho intsinga zinyura ni hafi y’aho batuye, amazi y’imvura barayanywa bakanayakoresha, mu bihe by’impeshyi bavoma mu kabande.
MUHIZI ELISEE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga.

Title: Rwanda: Umubare w’abarwaye coronavirus ugeze kuri 50
Body:
*Amakuru mashya ku ndwara ya Covid-19 mu Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa kane tariki 26 Werurwe, 2020, saa yine z’ijoro Minisiteri y’ubuzima yatangaje ko habonetse abarwayi ikenda bituma umubare ugera ku bantu 50 banduye Coronavirus mu Rwanda.
Batanu baje mu Rwanda bavuye i Dubai, abandi bavuye muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za America n’u Buholande, abandi bantu babiri bandujwe n’abari bazanye icyorezo bagikuye hanze.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel yabwiye RBA ko mu gihe cya vuba bashobora gusezerera bamwe mu bari bafashwe na Coronavirus batakigaragaza ibimenyetso bya Covid-19 bakiri mu kato i Kanyinya.
Imibare y’Ishami ry’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wita ku buzima (OMS) igaragaza ko ku isi  abanduye Coronavirus ari 462,684, abagera ku 120,000 baravuwe barakira, abahitanywe n’indwara ya Covid-19 iterwa n’iriya virus bageze ku 20,834 naho icyorezo ubu kiri mu bihugu 200.
Kuri uyu wa kane Kenya iri mu karere u Rwanda rurimo yatangaje ko umurwayi wa COVID-19  wa mbere yahitanywe nayo, akaba ari umugabo w’Umunya-Kenya w’imyaka 66 yari asanzwe arwaye Diabete.
Yageze mu gihugu ke avuye muri Africa y’Epfo, aca muri Swaziland, ajyanwa mu bitaro bya Agha khan ari na ho yaguye.

UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga: Barikanga inzara nyuma y’icyorezo, ubuyobozi buti “Nitugitsinda inzara ntizatunanira”
Body:
Bamwe mu batuye mu Murenge wa Kiyumba mu Karere ka Muhanga baravuga ko ntaho bafite bavana amafaranga yo guhahisha kuko bahahaga ari uko bacuruje none bakaba batemerewe kubikora muri ibi bihe, bakavuga ko nyuma y’ibi bihe ubuzima buzaba bugoye, ubuyobozi bwo bukavuga ko igihangayikishije ari iki cyorezo.
Umubare munini w’abatuye mu Murenge wa Kiyumba, ugizwe n’abahinzi n’aborozi, bamwe mu baturage babwiye Umuseke ko amafaranga bavanaga mu bikorwa by’ubuhinzi bayashoraga mu bucuruzi bw’imyenda bavana mu Mujyi wa Muhanga.
Bakavuga ko ibitoki basaruraga babikoramo urwagwa bakarugurisha mu isoko rya Remera cyangwa mu tundi duce dutandukanye two mu Karere ka Muhanga, ubu bavuga ko basabwe gufunga ahacururizwa ibindi bitari ibiribwa kubera kwirinda COVID19.
Nizeyimana Jean Baptiste avuga ko  n’abacuruza ibiryo bashobora guhomba, kuko ababiguraga ari abacuruzaga urwagwa ubu bakaba barahagaze.
Avuga ko mbere y’uko icyorezo cya Coronavirus kiza, imodoka eshatu zajyaga kurangura ibiryo mu Mujyi wa Muhanga inshuro 3, ubu imodoka imwe yo mu bwoko bwa Fusso ari yo irangura ibiryo rimwe mu cyumweru.
Yagize ati “Ibiryo ni bike, ariko n’abafite ubushobozi bwo kubihaha ni mbarwa kubera ko aho bavanaga amafaranga hatakiriho benshi barikanga inzara.”
Umuyobozi wungirije Ushinzwe Iterambere ry’ubukungu mu Karere ka Muhanga, Kayiranga Innocent avuga ko ingamba zafashwe zigamije gukumira no kurinda abaturage Coronavirus ari zo zakomye mu nkokora imihahirane n’ingendo abaturage bakoraga bajya cyangwa bava mu bice bitandukanye by’Igihugu.
Ati “Ibijyanye n’imirimo y’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi birakomeza, gusa hubahirijwe amabwiriza yatanzwe, abacuruzaga urwagwa n’izindi nzoga bahagarare bashyire imbaraga mu bikorwa by’ubuhinzi.”
Kayiranga avuga ko abaturage nibashyira mu bikorwa amabwiriza bita ko ashobora kuzabasigira inzara, bagatsinda icyorezo n’inzara bazayitsinda ku bufatanye n’inzego za Leta.
Mber y’uko Coronavirus igera mu Rwanda, ku munsi w’isoko muri   iyi Centre ya Remera habaga hashyushye harimo abantu baza kugurisha no kurangura ibicuruzwa bitandukanye.
Ubwo twakoraga iyi Nkuru, twasanze abarema isoko ari bake gusa bubahirizaga metero imwe isabwa hagati y’umuturage n’undi ari nako ushaka kwinjira mu iduka no mu isoko yabanzaga gukaraba intoki.
MUHIZI ELISEE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga

Title: Insengero zirafunze ariko hari abazirinda, amatara aracyacanwa,…-Rutayisire ku maturo muri iki gihe
Body:
Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire uyobora Itorero rya Abangilikani Paruwasi ya Remera avuga ko atemeranya n’abanenze amatorero n’amadini ari kwaka amaturo n’icya cumi muri ibi bihe, akavuga ko nubwo insengero zifunze ariko hakiri ibikenerwa bisaba amafaranga nko kuzirinda, amatara yazo n’ibindi.
Yabivuze mu kiganiro kihariye yagiranye n’Umuseke avuga ko ashyigikiye kimwe cyagiye kigarukwaho ko amadini n’amatorero muri iki gihe akwiye gufasha abayoboke bayo basanzwe batunzwe no guca inshuro.
Avuga ko n’ubusanzwe mu itorero rye basanzwe bafite uburyo bwo gufasha abatishoboye kuko bagira amatsinda abitaho.
Ubwo insengero n’amadini byabuzwaga gukomeza amateraniro kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19, amwe mu matorero arimo na ADEPR rifite abayoboke benshi mu Rwanda yashyizeho uburyo bwo gutura burimo ubwo kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga rya Mobile Money ndetse na Banki.
Bamwe mu Banyarwanda barimo n’abasanzwe ari abayoboke muri aya madini banenze iyi myitwarire y’amatorero asaba abakristo gutura mu bihe nk’ibi abantu batava mu rugo, nka Hon Bamporiki Edouard wavuze ko ahubwo igihe nk’iki abashumba bari bakwiye gutunga intama.
Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire aganira n’Umuseke, yavuze ko abanenze ariya madini hari ibyo birengagije kuko hari ibikorwa bisanzwe bikorwa n’amatorero bikenera amafaranga kandi ko bitigeze bihagarara.
Ati “Mwibuke ko nubwo insengero zafunzwe ariko amatara aracyacanwa, amazi aracyakoreshwa kandi dufite n’abazamu duhemba, nge nshyigikiye ko amaturo akomeza gutangwa n’icyacumi kigatangwa.”
Uyu mupasiteri usanzwe anatanga ibiganiro bigakundwa na benshi, avuga ko abanenze ariya matorero hari ikindi birengagije kuko bavugaga ko muri ibi bihe abantu badakora batabona icyo batura, we akavuga ko nubwo basabwe kuguma mu rugo ariko bakomeje gukora kandi ukwezi nigushira bakazahembwa nk’ibisanzwe.
 
Muri Omega Church bo ngo abatura baribwiriza ntibabyibutswa
Pasiteri Kaligirwa Liliose Tayi uyobora OMEGA Church we avuga ko batigeze basaba abayoboke babo gutura cyangwa gutanga icya cumi kuko ubusanzwe nta muntu utura kuko yabibwirijwe.
Uyu mupasiteri uterura ko abayoboke babo na bo bagomba gutura, byumvikana ko ashyigikiye ko abakristo bakomeza gutura kabone nubwo batajya gusenga.
Ati “Ntabwo icya cumi ari icy’umushumba ahubwo ni ishimwe umuntu aha Imana. Umuntu utura cyangwa agatanga icya cumi kuko babivuze uwo ashatse yanabyihorera.”
Pasiteri Liliose avuga ko ubwo mu Rwanda hatangira ibihe nk’ibi bidasanzwe, itorero OMEGA Church ryihutiye kureba abakene bari mu itorero ndetse n’abandi basanzwe ari ba nyakabyizi kugira ngo bafashwe.
 
Muri Islamu ho basabye abayoboke gufasha abo baturanye batishoboye
Mufti w’u Rwanda, HITIMANA Salim avuga ko bo nk’idini risanzwe ryita ku batishoboye baba abo mu idini cyangwa abo hanze yaryo ari na byo bashyize imbere mu bihe nk’ibi.
Ati “Twasabye abayoboke bacu gufasha abantu baturanye badafite ibyo kurya kugira ngo na bo babone ibyo kurya.”
Mufti HITIMANA avuga kandi ko idindi ryabo na ryo rizagira icyo rikora ku bayoboke baryo ndetse n’abandi badafite aho bakura muri iki gihe.
Ati “Ntituzafasha abasilamu gusa twe tuzafasha Abanyarwanda bose bababaye.”
Ubwo amadini n’amatorero yari atangiye gushyiraho uburyo bwafasha abayoboke bayo gukomeza gutura no gutanga icya cumi, Ikigo k’Igihugu k’Imiyoborere RGB cyayasabye kubihagarika ahubwo agashyiraho uburyo bwo kwegera abakristo muri ibi bihe.
Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: PSF ivuga ko ibicuruzwa biri kwinjira nk’ibisanzwe ikizeza abaturarwanda ko bitazabura
Body:
Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda ruravuga ko nubwo u Rwanda n’Isi muri rusange biri mu bihe bidasanzwe, ibicuruzwa biri kwinjira mu gihugu nk’ibisanzwe rukizeza abaturarwanda ko bitazabura.
Ubu imipaka y’u Rwanda yaba iyo ku butaka no ku kibuga cy’Indege irafunze ku bagenderera u Rwanda rumaze kuba nyabagendwa kubera korohereza abarugenderera.
Gusa ngo ku bicuruzwa byingajemo ibisanzwe bikenerwa nk’ibiribwa birimo umuceri, isukari si ko bimeze kuko byo byakomeje kwinjira mu gihugu nk’uko bisanzwe.
Inkuru dukesha Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Itangazamakuru RBA, ivuga ko imodoka nini zisanzwe zizana ibiribwa ziva muri Tanzania ziri kwinjira mu Rwanda n’ubundi zibizanye.
Mu minsi ishize ubwo hasohoka amabwiriza ko abantu batemerewe gukora ingendo zitari ngombwa ndetse hatangazwa n’ihagarikwa ry’ingendo z’abava cyangwa abagenderera u Rwanda, abaturage bagiye mu maduka bagura ibicuruzwa byinshi ngo bitazabura batahashye.
Ibi byakurikiwe n’amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’Inganda n’Ubucuruzi yashyizeho ibipimo fatizo abaguzi batagomba kurenza kugira ngo bidashira mu maduka kandi hari abandi babikeneye.
Robert Bafakurera uyobora urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) yabwiye RBA ko nta mpungenge abantu bakwiye kugira ko ibicuruzwa basanzwe bakenera mu buzima bwa buri munsi bishobora kuzabura.
Ati “Nta gikuba cyacitse, ibintu biraza nk’uko bisanzwe biza kandi ari Leta y’u Rwanda na leta duturanye ziremera ko ibicuruzwa biza, ibicuruzwa ntabwo bizabura. Abantu rero ntibakomeze kurwanira ibintu bibwire ko bizabura biracyaza.”
By’umwihariko amara impungenge abacuruzi bazifite ko kubera ifungwa ry’imipaka rishobora kuzatuma batabona ibyo bacuruza.
Muri ibi bihe kandi hakomeje kumvikana bamwe mu bacuruzi bahanitse ibiciro bitwaje ibi bihe bidasanzwe u Rwanda rurimo rusangiye n’Isi yose.
Iri zamurwa ry’Ibiciro riri kugenda ricibwa intege n’amande ari kugenda acibwa abacuruzi barenga ku mabwiriza ya Guverinoma, kugeza ubu mu minsi icyenda (9) abazamuye ibiciro bamaze gucibwa amande ya Miliyoni 7,5 Frw.
Bapfakurera asaba aba bacuruzi kutitwikira ibi bibazo ngo bashake kubibyazamo inyungu yabo bwite.
Ati “Buri Munyarwanda ashyire mu gaciro arebe ibihe turimo ye gushakamo inyungu nyinshi kubera ibibazo dufite biri no ku isi hose ye kwibwira ko arimo gushaka inyungu ye gusa ahubwo agire gutekereza yuko ari ikibazo cyateye u Rwanda kandi dukwiye gufatanyiriza hamwe nk’abanyarwanda kugikemura.”
Abashoferi bari baturutse muri Tanzania bazanye ibicuruzwa mu Rwanda, babwiye RBA ko imodoka zizanye ibiribwa ari zo zihutirwa cyane ndetse zigapakurura zihita zisubirayo.
Bariya bashoferi bavuga ko baje nta nkomyi kuko mu muhanda harimo imodoka zipakiye imizigo gusa.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Karongi: Ni hamwe mu hagaragaye umurwayi wa Covid-19, abahatuye kuguma mu ngo barabyumva
Body:
Mu minsi ishize hari umunyamahanga wagaragayeho Covid-19 mu Mugi wa Karongi, yahise ajyanwa i Kigali mu kato, abaturage benshi iyi nkuru barayizi, kuri bo kubahiriza gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo barayumva nk’uko Umuyobozi w’Akarere, Mukarutesi Vestine yabitangarije Umuseke.
Mu gihugu hose hakomeje ubukangurambaga bwo gusaba abaturage kuguma mu ngo kugira ngo iki cyorezo gicike burundu nibura mu gihe k’ibyumweru bibiri, nyuma y’amabwiriza yasohowe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe, ategeka gufunga imipaka, kubuza ingendo hagati y’Intara ndetse no gusaba abaturarwanda kuguma mu ngo.
Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke yageze hirya no hino areba uko amabwiriza ashyirwa mu bikorwa i Karongi, bamwe batubwiye ko kuguma mu ngo ari imwe mu nzira zo kurandura icyorezo, abandi kuguma mu ngo kuri bo ngo ni ikibazo.
Mu Kagali ka Kibirizi twasanze abagabo n’abagore bigenderaga uko bisanzwe, bakajya bacungana ku jisho n’inzego z’umutekano zahageraga bakagenda, zagenda bakagaruka.
Bamwe mu bo twaganiriye barimo Karwanyi Innocent yagize ati “Nibyo twabyumvise mu makuru, ariko se ndi umukarani nta kintu cyo kurya kiri mu rugo, ntabwo nagumayo umwana n’umugore bandeba mu maso ntacyo mbaha cyo gushyira ku ziko. 
Ibyiza nagiye wenda baragira ikizere ko ntahana ihaho uko bisanzwe.”
Undi mugore twasanze ku isoko rya Kibirizi ari gukora ikiraka cyo kugosora imyaka, yatubwiye ko nta yandi mahitamo afite.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Karongi,  Mukarutesi Vestine yatubwiye ko biriwe mu bukangurambaga kandi ko ikibazo cyo kubura ibyo kurya ntawakibabwiye, ariko ko igihe cyaba gihari nk’ubuyobozi bagishakira umuti urambye aho kugira ngo abaturage bishore mu byago byo kwandura Covid-19 bananduze abandi.
Kugeza ubu muri Karongi nk’uko Mayor abyemeza, ngo habonetse Umudage wari uvuye iwabo agaragaje ibemenyetso ko arwaye ajyanwa i Kanyinya i Kigali.
 
Ibirayi i Rubengera byaragabanutse
Muri iyi minsi ikiribwa k’ibirayi ntikiri kuboneka cyane cyane mu Murenge wa Rubengera kubera ko byavaga mu Karere ka Rutsiro, ababigemura ngo barabizanye ubuyobozi barabirukana.
Kuva ubwo abagemuraga ibirayi barabihagaritse bituma ikilo kimwe kizamuka kigera kuri Frw 320.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Karongi, Mukarutesi Vestine avuga ko nta we babuza kugemura ibirayi ngo icyo babuza ni ukubigurisha bakaguma kwicara mu isoko.
Ibintu bihuza abantu benshi birimo nk’utubari, ubukwe n’ibindi birori bisa n’ibyahagaze, ariko abaturage baracyagendagenda mu nzira nubwo atari benshi nk’uko bisanzwe, ndetse intera ya metero imwe nibura hagati y’umwe n’undi ntibayubahiriza, rimwe na rimwe ugasanga hari n’abari gusoma ku kagwa mu ntoki.
Sylvain NGOBOKA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Mu minsi 9 abazamuye ibiciro bamaze gucibwa amande ya miliyoni 7,5Frw
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda iratangaza ko kuva tariki ya 17 Werurwe kugeza tariki ya 25 Werurwe 2020, ibigo by’ubucuruzi n’abacuruzi barenze ku mabwiriza bakazamura ibiciro bamaze gucibwa amande ya miliyoni 7,5 Frw.
Iyi Minisiteri yashyize hanze itangazo rigaragaza umubare w’ibigo by’ubucuruzi byarenze ku mabwiriza yo kuzatamura ibiciro byafashwe mu igenzura ryakozwe kuva tariki ya 20-25 Werurwe 2020.
Uru rutonde rugaragaza umubare w’abacuruzi bahanwe muri buri karere, rugaragaza ko akarere ka Muhanga ari ko kagaragayemo abacuruzi barenze kuri ariya mabwiriza yo ku wa 16 Werurwe 2020.
Muri aka karere gusa haciwe amande abacuruzi 46 mu gihe abafashwe muri iri genzura bose hamwe ari 109.
Muri Muhanga, abacuruzi bafatiwe muri ririya genzura baciwe amande ya 1 065 000Frw mu gihe akarere ka Musanze kaza ku mwanya wa kabiri hahanwe abacuruzi 17 baciwe amande ya 130 000Frw.
I Nyabugoro mu karere ka Nyarugenge hafashwe abacuruzi babiri baciwe amande ya 800 000Frw mu gihe i Nyamirambo na ho mu karere ka Nyarugenge hahanwe abacuruzi barindwi baciwe amande ya 440 000 Frw.
I Kabuga mu karere ka Gasabo ho hahanwe abacuruzi batandatu baciwe amande ya 450 000 Frw mu gihe i Nyarugende hari farumasi enye zaciwe amande ya 350 000Frw.
Ahagaragara ko haciwe amande ari hasi ni Kacyiru muri Gasabo hahanwe umucuruzi umwe acibwa amande ya 50 000Frw n’i Nyarugunga muri Kicukiro na ho hahanwe umucuruzi umwe waciwe amande ya 50 000 Frw.
Minisiteri y’Inganda n’Ubucuruzi ivuga ko kuva tariki ya 17 Werurwe ubwo hatangiraga iri genzura kugeza tariki ya 25 Werurwe imaze guca amande angana na 7 550 000 Frw.
Abacuruzi bahanwe biganjemo abo mu karere ka Muhanga na Musanze kuko hombi abahanwe bamaze gucibwa amande ya 1 195 000 Frw.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: COVID-19: Kuguma mu rugo wirinda kandi wiyungura
Body:
Iyi nkuru ni igikerezo cya Niyonagize Fulgence  
Muri ibi bihe isi muri rusange yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya koronavirus ubwoko bwayo bwiswe Covid 19, imwe mu ngamba zafashwe henshi ni ukuguma mu rugo. Ni ingamba imwe mu zibuza ikwirakwizwa mu buryo bw’ihererekanywa ry’iki cyorezo. Bamwe bagowe no kuguma mu ngo, baragira irungu kuko batabimenyereye. Nyamara birashoboka, ko waguma mu rugo ukahabyaza umusaruro. 
Umukozi usanzwe, ufite akazi ke ka buri munsi akora akoresheje imashini biramworoheye gukomeza  akazi ke mu rugo. Icyamugora cyane ni ugushyira abana ku muromgo kugira ngo batamusakuriza ntakore uko bigomba. Ariko igihe afite icyo gukora ntibyamunanira gushaka ahatuje iwe akaharinda abana.
Ashobora gufunga urugi akajya mu cyumba akabibarinda. Biba byiza iyo ababwiye ko ari gukora kandi ko adashaka ko bamusagararira. Nubwo ku bana bitabura ko bajya binyabya bakaza kumuvugisha utuntu duke ariko barabimenya cyane iyo ari bakuru. Iyo hari umuto byo uyu yakwitabwaho na bakuru be cyangwa se ushinzwe kumureba usanzwe uba mu rugo cyane ko ataba yumva ibyo ari byo.
Nyamara ariko hari abandi akazi kabo gasaba kubyuka bagenda. Bakajya gutanga serivisi zabo. Abenshi barimo ba Rwiyemezamirimo bikorera mu ngeri zitandukanye. Ibyo bakora akenshi biba biri aho bakorera cyane mu migi. Ubu ntibari kumwe na byo.
Barimo kwibaza ku bucuruzi bwabo, gahunda bari bafite zapfuye, imyenda barimo amabanki cyangwa baberewemo n’ibindi.
Kuguma mu rugo kuri bo bishobora kubabera kugira agahinda, kwitekerezaho cyane, kwicwa n’irungu, kwiheba ndetse no gusa n’abarakarira ingamba zashyizweho, nyamara zitarashyizweho zigamije kubabuza gukora ahubwo ari ugufasha kudashyira mu kaga amagara y’abenegehugu.
 
Birashoboka kurwanya irungu 
Baba abafite akazi babyuka bagakora ku mashini, uwabyukaga ajya mu bikorwa bye na we ashobora kwimura imiterere y’ibyo yakoraga.
Urugero, nubwo abenshi baba mu ngo zabo ariko hari igihe baba batazi ibiziberamo umunsi ku munsi. Ni umwanya mwiza wo kubikurikirana. Birashoboka kureba niba abana bakarabye cyangwa batakarabye. Ese bakaraba ryari? Birashoboka gufata amakayi y’imikoro bajyaga bakora ukongera ukayibasubirishamo. Bibaye na ngombwa nawe ubwawe ukaba wagendera kuri bene iyo mikoro ukabakoresha iyawe.
Ibi ushobora kubiha igihe runaka. Isaha imwe mu gitondo cyangwa isaha ebyiri, ariko bikaba ibihoraho. Hari abana ibigo byagiye biha imikoro, abo rwose bayisubirishwamo. Cyane ko n’ubundi abo bana bamenyereye kuyikora mu ijoro ababyeyi batashye. Ni byiza mukoranye no ku manywa.
Ariko kwigisha abana si ugukorana na bo imikoro gusa. Nk’umuntu mukuru ni na ngombwa ko afata umwanya agasobanurira abana be ibijyanye n’iki cyorezo kiriho. Bitabujije ko baganira no ku bindi.
Ukababwira impamvu zo gukaraba intoki, n’ibyiza byabyo. Ibi iyo abana babifashe bakebura bagenzi babo cyangwa abandi kuko abana bafata imigenzo myiza bahabwa n’abakuru. Urera umwana aba arera igihugu cy’ejo hazaza. Kubabwira iby’icyo cyerezo (bijyanye n’imyaka yabo), ibyiza byo gukaraba, kutajarajara bajya hirya no hino nk’uko inzego za Leta zibisaba bituma bamenya impamvu yabyo, bakazabikurana nk’umuco wo kwitaho mu bihe nk’ibi (cyane ko bishoboka ko haba hari n’ibindi bizaza mu bihe biri imbere igihe bazaba ari bakuru).
Gusa nyine bisaba kwigisha utanga urugero, ukagumana na bo bakabona ko muri kumwe, ntubigishe ibyo udakora. Ni byiza kubwira abari mu rugo cyane abana ibiriho bitari mu rwenya. Cyane ko bishobora kugira ingaruka ku buryo babagaho. Urugero babona batabonye umugati, inyama cyangwa badatemberejwe uko bari babimenyereye bakumva impamvu yabyo n’ingaruka byagize mu muryango.
Abafite imashini mu rugo hari amasomo menshi aba kuri internet atangwa ku buntu, ku buryo byaba umwanya nwiza wo kwiyungura ubumenyi. Gusa nyine ibi bisaba kuba ufite ubumenyi kuri internet. Ariko na wo ni umwanya mwiza umuntu yafata, akiga akiyungura kuri bene ayo masomo atangwa nta kiguzi cyane ko ayo ahora kuri internet adahagarara. Abasoma hari n’ibindi byinshi basoma bibungura.
Buriya kandi urugo rwawe ni urwawe. Ufashe umwanya ukongera ukareba ibikoresho byo mu rugo, ukongera ukareba uko isuku ikorwa, ukareba imfuruka z’inzu hasi no hejuru byatuma utanga isomo ry’uko yakorwa neza mu rugo. Gusa ibyo ntiwabikora buri munsi. Ariko mbere yo kubyuka ufungura televiziyo hari byinshi biri iwawe wakora.
Hari n’abifite bafite imodoka. Uko waba utunze kose uyu mwanya si uwo kwiyemera wicaye iwawe kandi ntawe wiyemeraho. Kuba wafata imodoka ukayikorera isuku, biguha umwanya wo kunanuriramo n’ingingo.
 
Gukora siporo ni “itegeko”
Ubu kujya muri siporo rusange ntibishoboka. Ariko gukora siporo mu gitondo cyangwa nimugoroba birashoboka. Wayikorera imbere ya salon, mu busitani niba ubufite ndetse no mu cyumba cyawe birashoboka. Ibi nabyise itegeko kuko kwicara bitera guhinamirana.  Kurya udafite akandi kazi wakoze byo bikaba byatera kugira ibiro byinshi kandi utabikeneye.
Aha rero niho  mvugira ko gukora siporo ari ingenzi. Mu minota 20, 30, cyangwa isaha se bitewe n’ubushobozi bwawe, ushobora kunanura imitsi wowe n’umuryango wawe nta kindi kiguzi. Iyo ukora siporo asanzwe ayikora biroroha kumenya ngo ndakora iyi n’iyi, ariko ushobora no kujya kuri youtube kuri internet wahabona ubwoko bw’imyitozo myinshi wakora. Warangiza ukitera utuzi ukaruhuka.
Hejuru y’ibyo ariko mu rugo ni no mu muryango. Nigeze gukomoza ku kiganiro n’abana ariko buriya ni n’ikiganiro n’umuryango. Abantu bakongera bagahura bakaganira ku by’urugo, imigenzo myiza, abasenga bagasenga, abahanana bagahanana.
Si ukureba filime gusa. Ni nagombwa ko abantu barebera hamwe amakuru agezweho kuri iki cyorezo. Ibi birinda ibihuha abantu baba bahura na byo ku mbuga nkoranyambanga, bakagira amakuru y’ukuri.
Ku bagabo cyane abifite, si umwanya wo kwiyahuza inzoga cyane iyo bazitunze iwabo. Kuko icyo gihe urugo ruba akabari kimutse. Abarurimo ugasanga ahubwo bahangayikishijwe n’ururimo wiyeguriye inzoga.  Akaba ikibazo.
Birashoboka kugira umwanya wo gusoma neza kuri ako gacupa wiguriye, mu masaha atabangamye no mu buryo butabangamiye abari iwawe. Icy’ingenzi ni uko ukuba mu rugo muri ibi bihe bitaba umutwaro. Ahubwo bikongera kuzamura indangaciro zongera kubumbatira umuryango n’abawurimo.
Gusa umuntu si umuryango we gusa. Ni inshuti ze, ni n’abo bavukana uyu rero ni n’umwanya mwiza wo guhumurizanya, uhamagara abavandimwe n’inshuti, ha handi mbese muvuga no ku bitari ibyo wakoraga ubuzima bugakomeza.
Mbese muri make, igihe nk’iki ni umwanya wo kwirinda kwigunga kuko bitera izindi ngaruka.
Cyane cyane ariko, kuguma mu rugo bibonwe mu buryo bwiza, nk’umugenzo mwiza utuma tutarahura Covid-19 tukayizana iwacu tukayikongeza. Nitubikora twese, bizaduha amahirwe yo guhagarika ikwirakwizwa ryayo, maze ubuzima buzongere bukomeze.
N.B: Ibi ni bimwe mu byadufasha, si byose kandi si ibisubizo ku buryo buri muntu abayeho. Icy’ingenzi ni uko buri wese iyi minsi afite uko ayibayemo ariko yagombye gukora ibishoboka byose akayibamo neza kugira ngo azayisohokemo atari indembe.
Niyonagize Fulgence

Title: Nyamata irera, Umugi ubamo abanyonzi benshi ubu amagare yegetse mu ngo iwabo
Body:
Bamwe mu bakora akazi ko gutwara abagenzi ku magare bakorera mu mugi wa Nyamata bari kubahiriza amabwiriza mashya yashyizweho mu rwego rwo gukumira ko ubwandu bwa coronavirus bukomeza kwiyongera. Aho bari mu ngo ngo ubuzima bwabaye ihurizo kuko baryaga bavuye gukora.
Umugi wa Nyamata uri mu Karere ka Bugesera hazwi nk’ahari abakora akazi ko gutwara abagenzi ku magare cyane, ubu umugi urakeye nta gare riwurangwamo biturutse ku kuba harakajijwe ingamba zo gukumira ko coronavirus ikomeza gukwirakwira.
Ku wa kabiri ubwo twari muri uyu mugi, abakora akazi k’ubunyonzi batwara abagenzi ku igare bakoraga bakuyeho imisego ku buryo byagoraga kubatandukanya n’abandi baturage bagiye guhaha, gusa nyuma y’uko Leta itangiye kugenzura ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ingamba zashyizweho, Umugi wa Nyamata naho ingamba zarakajijwe  amabwiriza yubahirizwa ku bufatanye n’inzego z’umutekano.
Benshi mu bakora akazi ko gutwara abagenzi ku igare babaga mu Mugi bakodesha inzu bavuga ko ingamba zafashwe zo kuguma mu ngo ari uburyo bwiza bwo kwirinda, ariko ko bamwe bigiye kubabera ihurizo rikomeye mu buryo bw’imibereho.
Nsengiyumva agira ati “Uyu Mugi nawubagamo nkodesha inzu. Mfite umugore n’umwana umwe baryaga ari uko mvuye mu muhanda. Ubu ndi kubyuka nkicara mu rugo nashobewe, nibaza aho ifunguro ry’umunsi riri buve nkahabura.”
Akomeza agira ati “Ni byiza ko twirinda icyorezo nk’iki kiri kwandura vuba, ariko bigiye kuba ihurizo rikomeye kuri twe twaryaga ari uko tuvuye gupagasa.”
Mugenzi we ukiri ingaragu na we avuga ko ubu yafashe umwanzuro wo gusubira mu cyaro, kuko ngo abona kwirinda bigoye mu gihe ntaho ari bukure ifunguro.
Agira ati “Nahisemo gusubira mu cyaro. Duke nari narazigamye ngiye kudusangira n’ababyeyi aho kugira ngo ngume mu Mugi ntacyo mpakora.”
Abacuruza resitora muri uyu Mugi bahamya ko kuba abantu batemerewe gusohoka ngo bage mu mirimo y’ubushabitsi n’uyu wo gutwara abagenzi ku magare urimo, byabagizeho ingaruka ikomeye kuko bari bamwe mu bakiriya babo.
Kamana (si ryo zina rye) agira ati “Abakiriya bange ahanini wasangaga ari abanyonzi, abayede ndetse n’abandi bakora akazi ko guca inshuro. Ku munsi nakiraga abakiriya basaga 100, ariko ubu bagabanutse bagera ku 10. Na bo bari kuza urusorongo nkabarurira bakajya kubirira mu ngo zabo.”
Kuri ubu umubare w’abarwayi bamaze kugaragaza ibimenyetso by’iyi ndwara ya COVID-19 umaze kuzamuka, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abarwayi bageze kuri 41.
Dieudonne NSHIMIYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Undi muntu waje mu Rwanda avuye i Dubai yasanzwemo Coronavirus
Body:
Mu Rwanda abarwaye coronavirus bamaze kuba 41, kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 25 Werurwe, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko undi muntu umwe yiyongereye ku basanzwe barwaye iyi ndwara 40.
Uyu muntu yinjiye mu Rwanda avuye i Dubai ashyirwa mu kato akaba nyuma yaragaragaje ibimenyetso bya Covid-19.
Raporo ikorwa buri munsi n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS), igaragaza ko coronavirus abayanduye bageze 413,467 mu bihugu 197 ku Isi, imaze guhitana 18,433.

UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gicumbi: Bavuga ko aho kwicwa n’inzara wazira COVID-19
Body:
*Bakeneye kwegerwa byihariye , kuko baratekereza amafaranga kurusha ubuzima
 Kuri uyu wa 25/ Werurwe/ 2020  mu isoko rya kijyambere riri mu mujyi wa Byumba, hari urujya n’ uruza ku bazanye ibicuruzwa byabo mu isoko, ariko kubahiriza  amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Corona Virus  harimo guhana intera byibura ya metero imwe hagati y’umuntu n’undi  abarirema ntibumva impamvu zabyo.
Kuwa Gatatu no kuwa Gatandatu nibwo isoko rya kijyambere mu mujyi wa Byumba rirema. Riremwa n’abantu benshi.
Kubera ko muri iyi minsi inzego z’ubuzima n’iz’umutekano zisaba abantu kudahagarara begeranye, hari bamwe mu barema isoko rya Byumba batarumva impamvu zabyo.
Umwe mu barema iri soko witwa Anastase Ngendahimana twasanze mu muryango waryo azanye igitoki, yabwiye Umuseke ko kubwira abantu ngo buri wese ahane n’undi intera ya metero ari ukubagora kuko ngo ‘n’ubundi ikizica umuntu ntaho kijya.”
Ati: “Kwirirwa batubwira ngo duhagarare muri metero imwe birabuza bamwe gucuruza.  N’ubundi icyiza kwica ntaho kijya. Gusa twamenye ko abamaze kurwara bari mu kato, ndetse n’ imodoka zazanaga abanyakigali inaha bavugwaho kwandura icyo cyorezo, barazihagaritse, ubwo se tuzahurira he nacyo!?”.
Emerance Mukansanga wo mu murenge wa Bwisige wari uje gucuruza urusenda avuga ko COVID-19 bayumva kuri Radio.
Avuga ko iriya ndwara itaragera mu Karere atuyemo.
Ati: “ Yewe nitwumva byageze inaha natwe tuzagabanya ingendo tunubahirize amategeko ariko hagati aho ntitugiye kuzicwa n’inzara.”
Avuga ko aramutse yiriwe iwabo iyo za Bwisigye atabona ikimutunga we n’umuhungu.
Minisiteri y’ ubuzima isaba buri muturage gukurikiza amabwiriza agamije gukumira icyorezo cya Covid 19, mu rwego rwo kwirinda no kurinda abandi.
Mu nama itanga harimo gukaraba intoki, kutegerana muri metero imwe, ndetse no kudakora ingendo  za hato na hato.
Ubuyobozi bw’ Akarere  ka Gicumbi buherutse kugirana ikiganiro n’ Umuseke, butangaza ko bwiteguye gusuzuma abakorera mu  bigo bitandukanye, hagamijwe gukumira icyorezo cya Corona Virus, hagati y’abikorera , abanyamadini, ndetse n’ inzego za Leta.
EVENCE NGIRABATWARE   
UMUSEKE.RW/GICUMBI

Title: UK: Igikomangoma  Charles uzayobora Commonwealth arwaye COVID-19
Body:
Aya makuru yemejwe n’Ibiro bye bitwa Clarence House. Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 71 y’amavuko yasuzumwe bigaragara ko arwaye coronavirus. Igikomangoma Charles niwe wemejwe ko azaragwa ingoma y’Ubwongereza asimbuye Nyina Elisabeth II.
Umwami cyangwa umwamikazi w’u Bwongereza niwe uyobora n’Umuryango mpuzamahanga w’ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, Commonwealth.
Ibimenyetso bya mbere by’uko yaba afite iriya virus byatangiye kugaragara ku Cyumweru, asuzumwa ku wa Mbere ariko kuri uyu wa Gatatu  nibwo byemejwe ko arwaye COVID-19.
Ibiro by’igikomangoma cyarazwe ingoma y’Ubwami bw’u Bwongereza  bivuga ko muri iki gihe ameze neza, atarembye kandi ngo yishyize mu kato ari kumwe n’umugore we muri Scotland.
Umugore we ariko ngo nta kimenyetso kiramugaragaraho kugeza ubu.
Ibizamini byo kureba niba Prince Charles afite COVID-19 byafashwe n’Ikigo cy’u Bwongereza gishinzwe ubuzima, NHS, kibifatira ahitwa Aberdeenshire.
Taliki 10. Werurwe, 2020 igikomangoma Charles yari aherutse kwakira inama mpuzamahanga yabereye mu biro bye yigaga ku ngaruka ziterwa n’ibura ry’amazi make bitewe n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere.
Iminsi ibiri nyuma y’aho yakiriya abantu bari baturutse muri Australia mu muhango wo kwishimira ko Australia(igihugu gitegekwa n’ubwami bw’u Bwongereza) yahanganye kandi igatsinda inkongi zari zimaze iminsi  zarayibasiye.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uwo munsi yari yahuye n’abandi banyacyuhahiro mu ngoro y’ibwami yitwa Buckingham Palace ariko akaba yarabasuhuje atabakozeho mu rwego rwo kwirinda COVID-19.
SkyNews
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Nyarugenge: Hari bamwe biganiriraga ‘babeshyana’ ko coronavirus idafata abato. Si byo!
Body:
Mu gihe Leta y’u Rwanda ikomeje kugenzura iyubahirizwa ry’amabwiriza yashyizweho mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, abaturage basabwa byibuze gushyira metero imwe hagati yabo igihe bagenda cyangwa bahagaze ariko bamwe ntibabyitaho. Hari abo twasanze baganira ko ‘icyorezo kidafata abato’. Ibi si byo na bo kirabafata!
Mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, ubwo Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke yarebaga uko amabwiriza ashyirwa mu bikorwa hari bamwe basa n’abatazi iyo biva n’iyo bigana.
Mu murenge wa Nyamirambo kuri 40 hari Abapolisi babaza buri wese uri mu muhanda aho agiye haba abanyamaguru ndetse n’abatwaye ibinyabiziga. Hari abo bangira gukomeza kubera impamvu zitumvikana batanze.
Mu mujyi rwagati ku nyubako ya SACCO Ejo Heza Nyarugenge hari abasore n’inkumi bagera kuri 70 wabonaga bambaye imyenda y’abashinzwe umutekano, iyi myenda yari yanditsweho IRONDO RY’UMWUGA bigaragara ko baje gushaka amafaranga kuko niyo yari imvugo baganiraga hafi ya bose.
Ntibubahiriza amabwiriza y’uko hagati y’umuntu n’undi byibuze hajyamo metero imwe mu rwego rwo kutanduza mugenzi we, wabonaga nta n’icyo bibabwiye kuko hari n’abari begeranye biganirira nko muri santimetero 30.
Cyakora mu gihe umunyamakuru yafataga amafoto haje umugabo tutamenye niba ari umuyobozi wabo ababwira ko bahana intera hagati yabo kuko umunyamakuru ari kubafotora, ntawamwitayeho bakomeje bariganirira ubona ntacyo bitayeho.
Umunyamakuru yakomeje urugendo rwerekeza ku isoko rya Nyarugenge ahamenyerewe ko harangurizwa ibyo kurya bitandukanye, hari abapakurura imodoka nini n’into (abakarani).
Hari abari mu kazi  n’abandi basa nkaho batari gukora wabonaga nta muyobozi ubarimo wababwira amabwiriza Leta yashyizeho kuko ntaho bari batandukaniye na bariya twasanze kuri SACCO.
Mu biganiro byabo hari abavugaga ko icyorezo cya coronavirus nta muntu ukiri muto wakirwara, ariko ayo makuru bafite si yo.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iheruka gutangaza mu mibare y’abarwaye coronavirus ko hari umusore w’imyaka 22 n’umwana w’amezi 10 bagaragaje ibimenyetso by’iyi ndwara.
Umunyaamakuru wo muri Zimbabwe witwa Zororo Makamba w’imyaka 30 yahitanywe na Coronavirus yamufashe ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize, bamugejeje kwa muganga arapfa.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro, inkorora no kubabara mu muhogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora kuzana umusonga, ibi byose bikaba byatera uwarwaye gupfa.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ikomeje gukangurira abaturage kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus kuko kitarabonerwa urukingo, igasaba abaturage kuguma mu ngo zabo birinda ingendo zitari ngombwa, kugira isuku no guhana intera byibuze ya metero imwe aho bari barenze umwe, kwirinda kuramukanya bahoberana no guhana ibiganza kuko ibi ari byo byakurinda kwandura iki cyorezo cyandurira mu matembabuzi ya mugenzi wawe uhumetse, cyangwa wikoze mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abarwaye Coronavirusi bagera kuri 40  kuva tariki 14 Werurwe 2020 ubwo hagaraye umurwayi wa mbere.
Ku isi abarwaye iki cyorezo bagera ku ibihumbi 380 mu bihugu 196, abagera ku bihumbi 100 bamaze gukira mu gihe ibihumbi 16 bapfuye.
Patrick Maisha/Umuseke.rw

Title: COVID-19 ije gusonga abo muri Libya
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu taliki 25, Werurwe, 2020 nibwo hemejwe ko umuntu wambere wanduye corona virus yagaragaye muri Libya. Abahanga bavuga ko Iki cyorezo kije kurushaho kuzambya ibintu muri iki gihugu giheruka amahoro kigitegekwa na Muamar Kadhaffi.
Bemeza ko kuba ari igihugu kimaze igihe mu ntambara byatumye abaganga bacyo bahunga abandi bahitanwa nayo bityo ko abarwayi ba coronavirus bazabura ababitaho.
Ubu kandi Libya itegekwa na guverinoma ebyiri:imwe ivuga ko yemewe n’Umuryango mpuzamahanga( yitwa Government of National Unity) n’indi itegekwa na Genel Khalifa Haftar .
Minisitiri w’ubuzima wa Guverinoma ivuga ko yemewe n’Umuryango mpuzamahanga Ehmed Ben Omar niwe watangaje ko hari umuntu wa mbere babonye urwaye iriya virus ariko ntiyatanga ibindi bisobanuro.
Umuyobozi w’ikigo kita ku buzima muri kiriya gihugu witwa Badreddine al-Najar avuga ko uwagaragayeho kiriya cyorezo yari aherutse kuva muri Saudi Arabia aca muri Tunisia mbere yo kugera muri Libya.
Buri ruhande muzihanganye rwari ruherutse gushyiraho zimwe mu ngamba zo gukumuria COVID-19 rutegeka ko abantu bagomba kuguma mu ngo zabo nijoro ndetse za restaurants na cafes zigafungwa.
Ibi ariko ntibyakuyeho ko intambara ikomeza kuri buri ruhande, kandi ikomeje guca ibintu mu Majyepfo y’Umurwa mukuru, Tripoli.
Hibazwa uko abagiraneza bazagera ku barwayi ba COVID-19 niramuka yibasiye benshi cyane cyane ko n’isuku muri kiriya gihugu ari nke kubera amazi make.
Kuva Gen Haftar yatangiza ibitero byo kwigarurira Tripoli mu mwaka ushize, ubu hamaze gupfa abantu barenga 1000 abandi 150 000 bavuye mu byabo.
Daily Mail
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA

Title: Rubavu: Umuyaga wasenye inzu 17 bene zo bacumbikiwe n’abaturanyi
Body:
Imvura nke ivanze n’umuyaga wa serwakira yasenye inzu 17 z’abaturage mu Murenge wa Bugeshimu Karere ka Rubavu.  Imiryango yasenyewe yacumbikiwe n’abaturanyi mu gihe ubuyobozi buvuga ko bazagobokwa vuba.
Ahagana saa munani n’igice ku wa kabiri tariki 24 Werurwe, 2020 mu karere ka Rubavu, muri Bugeshi, Akagari ka Buringo, mu Mudugudu wa Buringo imvura nke ivanze n’umuyaga wa serwakira yasenye inzu 17, yangiza ibisenge n’amabati arangirika.
Ubu abasenyewe bacumbikiwe n’abaturanyi mu gihe ubuyobozi bugishakisha uburyo bwo kubafasha, ikiza nta we cyahitanye.
Umuturanyi wa bariya wabibonye avuga ko umuyaga wa serwakira wateruye ibisenge ku bw’amahirwe ubijugunya hirya cyane, akavuga ko iyo uza kuba umuyaga usanzwe hatari kubura abo ibi bisenge bihitana.
Ati “Ntabwo byari byubatse nabi, byari biziritse ahubwo umuyaga uba ufite ingufu nyinshi kuko n’iyo ugeze ku giti urakirandura, inzu zo ziraguruka si ubwa mbere, iyo turi mu gihe k’imvura ni ko bigenda.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Bugeshi, Rwibasira Jean Bosco avuga ko iki kiza nta muturage cyahitanye uretse inzu zasenyutse cyane.
Yagize ati “Imvura yari nkeya ahubwo ni umuyaga wa serwakira wasenye inzu 17, nta kindi cyangiritse uretse ibisenge n’ibikoresho byo mu rugo, nta umuntu wahitanywe.”
Avuga ko hamaze iminsi hagwa imvura muri biriya bice.
Ikibazo ngo Umurenge wagishyikirije Akarere k’uburyo mu gihe gito abasenyewe bafashwa.
Mu Mirenge ya Bugeshi na Kabatwa byegereye ikirunga cya Karisimbi mu gihe cy’imvura imiyanga ikunda kubibasira ikangiza imyaka ndetse n’inzu.
Patrick Maisha
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Nyabugogo: Ahazwi nko Kwa Mutangana ku wa mbere abantu bari urujya n’uruza
Body:
Umuseke wageze Nyabugogo aharangurirwa ibicuruzwa bitandukanye birimo ibiribwa cyane cyane, hari bamwe mu bo mu nzego z’umutekano, ariko abantu bari urujya n’uruza ndetse bigaragara ko nta buryo bufatika bwo kurinda abantu kuba bakwanduzanya coronavirus, abantu ntibigeze basiga umwanya uhagije hagati y’umwe n’undi, bari begeranye baganira bisanzwe.
Amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe nubwo atabuza abacuruza ibiribwa gukomeza gukora, ariko abasaba kubikora mu buryo butakwirakwiza coronavirus.
Ku wa gatandatu tariki 21 Werurwe nibwo Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe byasohoye itangazo risaba abantu bose kuguma mu ngo zabo, ndetse rihagarika ingendo hagati y’Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali.
Iryo tangazo ryahise ryubahirizwa, ariko hamwe na hamwe nka Nyabugogo ntabwo ingamba zashyizwe mu bikorwa nk’uko bisabwa n’itangazo.
Bamwe mu baturage babwiye Umuseke ko Leta nitagira icyo ikora Kwa Mutangana nta kabuza Coronavirus ishobora gukomeza gukwirakwira mu bantu.
Combe HITAYEZU yabwiye Umuseke ko yatunguwe n’abantu yasanze Kwa Mutangana mu gihe yari azi ko abantu bose bari mu ngo zabo.
Uwitwa Kabalisa Fideli na we yavuze ko usibye n’abantu benshi bari Kwa Mutangana, ngo yabonye abazunguzayi bakora nk’ibisanzwe.
Ati “Ako ni akazi ka Police nitabare, abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.”
Mu Rwanda hamaze kwandura abagera kuri 36 bose bashyizwe mu kato, ndetse hashakishwa abantu bahuye na bo.
Ikibazo cy’abasohoka mu ngo bitandukanye n’amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe, byagarutsweho n’Ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali, ndetse na Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 24 Werurwe 2020 mu kiganiro bagiranye na Radio 10, bavuga ko abaturage bakwiye kumva ko ari urugamba igihugu kirimo, bakaguma mungo ibyumweru bibiri kugira ngo icyorezo kibe cyahashyijwe.
Polisi y’Igihugu yaburiye Abaturarwanda batubahiriza amabwiriza yatanzwe mu rwego rwo kugabanya ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus, ko batangira kubahana harimo kubafunga no kubaca amande.
