Title: Uganda/COVID-19: Nyuma y’umurwayi umwe, habonetse abandi 8 bose b’Abanya-Uganda
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa Uganda bwemeje ko hagaragaye abarwayi ba Coronavirus bashya umunani baje biyongera kuri undi umwe wari wabonetse ku munsi wari wabanjirije ejo hashize.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ya Uganda yatangaje ko aba barwayi bose bashya uko ari umunani ari abagande bagiye bakorera ingendo mu bihugu binyuranye byabanje kugaragaramo kiriya cyorezo.
Iyi Minisiteri ivuga ko abarwayi babiri bageze muri Uganda tariki ya 20 Werurwe 2020 bavuye i Dubai naho batandatu na bo bakaba baraje bava mu bihugu binyuranye bagiye bazanwa na sosiyete z’indege zinyuranye nka Emirates na Ethiopian.
Aba barwayi umunani baje biyongera kuri undi umwe wari wabonetse tariki ya 22 Werurwe bivuze ko ubu bahise baba ikenda (9).
U Rwanda rumaze kugira imibare myinshi kurusha ibindi bihugu bigize EAC, muri iki gihugu ubu hamaze kugaragara abarwayi 36 nyuma y’uko mu ijoro ryakeye habonetse umubare munini utarigeze uboneka mbere kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu Rwanda.
Mu gihugu cya Kenya ho ubu hamaze kugaragara abarwayi 16 basanzwemo ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Mu bihugu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda, muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na ho abarwayi bamaze kugera kuri 36 ndetse ho babiri bamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo kimaze abarenga ibihumbi 14 ku Isi yose.
Ubunyamabanga Bukuru bw’Umuryango wa Africa y’Iburasirazuba bwatangaje ko bugiye guha buri gihugu kigize uyu muryango Laboratwari ngendanwa yo kwifashisha gupima iki cyorezo gihangayikishije Isi.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Lyangombe yari imana cyangwa umugabo usanzwe?…Yazaniye ineza Abanyarwanda
Body:
Inyandiko ya Dr MUNYANSANGA Olivier/Umwarimu muri PIASS
Muri iki gihe nubwo umubare munini w’Abanyarwanda ugizwe n’abakirisito, hari imico n’imigenzo n’imiziririzo y’abakurambere bacu igikomeza kugaragara. Imico n’imyizerere gakondo imwe n’imwe yigaragaza cyane hamwe na hamwe iyo umuryango wagize ibyago bikabije, iyo havutse umwana cyangwa iyo habaye ubukwe. Ntabwo bitangaje kuko umuco n’idini gakondo ntabwo bivangurwa cyangwa ngo bitandukanywe. Mu idini gakondo havugwamo cyane Lyangombe, ese yari imana cyangwa yari umugabo usanzwe?
Lyangombe ni umuhungu wa Babinga wa Nyundo na Nyiraryangombe, yavutse ari ikinege abyarwa na Nyirakajumba. Lyangombe yabyaye abana bane aribo Binego, Ruhanga, Nyabirungu, Mashira na Kagoro. Yakomokaga mu bwoko bw’Abanyoro mu muryango witwa Abakonjo ni yo mpamvu hakunze gukoreshwa ururimi rw’igikonjo n’ababandwa, abaragura n’abaterekerera.
Yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Rwanda ku ngoma y’Umwami Ruganzu II Ndoli  (1510-1543) mu ntangiriro z’ikinyenjana cya 16 nubwo hari abavuga ko ashobora kuba yarabayeho mbere ho gato bigaterwa nuko Umwami Mashira wa Nkuba ya Sabugabo w’i Nduga azwiho ko yabandwaga.
Kuza mu Rwanda ngo yahuriye n’umwami Ruganzu mu gace ka Bukamba hafi y’ikirunga cya Muhabura, Umwami Ruganzu amwemerera kuza mu Rwanda ngo atangire yamamaze idini rye nk’uko yabikoraga mu Buganda. Lyangombe afatwa nk’umwami w’imandwa n’uw’abazimu bose. Azwiho kuba ari we watangije umuhango wo kubandwa no guterekera no kwatuza mu Rwanda. Kwatuza byari umubatizo w’icyo gihe nk’umuhango w’iyinjiradini ry’Imandwa. Ni umwe mu mihango ikomeye kandi wari wubashwe cyane.
Lyangombe ni umuntu wabayeho nk’uko byemezwa na musenyeri Alexis Kagame, ntabwo ari igishitani cyarwanyaga Imana nk’uko bamwe babivuga.  Kandi ntabwo Abanyarwanda bamusengaga nk’uko benshi babizi, ahubwo yari umuhanuzi n’umuhuza w’Abanyarwanda n’Imana, bakamuterekera bamwibuka bakanaziririza igiti cy’umuko yaguyemo akimanitsweho n’ihembe ry’imbogo, ari cyo bakunze kwita umurinzi.
Mbere yo gupfa yasabye ko uzifuza gutabarwa wese azajye yiyambaza umuzimu we. Yashizemo umwuka amaze kuraga umuhungu we witwaga Binego kumusimbura akaba umwami mushya w’Imandwa. Ibi byabereye i Kibingo ahahoze ari komini Gishamvu. Hari n’abavuga ko byabereye ku musozi wa Nyabikenke.
Icyo abakoraga umuhango wo kubandwa babaga bagamije kwari ukwinginga, gusaba, kubanda kugira ngo imana ibahe gutunga, kubyara no kuramba bicishijwe ku mukurambere Lyangombe. Uwabandwaga wese yirindaga ingeso zose zamugaragazaho umugayo, agahora akomeye yemye, akirinda ibishuko ndetse agatinyuka gusaba ubufasha mu gihe afite intege nke cyangwa hari aho yumva adashoboye.
Umwimerere w’idini ry’imandwa watumye Abanyarwanda benshi baryinjiramo ni uko Lyangombe yagaragaye ko yari umunyabwenge kandi usabana cyane. Urupfu rwe rwababaje narwo ruri mu byatumye abantu benshi binjira muri iryo dini rya gakondo. Ikindi ni uko nta robanura cyangwa ivangura iryari ryo ryose ryabaga mu kubandwa haba irishingiye ku muryango, ku bwoko, ku gitsina cyangwa ku ruhu.
Lyangombe yemeraga ko ikiremwamuntu cyose gifite uburenganzira bwo kugira amahoro n’umunezero. Imibanire y’ababanzwe yarangwaga n’ikinyabupfura, kwizerana, koroherana no kwifata, kugira ibanga n’ubuntu. Ababaga barahuriye mu mandwa, umwe yarabyaye undi mu mandwa, bagiranaga umubano w’umubyeyi n’umwana, ndetse n’abana babo bikabageraho bakamera nk’abavandimwe. Ubuvandimwe bwo mu mandwa cyari ikintu gikomeye cyahuzaga Abanyarwanda.
Uwayoboraga umuhango wo kubandwa yashoboraga kuba umugabo cyangwa umugore. Iri dini rya gakondo ryahaga abayoboke baryo amahirwe angana yo kugira umunezero ku isi. Imyemerere n’imyifatire byabo byatumaga imibanire hagati y’abantu iba myiza ndetse ikanakomeza no mu gihe umuntu atakiri ku isi yaragiye kubana na Lyangombe.
Iyo wabandwaga wemeraga kumvira no kugirwa inama n’abapfumu, byatumaga ukira indwara watejwe n’abazimu, ukarindwa n’ibindi bitero by’abazimu byashoboraga kukuzaho utategujwe. Umuntu yiringiraga umusaruro mwinshi kandi mwiza, amatungo akororoka, kubyara neza, kugira umuryango munini, guhabwa isambu, gutona ku bakurambere no gutsinda abanzi bawe ari abariho cyangwa abatakiriho.
Kubandwa byakorwaga rimwe, ukaba winjiye mu idini. Guterekera byakorwaga buri gihe kuko kwari ukwiyambaza abakurambere ngo babavuganire ku mana ariko harimo no kubagusha neza kugira ngo batabateza ibibazo. Ikindi cyakorwaga kenshi ni ukuraguza no guhanuza. Abakurambere bacu bahaga agaciro ibyabaga byavuzwe n’abapfumu n’abahanuzi. Kujya kuraguza kwari ukujya kureba umupfumu ukamugezaho gahunda zose uteganya, na we akakurebera ko bizagenda neza. Ntabwo byari ubujiji nk’uko bamwe babitekereza kwari ukwiyitaho ngo bamenye uko bahagaze muri icyo gihe no mu gihe kizaza.  Kubandwa rero byatumaga umuntu agira ibyiringiro, akumva ko arinzwe ibyago n’indi mibabaro yo mu buzima.
Kubandwa byari nk’ishuri kuko byabohoraga abantu, bakajijuka, bikabamara ubwoba mu gihe bahuye n’ibibazo kuko bumvaga barinzwe cyane. Umuntu kandi yumvaga ko afite inshingano zo kwirinda no kurinda umuryango we, akubaha abakuru cyane akirinda guhemuka no guhabanya n’ijambo yavuze cyangwa yemeye. Uwahemukaga, uwatatiraga igihango cyangwa uwamenaga ibanga ntabwo byihanganirwaga, igihano cyabyo cyari urupfu rubi ugahora mu muriro w’amakoro ari ku kirunga cya Nyiragongo.
Lyangombe rero yarapfuye, ariko abantu benshi barimo abo yaraguriye, abaturanyi be, abo mu bwoko bwe, abari bamuzi bose mu bihugu by’ibiyaga bigari mu Banyamwezi, mu Busumbwa, mu Bujinja, mu Bushubi, mu Bugufi, mu Rwanda, mu Burundi no mu Bushi, ntabwo bigeze bemera ko yapfuye. Bakomeje kubwirana ko Lyangombe atapfuye, ahubwo afite ikindi gihugu yagiyemo. Bigira inama yo guhora bamusaba ibyo bakeneye, ibimunaniye akazajya abibasabira ku mana.
 
Abifuza kumenya andi makuru yinditswe bakwisomera:
1.Simon Bizimana et Jean Baptiste Nkulikiyinka, Le culte de Ryangombe au Rwanda, Musée royal de l’Afrique centrale, Tervuren (Belgique) 2018.
2.Byanafashe Déo et Schreiber Jean Philippe, Les Religions du Rwanda: Defis, convergences et competitions, Edition de l’UNR September 2009.
3,Luc De Heusch, Mythe et société féodale. Le culte du kubandwa dans le Rwanda traditionnel, in Archives de Sociologie des Religions, 1964.
4.Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, Imizi y’u Rwanda, umutumba wa 1, 2013.
5.Bigirumwami Aloys, Imihango y’imigenzo n’iy’imiziririzo, Igitabo cya kabiri: Kuragura, guterekera, kubandwa, Nyabingi, 1968.
6.Kagame Alexis, L’historicité de Lyangombe, chef des Immandwa, 1979.
Dr MUNYANSANGA Olivier

Title: MU CYARO: Baririnda icyorezo ariko ngo gishobora gukurikirwa n’inzara itoroshye
Body:
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu karere ka Bugesera bavuga ko bafite ubwoba bw’amapfa ashobora kuzaterwa n’ingamba zashyizweho na Leta zo kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19 kuko ngo na duke bafite bari kuturya nabi kandi abacuruzi na bo bakaba bahanitse ibiciro by’ibiribwa.
Mu cyaro imirimo y’ubuhinzi irakomeje ariko na bwo abajya mu murima bagabanutse kuko basabwe kutegerana cyane ngo barashaka kubahiriza metero imwe isabwa.
Benshi mu bo twaganiriye bo mu kagari ka Kanazi mu murenge wa Nyamata basobanukiwe uburyo bwo kwirinda iki cyorezo, ariko bahuriza ku kuba ibiciro by’ibiribwa byaratumbagiye nyuma y’uko amakuru amenyekanye ko Coronavirus yageze mu Rwanda.
Hari n’abandi bari batunzwe n’imirimo yagiye ihagarikwa, bakavuga ko uru rusobe rw’ibibazo rwose rushobora kubyara amapfa mu minsi iri imbere.
Umwe muri bo agira ati “Ibiciro byazamutse abacuruzi bari kugurisha uko babyumva, ndi kujya guhaha amafaranga njyanye akambana iyanga. Ubuzima bwahagaze ku muturage, turi kurinda icyorezo ariko turi bwicwe n’inzara.”
Bavuga ko leta yakoze ibishoboka ikumira ba rusahurira mu nduru bitwikira ikibazo gihari bakuriza ibiciro, ariko ngo ntacyo byahinduye, bagasaba leta ko yarushaho gukaza ingamba harebwa uko ibiciro byagenwe bidahutazwa.
Umwe ati “Umucuruzi ari gushyiraho igiciro ashaka yitwaje ibi bihe turimo, umubare munini ugiye kwicwa n’inzara, nk’ubu umuceri waguraga 700  wamaze kugera ku 1000…”
Akomeza agira ati “Ni byo koko turi kwitwararika kugira ngo dukumire icyorezo ariko abazapfa bazize inzara ni bo benshi kuruta abazicwa nacyo (icyorezo cya coronavirus).”
Undi musaza ufite imyaka 100 avuga ko atewe inkeke n’uko na duke yari afite ashobora kuturya nabi bitewe n’uko abajura bagiye kwiyongera kubera imirimo myinshi yahagaze.
Agira ati “Hari abantu benshi baryaga ari uko bavuye guca inshuro, ntabwo warya umuntu ari kwicira isazi mu jisho,azaza agusahure na duke wari wifitiye kugira ngo na we abone amaramuko, ntacyo wakora ngo uhaze umuntu udafite akazi.”
Bamwe mu bacuruzi bafite amaduka muri kariya gace bavuga ko buriza ibiciro biturutse ku kuba nabo baba baranguye bahenzwe.
Umwe muri bo agira ati “Niba ugiye kurangura ugasanga ibiciro byiyongereye, birumvikana ko nawe ugomba guhita wongera ku giciro cyari gisanzwe, ntabwo wacuruza uhomba kandi wararanguye uhenzwe.”
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom) yasabye abaguzi n’abacuruzi kubahiriza amabwiriza y’ibiciro n’ingano y’ibihahwa umuntu yemerewe guhaha, ariko abaturage bo bavuga ko nta ntambwe iraterwa ngo abacuruzi bareke guhanika ibiciro.
Mu bugenzuzi iyi Minisiteri iherutse gukora ireba uko amabwirizwa yatanzwe ku biciro ntarengwa yubahirizwa, abarenga 54 barafashwe barahanwa, ndetse bose hamwe baciwe Miliyoni 4,3Frw.
Dieudonne NSHIMIYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Urugendo muri Kigali n’amaguru’ kuva saa 14h-17h00 – AMAFOTO
Body:
Amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe yatangiye kubahirizwa ku wa gatandatu tariki 21 Werurwe 2020, asaba Abaturarwanda kuguma mu ngo iwabo mu rwego rwo kwirinda gukwirakwiza coronavirus, imipaka irafunze ku binjira n’abasohoka uretse ku binyabiziga bitwaye ibicuruzwa, i Kigali kuva i Nyamirambo kugera mu Mujyi rwagati inzu nyinshi zirafunze, urujya n’uruza rw’abantu cyangwa umubyigano w’ibinyabiziga byarahagaze.
Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke yihaye uru rugendo agenda areba uko amabwiriza ya Minisiteri w’Intebe yubahirizwa.
I Nyamirambo ni hamwe mu hagendwa cyane, benshi bahakundira ubuzima bworoshye, muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus no kwirinda kuyikwirakwiza, benshi mu baturage bari mu ngo zabo, imihanda irakeye nta moto itamba, nta modoka icaruka.

Mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati, ahantu hamenyereweko kuba urujya n’uruza rw’abantu nta gikorwa na kimwe cyari gihari.
Kuva kuri BK kugera muri gare yo mu Mujyi nta nzu ifunguye, abantu nibake cyane.
    

Saa kumi n’imwe z’umugoroba, umwe mu bacuruza Me2U, twamusanze kwa Rubangura, avuga ko na bo batabona abakiliya ku buryo bashatse no kujya ku kazi babireka.
Ati “Byajya kugera iki gihe hari ayo maze gukorera, uyu munsi nabikiye abantu bake cyane. Ibintu bikomeje gutya byagorana, cyakora ibyumweru bibiri twabikurura.”
Mu Rwanda ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus nk’uko byatangajwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, ku wa mbere tariki 23 Werurwe habonetse abantu 17, basanga abandi 19 bituma abanduye bagera kuri 36.
Ku isi coronavirus imaze kwandura abagera ku bihumbi 300 birenga, yahitanye abasaga ibihumbi 14.
Soma amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe agamije kugabanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus

Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rwanda: Abanduye Coronavirus bageze kuri 36
Body:
Umubare w’abanduye Coronavirus mu Rwanda ugeze ku bantu 36, kuri uyu wa mbere honyine hagaragaye abanduye 17 basanga abandi 19 bapimwemo iriya ndwara mbere.
Benshi mu batangajwe kuri uyu wa mbere ni abavuye i Dubai bagera ku 9. Umuntu umwe gusa ni we wandujwe n’uwo bahuye wavuye wanduriye coronavirus hanze, abandi bose 16 binjiye mu gihugu baramaze kwandura Coronavirus.
Aba bantu bapimwe hagati ya tariki 17-20 Werurwe, 2020 bose bashyizwe mu kato hanashakishwa abo baba barahuye na bo.
Imibare mishya y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) igaragaza ko ku Isi abanduye bagera ku 334,981 habariwemo n’abavuwe bagakira, abagera ku 14,652 bahitanywe na Coronavirus, ubu icyorezo kigeze mu bihugu 190.
Leta ya Uganda mu mibare yatangaje kuri uyu wa mbere, muri icyo gihugu habonetse ubwandu bushya bw’abantu 8 bituma abarwaye Covid-19 bagera ku bantu 9 mu minsi ibiri gusa.

UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rayon irasinya amasezerano na Airtel azayinjiriza miliyoni 240 FRW
Body:
Rayon Sports na Airtel-Tigo bagiye gusinya amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu myaka itanu, abakinnyi ba Rayon bakazajya bambara ikirango cya Airtel ku kaboko nayo ikazabaha miliyoni 48Frw buri mwaka mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu.
Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Sadate Munyakazi yabwiye Radio 10 mu kiganiro cyayo cy’imikino ko amasezerano impande zombi zamaze kuyumvikanaho, akaba ari bushyirrwaho umukono kuri uyu w Mbere agatangira kubahirizwa.
Ati : “Urebye ni uko hajemo ikibazo cy’iki cyorezo twari kuba twayasinye tukanatumira itangazamakuru rikaza tukaryereka ibiyakubiyemo , ariko ntabwo byakunze.  Ndayasinyira mu biro nyoherereze abafatanyabikorwa nabo basinye ubwo turaza gutanga itangazo ry’uko byagenze nyuma.”
Tariki 01 Ukwakira 2019 iyi kipe yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe na sosiyete itwara abantu n’ibintu mu Rwanda “RITCO” .
Mu mezi atanu ashije Rayon Sports itangiye  ubu buryo imaze kubona abafanyabikorwa bagera kuri  batanu .
Airtel iraba ibaye umuterankunga wa kabiri wa Rayon Sports nyuma y’uruganda Skol  ariko ubu rutagikorana neza na Rayon Sports.
 Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Iby’uko ashakishwa na Uganda ni ibihuha, ntabwo arwaye Coronavirus -Delphine twaganiriye
Body:
Ikiganiro na Delphine
Mu kiganiro Umunyarwandakazi wanditsweho n’ibinyamakuru bitandukanye, ndetse n’Umuseke wari watangaje inkuru y’uko ashakishwa n’inzego za Uganda, yabeshyuje aya makuru avuga ko yavuye Dubai muri Gashyantare, aza guhura n’umukozi wo mu rugo rw’inshuti ye, arwaye bakeka ko ari we wamwanduje, ariko we ubu ni muzima ari ‘mu kato i Gikondo’.
Twamubajije aho iriya nkuru yavuye, ati “Nange sinakubwira aho byaturutse, uko byagenze hari umuntu twahuye uwo munsi nari navuye Dubai, Umudamu w’inshuti arantuma mujyanira ibintu iwe.
Nyuma umukozi we yaje kurwara bakeka ko ari Coronavirus, nyuma Abayobozi barababaza ngo hari umuntu waje aha wavuye hanze….”
Delphine yavuye Dubai muri Gashyantare 2020, icyo gihe amaze gushyira uriya mukozi ibyo yari yatumwe n’inshuti ye, telefoni ye yavuye ku murongo, igihe wa mukozi bahuye yari arwaye, Ubuyobozi bwo mu Rwanda bushakisha nomero ya telefoni ya Delphine irabura.
Ati “Telefoni ntiyari iriho, bafata umwirondoro w’indangamuntu, bajya iwacu aho mvuka, babaza niba mpari.  Umubyeyi yahakanye ko mpari (aho mvuka), ubwo baragenda bakomeza kunshakisha.”
Hashize umunsi umwe ibinyamakuru byitangiye kwandika inkuru ngo yarabuze. Chimp Report cyo muri Uganda cyanditse ko “hari Umunyarwandakazi woherejwe kwanduza coronavirus muri Uganda”, akaba ashakishwa n’inzego za Uganda, ariko iyi nkuru ntiyari yo.
Delphine ati “Jye ntabwo nari nabuze banshakiye aho ntari ndi. Banshakiye aho mvuka ariko nari aho ntuye.”
Nyuma ngo abo mu rugo iwabo (ababyeyi be) baramuhamagaye bamubwira ko hari abaje kumushakisha ‘ngo yaba arwaye coronavirus”.
Yabwiye Umuseke ko yari yamenye mbere amakuru y’uko uriya mukozi wo mu rugo arwaye, ariko akavuga ko atazi impamvu kuko we yabonanye na we mbere (muri Gashyantare 2020) kandi nta kibazo afite.
Ku wa gatanu w’icyumweru gishize, (tariki 20 Werurwe 2020) Delphine yasabwe n’ubuyobozi bw’aho atuye kujya kwa Muganga i Gikondo ngo bamusuzume bamenye niba ari muzima, icyo gihe yafashwe ibizamini arataha.
Ejo hashize ku cyumweru tariki 22 Werurwe, yongeye gusabwa n’ubuyobozi gusubira kwa Muganga aho yasuzumiwe agategereza ibisubizo ari “mu kato”.
 
Ibyo kujya Uganda
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko kera yigeze kujya Uganda amarayo iminsi, akaba akeka ko umubyeyi we yaba yaravuze ko yabaye Uganda ubwo yabazwaga, ariko we ngo ntabwo aherukayo.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga-Shyogwe:  Bavuga ko kutagira amazi ahagije byatiza umurindi COVID-19
Body:
Abatuye ahitwa Mu cya kabiri, i Murambi n’iMunyinya mu Kagari ka Ruli, mu Murenge wa Shyogwe bavuga ko bafite ikibazo cy’amazi  make, bakavuga ko kuba amazi ari make byatiza umurindi kwandura icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Kubera ko batuye mu cyaro kandi bakaba babona amazi nyuma y’iminsi ibiri basaba Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe isuku n’isukura kubaha amazi ya buri munsi.
Umwe mu batuye kariya gace witwa Mushimiyimana Béatha avuga ko hari ubwo WASAC  yohereza amazi nijoro baryamye, bugaca ntayo ahari.
Ati: “Muri ibi bice amazi tuyabona rimwe na rimwe, kandi ubu bisaba ko tugira isuku idasanzwe kuko twugarijwe na coronavirus haba inaha mu Rwanda ndetse n’ahandi ku isi.”
Umuyobozi mu ishami rya WASAC rushinzwe isuku n’isukura mu Karere ka Muhanga, Kamonyi na Ngororero Sematabaro Joseph avuga ko hari umuyoboro mugari w’amazi batangiye kubaka mu Mujyi wa Muhanga, akizeza abatuye ibi bice ko  nibawurangiza  ikibazo cy’amazi make kizaba cyarangiye.
Ati: “Hari ibigega by’amazi turimo kubaka mu mujyi kuko twari dusanganywe ikigega kimwe cy’i Fatima mu Murenge wa Nyamabuye.”
Sematabaro avuga ko umuyoboro w’amazi bari basanganywe wahaga amazi abaturage bake mu myaka ishize.
Kubera ko ubu abaturage biyongereye ku buso bungana uko bwahoze, byatumye metero kibe z’amazi babona ziba nke.
Avuga ko batangiye gukemura kiriya kibazo bahereye mu mudugudu wa Gasharu mu Murenge wa Nyamabuye,  ubu bakaba bageze mu murenge wa Shyogwe.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Shyogwe Mukamutari Valérie avuga ko uyu Murenge urimo guturwa cyane kuko utuwe n’abaturage 38 000 kandi bose bakeneye ibikorwa remezo birimo n’amazi meza.
Ati: “WASAC yatwijeje ko  mu minsi mike ikibazo cy’amazi make  mu Murenge wacu kizaba cyakemutse, ubu turategereje.”
Ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge wa Shyogwe bugaragaza ko abaturage  bafite  amazi  meza bari ku gipimo cya 79%.
Amakuru atangwa na WASAC muri Muhanga avuga ko amazi agezwa muri aka karere angana na metero kibe ibihumbi bine.
Muri 2021 abatuye aka karere bazakenera byibura metero kibe ibihumbi ikenda kandi bazazihabwa n’umuyoboro uyatunganya ukanayabagezeaho uri kubakwa ahitwa i Gatenzi mu murenge wa Cyeza.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga.

Title: Abatekamutwe kuri COVID-19 bageze aho biyita abakozi World Health Organization
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’abibumbye ryita ku buzima, WHO, buraburira amahanga ko hari abantu bawiyitirira bakaka ibigo byita ku buzima n’abandi bantu ku giti cyabo amafaranga cyangwa andi makuru ashobora gukoreshwa akagira ingaruka kuri nyirayo.
Iri shami risaba ibigo bitanga serivisi mu buzima, ibihugu cyane cyane ibyo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara, kuba maso hakirindwa ko habaho gutekerwa imitwe.
Itangazo ryasohowe n’ubuyobozi bwa WHO rivuga ko amafaranga iki kigo cyaka ari agenewe gushyiraho ikigega cyo gukumira CODIV-19, icyo kigega kiswe COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.
Rigira riti: “ …Ikindi cyose babasaba gutangira amafaranga mu izina ry’Ikigo cyacu muzamenye ko ari ikinyoma kigamije kubatwarira amafaranga…”
Polisi ku isi hose hamwe n’ibigo bya Leta bishinzwe iperereza bivuga ko hari abantu bari gutekera abanti imitwe muri iki gihe icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyashegeshe benshi ku isi.
Hari abakora imiti itujuje ubuziranenge ikoreshwa mu gukura udukoko mu ntoki( Hand Sanitizers) , abavuga ko bafite umuti uvura COVID-19 n’abandi.
Inzego z’ubuzima n’iz’umutekano zisaba abaturage kwima amatwi abantu nka bariya ahubwo bagakurikiza inama zitangwa na Minisiteri z’ubuzima harimo gukaraba intoki kenshi, kwirinda kujya ahantu abantu bahurira ari benshi, kutegerana cyane, kugisha inama abashinzwe ubuzima igihe cyose umuntu yumvise ibimenyetso birimo umuriro mwinshi, kuribwa umutwe, umunaniro ukabije, inkorora n’ibindi.
ABC
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Police iributsa ko gusurana bitari ngombwa bitemewe, ubirengaho arahanwa
Body:
Police y’u Rwanda iributsa abaturarwanda kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho mu cyumweru gishize avuga ko abantu batemerewe gukora ingendo zitari ngombwa, ikavuga ko uyarengaho aba akoze icyaha aza kubihanirwa.
Mu mpera z’icyumweru twaraye dusoje, Leta y’u Rwanda yashyizweho ingamba n’amabwiriza bikomeye bigamije kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Aya mabwiriza harimo ingingo igira iti Ingingo “ingendo zitari ngombwa zibujijwe kandi gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa birabujijwe…”
Police y’u Rwanda muri iki gitondo yibukije abaturarwanda ko no gusurana bitari ngombwa bitemewe.
Mu itangazo yanyujije kuri Twitter, Police y’u Rwanda igira iti “Turabakangurira ubufatanye kuko kurenga kuri aya mabwiriza ari icyaha gihanirwa n’amategeko.”
Police y’u Rwanda ikomeza igira iti “Ingendo zitemewe zishobora gushyira abandi mu kaga ko kwandura COVIDー19, uzabifatirwamo ntazihanganirwa. Polisi y’u Rwanda yiteguye gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo izi ngamba zubahirizwe.”
Umuvugizi wa Police, CP John Bosco Kabera yavuze ko ariya mabwiriza ya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda areba buri muturarwanda kandi buri wese agaharanira kuyubuhariza 100%.
Avuga ko uru rwego rushinzwe umutekano w’abantu n’ibyabo rukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo hatagira urenga kuri ariya mabwiriza.
Ati “Abapolisi bari hirya no hino mu gihugu barakorana n’izindi nzego z’umutekano ndetse n’abayobozi ku nzego z’ibanze kugira ngo tubuze umuntu wese washaka kurenga kuri ariya mabwiriza.”
Mu mpera z’icyumweru twaraye dusoje, mu turere twa Gakenke na Musanze hafashwe abantu 53 bariho basenga mu buryo bwa rwihishwa kandi bari kumwe.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: ADEPR yashyizeho uburyo bwo gutura, Bamporiki ati “twatuye kenshi mukore mu kigega”
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’Itorere ry’Aba-Pentecoste mu Rwanda (ADEPR) bwabwiye Abayoboke baryo ko muri ibi bihe byo kudateranira mu nsengero ko hari uburyo bashobora kwifashisha batanga ituro ryabo burimo mobile Money, Airtel Money ndetse n’agasanduku kaba mu nsengero.
Itangazo ry’iri torero riri mu y’afite abayoboke benshi mu Rwanda, rivuga ko ubu buryo buje korohereza abayoboke baryo gushyigikira umurimo w’Imana.
Iri tangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’Umuvugizi w’iri torero, Rev. Ephrem Karuranga, rivuga ko nubwo abakristo batabasha guteranira hamwe mu nsengero ariko bashobora gukoresha uburyo bukurikira batanga ituro ryabo.
 
Ntimuze mu nsengero guterana ariko muze gutura!!
Uburyo bwa mbere bwo gukoresha agasanduku kaba mu rusengero bushobora kuzasaba abakristo kujya mu rusengero gutura ariko batagiye guterana.
Ni uburyo bwumvikana n’ubundi nk’ubusaba abakristo gukora urugendo bava mu rugo bakajya mu nsengero batagiye “guterana ahubwo bagiye gutura.”
Cyangwa hakaba uzengurukana agaseke mu ngo abifite bagatura.
Ingamba za Guverinoma y’u Rwanda zisaba abaturage kudakora ingendo zitari ngombwa ndetse Guverinoma yagennye ingendo zishobora kwemerwa nko kujya kwivuza, kujya guhaha, ndetse n’abatanga izi serivisi z’ibanze.
Izi ngamba zashyizweho mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, zisaba abantu kudasohoka mu rugo muri ibi bihe by’ibyumweru bibiri keretse baramutse bagenzwe na ziriya serivisi zitarimo kujya gutanga ituro.
 
Bamporiki ati “ubu abashumba bari bakwiye gutunga intama”
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Hon Bamporiki Edouard usanzwe ari umuyoboke wa ADEPR yagaragaje ko iri torero ritari rikwiye guturisha abakristo mu gihe nk’iki kuko bafite byinshi bibahangayikishije.
Mu butumwa yanyijije kuri twitter, Hon Bamporiki ati “Muri iyi minsi idasanzwe twari dukwiye gutekereza uko abashumba batunga intama, kurusha ko intama zatunga abashumba, kuko ni zo zifite intege nkeya.”
Hon Bamporiki asaba iri torero ahubwo gufasha abayoboke baryo batishoboye kuko n’ubundi amaturo bayakusanyije kenshi.
Ati “Mubyiteho aho mubona bishoboka, mufashe abakene bo mu itorero ryacu. Tumaze imyaka dutura, mukore mu kigega.”
 
Ntibikwiye mu gihe nk’iki
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga, Amb. Olivier Nduhungirehe na we wagendeye ku butumwa bwa Hon Bamporiki, yavuze ko amadini n’amatorero adakwiye kwaka abayoboke bayo amaturo mu bihe nk’ibi Isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo gikomeye.
Yagize ati “Ahubwo ayo madini yari akwiriye gushaka uburyo yafasha abayoboke bayo batakibona ikibatunga kubera COVID-19.”
Abayoboke b’amadini n’amatorero bo bagiye bagaragaza ko ntacyo bitwaye kuba batura mu bihe nk’ibi kuko ngo amafaranga batura ari ay’Imana atari ay’abashumba ndetse ko aba agiye kunganira ibikorwa bisanzwe by’amadini n’amatorero.

Martin NIYONKURU
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gusuzumisha ibinyabiziga n’ibyerekeye ibizamini bya ‘Permis’ byabaye bihagaritswe
Body:
Police y’u Rwanda iratangaza ko yabaye ihagaritse zimwe muri serivisi isanzwe itanga zirimo gusuzumisha ibinyabiziga ndetse n’izerekeye ibizamini by’impushya zo gutwara ibinyabiziga.
Uyu mwanzuro uje mu rwego rwo kubahiriza amabwiriza n’ingamba byashyizweho bigamije kwirinda ikwirakwira/zwa ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) gihangayikishije Isi.
Iri tangazo ryaraye risohotse kuri uyu wa 22 Werurwe 2020, rivuga ko izi serivisi zihagaritswe mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri.
Iki cyemezi kije gikurikira ingamba zikomeye Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize zirimo gufunga imipaka no guhagarika ingendo ziva cyangwa zerekeza mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Izi ngamba nshya zashyizwe hanze n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe zanahagaritse amasoko n’amaduka ubu hakaba hari gukora abasanzwe bacuruza ibiribwa kimwe n’inzu zicuruza imiti (Pharmacies) ndetse na Restaurant zasabwe kujya zitanga ibiribwa abakiliya bakajya kubirira mu rugo.
Kiriya cyemezo cya Minisitiri w’Intebe kandi gisaba abakozi baba aba Leta n’abo mu nzego z’abikorera, gukorera mu rugo keretse bamwe bacuruza serivisi z’ibanze zirimo iz’ubuvuzi, iza banki ndetse n’abacuruza ibiribwa.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hamaze kumenyekana abantu 19 barwaye kiriya cyorezo kiri kuzahaza Isi nyuma y’uko ejo ku cyumweru hagaragaye abandi barwayi babiri bafite ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo.
Mu kiganiro cyatambutse ku bitangazamakuru by’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’Itangazamakuru RBA, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Daniel Ngamije ejo yavuze ko bariya barwayi bari kwitabwaho kandi ko batarembye cyane ku buryo icyumba cyagenewe gushyirwamo abarembye cyane kitarakandagiramo umurwayi n’umwe.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abarya bavuye guca inshuro biragenda gute? Minisitiri Shyaka arasaba ubufatanye
Body:
Mu kiganiro cyaciye kuri Radio y’Igihugu, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu Prof.Shyaka Anastase yabajijwe ikiri bukorwe nyuma yo guhagarika ingendo zitari ngombwa haba ku binyabiziga n’abaturage ku giti cyabo, mu gihe hari benshi mu Banyarwanda barya ari uko bavuye guca inshuro. Yasabye ubufatanye, na Leta ikazagira icyo ikora.
Iki kiganiro cyarimo Prof. Shyaka ari umutumirwa kimwe na Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel ndetse na Police yari ihagarariwe, cyari kigamije gusobanura neza amabwiriza mashya yatangajwe tariki 21 Werurwe agamije guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Yagize ati “Birashoboka ko abantu bafite ubushobozi buke, biranashoboka ko hari abarya ari uko Leta yabahaye uturimo muri gahunda ya Guverinoma, iki ni ikintu kidasanzwe, ariko se uwamuhitishamo akavuga ngo uriye, cyangwa ukagenda ugakora ukanandura, cyangwa wifashe ukarya duke, ukagira uko usaranganya n’abo mwegeranye ariko ukirinda wahitamo iki?”
Yongeyeho urugero rw’undi wumva ko uwamureka akajya hanze yakorera miliyoni (Frw) atekereza ko izamugeza kure (muri ibi bihe), ariko akibaza nyuma uko byagenda igihe yaba yanduye ayo mafaranga ntayarye, akagira ikibazo akanagitera abandi.
Prof Shyaka ati “Nta we iki cyorezo kirahitana mu gihugu cyacu, nta n’uwo tubyifurije, ariko iki cyorezo gishobora no kuguhitana,  tugire amahitamo tubanje gufata nk’aho ari ikintu gikomeye dushaka gukumira koko.
Ati “Hari ibizasaba nk’igihugu gukomeza kwishakamo ibisubizo no kureba uburyo abantu baba magirirane, uburyo abantu bashobora gufatanya nk’abo baba bakeneye koko…inzego zitwegereye, inzego z’ibanze zirabimenyereye niba hari urugo runaka rubabaye koko, rudafite icyo gusamura tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo abarurimo tutabarinda coronavirus bakicwa n’inzara.”
Muri iki kiganiro hasabwe abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze gukurikirana ko ariya mabwiriza ashyirwa mu bikorwa, aho bategetse ko utubari dufunga tugafunga koko aho gufunga inzugi gusa.
Amabwiriza yatanzwe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe mu rwego rwo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, arimo gufunga imipaka ku binjira n’abasohoka, cyakora imodoka zitwaye ibiribwa zibivana cyangwa zibyinjiza mu Rwanda zemerewe kwinjira cyangwa gusohoka.
Amasoko yategetse gufungwa uretse acuruza ibiribwa n’ibintu bya nkenerwa mu buzima.
Imibare y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye (OMS) yo kuri uyu wa 22 Werurwe 2020 igaragaza ko abanduye Coronavirus bagera ku 267,013 ku isi, abo yahitanye bageze ku 11,201 yageze mu bihugu 185.
Mu Rwanda abanduye bagera kuri 17 nta we coronavirus irahitana.

UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Iran yanze inkunga ya USA igamije kuyifasha kurwanya Coronavirus
Body:
*Umuyobozi w’Ikirenga wa Iran “yashinje USA kuba ari yo yazanye icyorezo”
Umuyobozi w’Ikirenga wa Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei  yanze inkunga ya Leta zunze ubumwe za America yifuzaga kuyifasha kurwanya icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Kuri televiziyo, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei yavuze ko America ari umwanzi wa mbere w’igihugu ke, ndetse ayishinja kuba inyuma y’icyorezo, amagambo ye yemezwa na bamwe mu Bayobozi b’Ubushinwa ko America ari yo yazanye icyorezo.
Khamenei  yagize ati “Ntabwo nzi niba biriya birego koko ari ukuri, ariko kuba biriho, ni nde utekereza neza wabemerera kuzana iyo miti? Yongeraho ati “Birashoboka ko imiti yabo ari uburyo bwo gukwirakwiza birushijeho Virus.”
Umuyobozi wa Iran nubwo nta makuru afatika yahereyeho, yavuze ko iriya Virus “yakorewe Iran, ngo bakoresheje amakuru y’imiterere y’umubiri wabo bamaze igihe kirekire bashakira kubura hasi no hejuru.”
Abandi Bayobozi muri Iran bafashe inkunga ya America nko kwiyerurutsa, mu gihe yanze gukuraho ibihano byafatiwe kiriya gihugu.
Iran iri mu bihugu byashegeshwe cyane n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ni cyo gihugu kibasiwe cyane mu Burasirazuba bwo Hagati, aho imibare y’abanduye igera ku 21,600. Imibare y’abantu bapfuye igera ku 1,685.
Hari abavuga ko imibare y’abanduye n’abapfuye muri kiriya gihugu ishobora kuba iruta cyane itangazwa na Leta.
Kuri iki cyumweru tariki 22 Werurwe, Umuryango w’Abaganga batagira Imipaka (MSF) watangaje ko washyizeho Ikigo cyakira abantu 50 mu Ntara ya Isfahan muri Iran mu rwego rwo gufasha abarembye.
Uretse MSF w’Abafaransa,  Ubwongereza, Ubudage n’Ubufarasna nk’ibihugu byageneye Iran inkunga ijyanye n’ubuvuzi.
Imibare mishya ya OMS igaragaza ko abanduye Coronavirus bagera ku 267,013 ku isi, abo yahitanye bageze ku 11,201 yageze mu bihugu 185.
BBC
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Saa sita z’ijoro: Amabwiriza mashya yateye benshi guhaha, abandi barara ijoro bagenda
Body:
Amabwiriza yasohowe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe, yatangije kubahirizwa saa sita z’ijoro, arasaba abaturarwanda kuguma mu ngo zabo abakora ingendo zikaba ari izikenewe cyane, ingendo z’imodoka ziva mu Ntara zitwaye abantu ntizemewe, ndetse no gutwara abagenzi kuri moto ntebyemewe, n’imipaka irafunze, Umuseke wageze i Nyamirambo na Nyabugogo mu masaha y’igicuku tureba uko amabwiriza ashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Amafoto yafashwe icyo gihe, i Nyamirambo abantu baraye bahaha kugira ngo buke byinshi mu byo bakeneye babifite mu ngo zabo.
Bamwe mu bafite amabutiki babwiye Umuseke nta mabwiriza bahawe adasanzwe yo kurara bacuruza, ngo baraye bacuruza kuko babonye abantu babagana bashaka ibintu ari benshi nk’uko twabibwiwe n’uwitwa HAKIZIMANA Emmanuel.
Gusa n’ubwo abakiliya bari bisutse ari benshi ntawazamuye ibiciro, abaguse batubwiye ko byari ibiciro bisanzwe.
 
 
Nyabugogo hari abaraye muri gare
Umuseke wageze muri gare ya Nyabugogo, hari bamwe bari bazamuye ibiciro by’ingendo kandi amasaha yo kugenda yarenze. Kujya i Rusizi byari Frw 10000 bamwe bayishyuye, ariko biza kuba ngombwa Police itegeka ko bayasubizwa.
    
 
Imodoka ya Trinity yerekeza Tanzania yagiye saa kenda za mugitondo barayireka iragenda, nta Munyarwanda wari wemerewe kugenda hagendaga abanyamahanga gusa.
Imodoka za Volcano zari zerekeje Uganda zasabwe gusubira muri Gare Nyabugogo, abagenzi basubizwa itike yabo.
 
Amabwiriza yageze no ku tubare ntiwari kumenya ko ari muri weekend
  
 
Amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus

Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Lorenzo Sanz wabaye Perezida wa Real Madrid yahitanywe na Coronavirus
Body:
Lorenzo Sanz yapfuye ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, aguye mu bitaro, yari arwaye Coronavirus. Uyu yabaye Umuyobozi wa Real Madrid yo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere muri Espagne. 
Sanz yapfuye afite imyaka 76 y’amavuko, yayoboye Real mu mwaka wa 1995 – 2000. Icyo gihe Real Madrid yatwaye ibikombe bibiri bya Champions League.
Igikombe cya mbere ku buyobozi bwe Real Madrid yagitwaye mu 1998 itsinze Juventus ku mukino wa nyuma, hari hashize imyaka 32 idatwara iki gikombe.
Lorenzo San Duran umuhungu we yavuze iby’uru rupfu rwa Se abinyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter.
Yagize ati “Data yitabye Imana. Ntabwo yari akwiye iherezo rimeze gutya. Umwe mu bantu beza, b’intwari kandi bakoraga cyane nabonye mu buzima bwange. Umuryango we na Real Madrid ni byo yashyiraga imbere.”
Lorenzo yavuye ku buyozi bwa Real Madrid atsinzwe na Florentino Perez mu 2000, niho Real Madrid yatangiriye ibihe bishya bya “Galácticos” (gukinisha abakinnyi bahenze cyane) itangira gukoresha amafaranga menshi.
Nyuma yo gutandukana na Real Madrid, Lorenzo Sanz yaguze ikipe ya Malaga mu 2006,  aza kuyigurisha muri 2010.
Lorenzo Sanz abaye umwe mu hitanywe na Coronavirus ufite aho ahuriye n’ibikorwa bya siporo ku Isi.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: U Rwanda rwafashe ingamba zikomeye zirimo guhagarika ingendo no gufunga imipaka
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa gatandatu Leta y’u Rwanda yasohoye ingamba zikomeye zijyanye no guhagarika ikwirakwira ry’ubwandu bushya bw’icyorezo cya coronavirus, amasoko yafunzwe, moto ntizemerewe gutwara abagenzi, no kuva mu ngo nta mpamvu ntibyemewe, ikerekezo cy’ubuzima mu byumweru bibiri biri imbere kiragoye.
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga Dr.Vincent Biruta yabwiye RBA ko imipaka y’u Rwanda ifunze, cyakora ko bitewe n’uburyo imigi imwe n’imwe nka Rubavu wegeranye cyane na Goma kimwe na Rusizi wegereye Bukavu, ngo harashyirwaho uburyo abahagarariye abandi muri Koperative bajya bambuka.
Ikindi ni uko imodoka zitwaye ibicuruzwa zaba izibivanye mu Rwanda zijya hanze n’izibyinjiza zo zemerewe kugenda.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr. Ngamije Daniel we yavuze ko amasoko y’ibiribwa akomeza gukora ariko abacuruza ibintu bitihutirwa bo ngo ntibemerewe gucuruza.

 
Kuri uyu wa gatandatu nta murwayi mushya wa Coronavirus wagaragaye

Title: Musanze: Abantu 29 barimo umwana na Se bafunzwe kubera gusengera mu rugo
Body:
Amabwiriza yatanzwe na Minisiteri zitandukanye harimo iy’ubuzima  n’iy’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu abuza abaturage guhurira ari benshi ahantu hamwe mu rwego rwo kubarinda ko bakwandizanya virus ya corona. Hari abo muri Musanze babirenzeho Polisi ibata muri yombi.
Bose uko ari batatu ni Abadivantisiti bari bahuriye kwa Pasiteri witwa Eliphas Gatunguru. Abo Polisi yafashe ni Gatunguru, umuhungu we witwa Musabyimana n’undi mugore witwa Belia.
Bafatiwe mu murenge wa Gataraga.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru CIP Alexis Rugigana yabwiye Umuseke ko abantu bafashwe bose hamwe bari 29.
CIP Rugigana yibutsa abaturage kutirengagiza nkana amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’ubuzima ngo bajye gusengura hamwe kandi bishobora gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga.
Ati: “Ubutumwa ntanga ni uko nkuko Mister y’Ubuzima yabujije ko abantu guhurira ahantu ari benshi nko mu nsengero, mu butayu, mu byumba by’amasengesho n’ahandi, bagombye kubikurikiza.”
Avuga ko abazabirengaho Polisi izabafata kandi asaba inzego z’ibanze gukomeza gukorana na Polisi kugira ngo ibyemezo bya Minisiteri y’ubuzima n’iy’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu byubahirizwe.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Nyarugenge: Bafashwe bacuruza inyama nk’uko badandaza inyanya
Body:
Polisi ikorera mu karere ka Nyarugenge mu murenge wa Gitega ku wa Kane taliki 19, Werurwe, 2020 yafashe abantu bane bacuruzaga inyama z’inka mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bazidandaza ku mifungo nk’udandaza inyanya. Abafashwe bose ni abagore bakaba barafatiwe mu kagari ka Akabahizi ariho bazidandazaga.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu mujyi wa Kigali, Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Marie Goretti Umutesi avuga ko aba bagore bafashwe n’abakora irondo ry’umwuga ubwo bari bari mu kazi mu gihe cya saa moya n’igice z’umugoroba (19h30).
Ati:   “Ubwo abanyerondo bakorera muri uwo murenge bari mu kazi kabo ko gucunga umutekano nk’uko bisanzwe bageze mu mudugudu w’Ubumwe basanga abo bagore bari gucuruza izo nyama nk’uko badandaza inyanya, ibirayi cyangwa ibijumba.  Batatu muri bo bamaze kuzicuruza barindiriye mugenzi wabo wari ukizifite. Abanyerondo niko guhita bitabaza Polisi ikorera mu murenge wa Gitega irabafata.”
Abafashwe  bavuga ko izo nyama ari iziba zasigaye barangura mu ibagiro rya Nyabugogo iyo abazicuruza mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko bamaze kugura.
Izi nyama bakaba bazicururiza mu tudobo bagenda bazitembereza mu baturage bwamara kugoroba bakarema iseta cyangwa agace bazicururizaho.
CIP Umutesi yabwiye abacuruza n’abatwara inyama batabifitiye uburenganzira ko ari icyaha gihanwa n’amategeko.
Yagize ati:  “Nta muntu n’umwe wemerewe gucuruza cyangwa gutwara inyama mu buryo ubwo aribwo bwose atabifitiye uburenganzira ahabwa n’ubuyobozi bugenga imicururize n’imitwarire y’inyama.”
Yibukije abantu bose bakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bw’inyama ko bagomba kubikora babifitiye uburenganzira, ntibazitware mu buryo butemewe kandi ntibanazicuruze mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko.
Avuga  ko zigomba gutwarwa n’imodoka zabugenewe kandi zigatwarwa n’ababifitiye ibyangombwa ndetse zigacururizwa ahabugenewe hafite isuku.
CIP Umutesi asaba abaturage kwirinda kugura inyama zigurishwe muri buriya buryo kuko bigoye kwizera ubuziranenge bwazo.
Izi nyama zafashwe zahise zitabwa mu butaka  naho aba bagore bashyikirizwa urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha rukorera kuri sitasiyo ya Nyarugenge ngo bakurikiranwe.
Iteka rya Minisitiri n°013/11.30 ryo ku wa 18/11/2010 ryerekeye itwarwa n’icuruzwa ry’inyama rigaragaza ko gutwara inyama mbisi zikonjesheje zigenewe kuribwa bigomba gukorwa ku buryo zitagaragarira abahisi n’abagenzi, zigomba kuba zitwikiriye neza kandi zikarindwa izuba, imvura, ibyondo, umukungugu n’amasazi.
Ingingo ya 3 y’iri teka ivuga ko inyama mbisi, zikonjesheje zidapfunyitse zitwarwa mu binyabiziga bipfutse kandi igice izo nyama zitwarwamo kitagira aho gihurira n’umushoferi, aho inyama zitwarwa hakaba hagomba kuba hashashemo ibyuma bikoze muri “zinc” cyangwa ikintu cyose kitagwa umugese.
RNP
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Imibanire yacu na  Skol ni nka bisi yacitse feri- Perezida wa Rayon Sadate
Body:
*Ikibanza cya sitade baracyitweretse
*Ibya Skol natwe ni nka bus yacitse feri
*Yanga SC ntifite ubushobozi bwo kugura umukinnyi wa Rayon
*Rayon Sports iheruka guhemba abakinnyi muri Mutarama, 2020
*Igikombe cy’amahoro ni ‘nyirantarengwa’
Mu kiganiro Umuyozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate ahamya ko ibiganiro na Skol bimeze nk’imodoka yacitse  feri.  Ibi yabitangaze mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru kuri group ya Whatsap yitwa Ruhago yacu.
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu taliki 20 Werurwe, 2020 Perezida wa Rayon Sports Sadate Munyakazi  yagiranye ikiganiro n’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru muri rusange ndetse n’abakunzi ba Rayon by’umwihariko.
Ni ikiganiro cyamaze isaha bamubaza ibibazo byerekeranye n’ubuzima bw’ikipe bakunda.
Kimwe mu bibazo byagarutsweho na benshi ni amasezerano ya Rayon Sports n’ikigo  Skol, bakabaza aho bigeze kugira ngo yongerwe.
Mu buryo buziguye, Sadate Munyakazi yaciye amarenga ko ibintu bitameze neza hagati ya Rayon Sports na Skol.
Yagize ati:  “Amasezerano ya Rayon Sports ari mu marembera. Mbona ameze nka bisi yacitse feri. Kuva natangira kuyobora iriya kipe nta faranga ryabo turabona. Duhora tuyishyuza.”
Yemeza ko amasezerano bafitanye n’uru ruganda abemerere kuba batandukana narwo.
Uwitwa Silva amubajije  iby’umushinga wa MK Card wagombaga gufasha Rayon Sports kwiyubaka, Munyakazi yagize ati : “Iby’umushinga wa MK Card bimeze nk’umwana wavutse agakikirwa agakambakamba, kandi mbona atangiye guhagarara n’ubwo ahagarara akagwa ariko ni rwo rugendo.”
Undi witwa Dodos amubajije iby’amakuru avuga ko hari abakinnyi barimo Kimenyi na kapiteni w’iyi kipe bashobora kwerekeza muri Yanga SC yo muri Tanzania, Sadate yamushubije ko Yanga idafite ubushozi bwo kugura umukinnyi muri Rayon Sports.
Ati: “Igikombe cya Shampiyona ntabwo turakivaho, abakinnyi bo kwerekeza muri Yanga ntabo kuko Rayon Sports ntabwo ari ikipe yo kugurisha abakinnyi muri Yanga Africa. Igikombe cy’amahoro cyo ni nyirantarengwa cyo rwose abagitekereza bakibagirwe. Tuzagitwara!”
Undi yamubajije amahirwe yo kugitwara, Sadate amusubiza ko kugeza ubu angana na 50%.
Yemeza ko hagomba gushyirwamo ingufu nyinshi kugira ngo bazagitware ariko akavuga ko kugitwara biri mu byihutirwa kandi by’ingenzi ku ikipe.
Ku byereyeke kumenya aho umushinga wo kubaka Stade ya Rayon Sports ugeze, yasubije ko ikibanza cyo kuyubakamo cyabonetse ariko yirinda kuvuga aho kiri.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rusizi: Batswe amafaranga yo kubakisha ubwiherero bw’isoko babura icyo yakoreshejwe
Body:
Abarema isoko riri ku Cyambu cya Hepfu mu murenge wa  Nkanka mu karere ka Rusizi bavuga ko babangamirwa no kutagira ubwiherero kandi baratanze amafaranga yo kubwubakisha. Bisaba inzego z’ubuyobozi n’iz’umutekano kubakurikiranira iki kibazo kuko barambiwe kujya kubutira mu baturanyi. Hari abasore n’abagabo bihagarika mu Kivu…
Isoko rya Nkanka riri ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu.  iyo uririmo ureba ikirwa cya Nkombo. Uba ureba kandi n’imisozi yo muri Repubulika ya Demukarasi ya Kongo.
Abarirema baturuka mu turere  duturiye kiriya kiyaga aritwo Rubavu, Rutsiro, Karongi,  Nyamasheke, na  Rusizi.
Bahahurira kandi n’abaturanyi babo bo muri Repubulika ya Demukarasi ya Kongo.
Rirema iminsi ibiri mu cyumweru ni ukuvuga ku wa Mbere no ku wa Gatanu.
Abarirema bavuga ko nta bwiherero rusange buhari.
Muzungu Felicien umaze imyaka 15 akorera muri iri soko yagize ati: “Ubwiherero buri hano ntibukomeye. Iyo ubugiyemo uba ufite ubwoba ko  wagwamo. Tubabazwa nuko  twatanze amafaranga ngo bawudusanire ariko ntitwamenye  icyo yakoreshejwe.”
Muzungu avuga ko barambiwe kujya gutira imfunguzo mu bandi bacuruzi kandi bagombye kuba bafite ubwiherero bwabo.
Mugenzi we witwa Jacques Bigirimana ati: “ Twatanze amafaranga yo kubaka ubwiherero  ariko ntibuhari.  Iki ni ikibazo ubuyobozi bukwiriye gukurikirana , amafaranga yo gukora isuku no kubaka ubwiherero hashize nk’umwaka tuyatanze.”
Avuga ko ‘ubuyobozi bugomba gukurikirana kiriya kibazo kuko aribwo  jisho ry’umuturage.’
Undi mucuruzi utarifuje ko amazina ye atangazwa avuga ko we na bagenzi be bibaza icyo amafaranga batanga nk’amahoro akoreshwa  kikabayobera.
Avuga ko iyo ubwiherero bafite budakomeye kandi bukoreshwa n’abantu benshi.
Bamwe iyo bananiwe kwihangana ngo bategereze uwabanje mu bwiherero bahitamo kwihagarika mu mazi cyangwa mu nkengero zayo imvura yagwa ikamukana umwanda.
Yaragenekereje asanga bukoreshwa n’abantu batari munsi ya 1000 ku munsi, aba barimo Abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba DRC baza kurema ririya soko.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rusizi wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage witwa Emmanuel Nsigaye avuga ko iby’icyo kibazo ntabyo yari azi.
Ati: “Icyo kibazo rwose sinari  nkizi ariko tuzagikurikirana.”
Avuga ko mbere y’uko gikurikiranwa kigakemuka, abakoresha ririya soko bagombye gukomeza kugira isuku, uko bishoboka kose.
Nsigaye ati: “Turabasaba kwimakaza  ingamba z’isuku ziba zatanzwe.”
Nkanka ni umwe mu mirenge 18 y’akarere ka Rusizi . Ihana imbibi n’Umurenge wa Bushenge wo mu karere ka Nyamasheke.
Photos@MuhireDonatien
Donatien MUHIRE
UMUSEKE.RW/Rusizi

Title: Kenny Rogers yapfuye
Body:
Umuhanzi wo ku rwego rw’isi wamenyekanye mu njyana zigenda gahoro ariko zifasha abantu kuruhuka witwa Kenny Rogers yapfuye afite imyaka 81. Ni umuhanzi wari umuhanga cyane k’uburyo yahawe ibihembo bya Grammy Award inshuro eshatu.
Rogers yabaye icyamamare cyane mu gihe cy’imyaka 20 ni ukuvuga guhera 1970 kugeza 1980.
Abo mu muryango we bavuga ko yazize urupfu rusanzwe. Ngo si COVID -19.
Yaguye iwe ari kumwe n’abo mu muryango n’inshuti ze.
Kenneth Ray Rogers yavutse taliki 21, Kanama, 1938.Yakoraga indi  mirimo irimo ubucuruzi, gukina filimi, akandika kandi akanaririmba indirimbo.
Yari umwe mu bagize itsinda ry’ibirangirire muri muzika ryitwa Country Music Hall of Fame.
Yari azi kuririmba ariko akanacuraga guitar ya bass.
Indirimbo ze zatangiye kumenyekana cyane muri 1967 gukomeza kugeza mu myaka ya 1990.
Guhera muri 1975 yakoze muzika wenyine ariko akajya akorana rimwe na rimwe n’abandi bahanzi muri country bakomeye nka Dolly Parton na Sheena Easton ndetse na Lionel Richie.
Imwe mu ndirimbo yakoze zigakundwa kurusha izindi zose ni iyo yise ‘The Gambler’. Iyi yayikoze muri 1978.
Mu buzima bwe bwose yakoze indirimbo zirenga 120 akaba yaragurishije albums miliyoni 100 ku isi hose.
Ibi byatumye aba umwe mu bahanzi bake bagurishije album nyinshi kurusha abandi babayeho.
The Gambler

Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA

Title: Rwanda: Abanduye Coronavirus bageze kuri 17
Body:
Imibare mishya yatangajwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ku bijyanye n’ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda, abantu batandatu bashya bapimwemo iki cyorezo bituma imibare y’abarwaye Covid-19 igera ku bantu 17.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima buri joro, ahagana saa tatu batangaza uko imibare y’abanduye Coronavirus iteye mu gihugu.
Itangazo ryo kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 20 Werurwe 2020 rigaragaza ko abantu batandatu barimo abanyamahanga batatu n’Abanyarwanda batatu basanzwemo Coronavirus.

Imibare itangwa n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS/WHO) igaragaza ko abafashwe na Coronavirus ari 234,073 abagera ku 9,840 yarabahitanye, icyorezo kimaze kugera mu bihugu 177 ku Isi.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga: Abakozi bibukijwe ko gukorera mu rugo bidakuraho kubahiriza amasaha y’akazi
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Muhanga bwasabye abakozi bako, abo mu Mirenge n’abo mu Tugari ko bamwe muri bo bagomba gukorera akazi mu ngo mu rwego rwo gukomeza kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Buvuga kandi ko nubwo bazajya bakorera mu rugo ariko bazajya bubahiriza amasaha y’abakozi ba Leta asanzweho.
Iki kemezo cyashyizwe mu bikorwa kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 20 Werurwe 2020.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga, Kayitare Jacqueline yabwiye Umuseke ko muri buri Shami (Unité) ku rwego rw’Akarere hazajya hasigara umukozi umwe, abandi bose bagakorera akazi mu rugo.
Mayor Kayitare avuga abazaba bari gukorera mu rugo bazajya bakora amasaha y’akazi agenga abakozi ba Leta nk’uko bisanzwe, kandi bagatanga raporo igaragaza akazi yakoze.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’umusigire w’Umurenge wa Nyarusange, Ruzindana Fiacre avuga ko  ku rwego rw’Umurenge, hari abakozi 3 bazajya bakira abaturage bake bafite ibibazo byihutirwa.
Yagize ati “Mu bakozi 11 b’Umurenge, batatu ni bo baje ku kazi, abandi bose bari mu rugo barakorera kuri interineti.”
Ruzindana avuga ko muri buri Kagari hari umukozi umwe gusa uzajya asimburana na bagenzi be kabiri mu Cyumweru.
Habarurema Emmanuel umwe mu baturage avuga ko iki kemezo ntacyo gitwaye abaturage kuko aho kwandura Coronavirus,  bahererwa  Serivisi  mu ngo.
Yagize ati “Iyi ndwara ni icyorezo gihangayikishije isi ni ngombwa ko tuyifatira ingamba zo kuyirinda.”
Ubuyobozi bw’akarere buvuga ko iki kemezo kitara kitareba abakozi bo mu ishami ry’Ubuzima kuko ari bo bashinzwe gukurikirana gahunda yo gukangurira abaturage isuku.
Mu rwego rwo korohereza abaturage kubona serivisi, Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere n’Imirenge bwabashyiriyeho numero za buri mukozi bazajya bashakaho serivisi ndetse na Email akoresha.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga

Title: Kigali: Igenzura ry’umunsi 1 ryasize abacuruzi baciwe Miliyoni 1,6Frw kuko bazamuye ibiciro
Body:
Minisiteri y’ubucuruzi n’inganda ku bufatanye n’izindi nzego bakoze igenzura mu masoko  yo mu mujyi wa Kigali rigamije kureba niba ibyasabwe biri kubahirizwa birimo kudahanika ibiciro bitwaje icyorezo cya Coronavuris. Hari abaciwe amande ya 1 680 000 Frw.
Aba bacuruzi 24 bakorera mu mujyi wa Kigali barimo 13 bo muri Nyarugenge na bane (4) bo mu Isoko rya Kimironko mu karere ka Gasabo biganjemo abazize kutamanika ibiciro ku nzu bacururizamo kandi byarasohotse mu mabwiriza aherutse kujya hanze.
Iri genzura ryakonzwe mu masoko manini n’ahandi hakorerwa ubucuruzi mu mujyi wa Kigali, ryagaragaje ko hari abacuruzi bazamuye ibiciro ku biribwa abandi bagakoresha iminzani idafite ubuziranenge hakaba n’abandi batanga inyemezabuguzi zitajyanye n’igihe.
Iri genzura rikozwe nyuma y’uko mu Rwanda hagaragaye icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ryabanjirijwe n’amabwiriza yasohowe na Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’inganda ryerekana bimwe mu bicuruzwa n’ibiciro bitagomba kurenza.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’inganda yari yasabye abacuruzi bose kubahiriza ibikubiye mu itegeko no 35/2012 ryo ku wa 21/09/2012 rigenga ihiganwa no kurengera abaguzi, n’itegeko 35/91 ryo ku wa 5/09/1991 kuko ryavuguruwe  n’itegeko no 15/2001 ryo ku wa 28/1/2001.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yibukije abacuruzi ko uzafatwa anyuranya n’aya mategeko azahanwa n’ingingo ya 52 ndetse n’ingingo ya 55 zigize itegeko rigena ihiganwa no kurengera umuguzi.
Ivuga kandi ko mu bihano bahabwa harimo kuguhaniswa  gukurwaho  guhera kuri 5% kugeza ku 10% by’umusaruro w’ikigo cye mu mwaka ukurikiyeho cyangwa agahanishwa kwishyura amande ari hagati y’ibihumbi 20 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda  kugeza kuri miliyoni eshanu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda mu gihe umucuruzi yaba ananiwe kwerekana impapuro zigaragaza ibicuruzwa bye mu mwaka.
Minisiteri y’ubucuruzi n’inganda kandi ivuga ko nk’uko biteganywa n’ingingo ya 27 ni ya 29 y’itegeko no 35/91 ryo ku ya 5 kanama 1991 rigena imitunganyirize y’ubucuruzi bw’imbere mu gihugu, leta ishobora gutanda ihazabu y’inyongera isaba uwagaragayeho uko kunyuranya n’amategeko kwishyura inyungu yungutse ku muguzi no guhagarika ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byateye ayo makosa mu gihe cy’amazi atatu.
Bamwe mu bacuruzi bafatiwe muri biriya bikorwa by’uburiganya bahitaga basabwa gusubiza amafaranga arenga ku biciro remezo ababaga bamaze kugura bimwe mu bicuruzwa.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda ivuga ko nta mpamvu yo kuzamura ibiciro kuko ibyo bariho bacuruza baba barabiranguye mu gihe cy’amezi abiri ashize kandi baba bararanguye ku biciro bisanzwe.
Josiane UWANYIRIGIRA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: UPDATE-Kabgayi: 2 bari bashyizwe mu kato basanze nta Coronavirus bafite
Body:
UPDATE: Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Muhanga buratangaza ko ba bagabo babiri bari bashyizwe mu kato bakekwaho ko bafite ubwandu bwa Coronavirus basuzumwe bagasanga batabufite.
*Umwe wari umaze iminsi mu kato i Muhanga basanze arwaye ibicurane bisanzwe arataha
Abagabo babiri mu Bitaro bya Kabgayi bari mu kato bakekwaho indwara ya Coronavirus, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ibitaro, Dr.Nteziryayo Philippe avuga ko bategereje igisubizo k’ibizamini bafashwe.
Dr. Nteziryayo avuga ko bariya bagabo biyongera kuri mugenzi wabo na we wakekwagwaho COVID-19 ariko bamusuzumye basanga arwaye ibicurane bisanzwe.
Yavuze ko uyu munsi uriya mugabo yahise ataha ajya iwe mu rugo.
Dr. Nteziryayo avuga ko abagabo babiri bafite ibimenyetso Abaganga bahereyeho babafata ibizamini.
Yagize ati: “Ibizamini by’umuntu wa mbere dukekaho Virusi twabyohereje muri Laboratwari y’Igihugu (Kacyiru/Kigali) dutegereje ko baduha igisubizo.”
Umuyobozi w’Ibitaro bya Kabgayi yavuze ko umuntu wa kabiri ukekwaho Coronavirus muri aba bagabo babiri arimo gusuzumwa muri uyu mugoroba, abashinzwe kubyemeza ngo bazabaha igisubizo ku munsi w’ejo.
Umugabo umwe muri bariya yageze mu Bitaro bya Kabgayi ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa kane tariki 19 Werurwe, yabwiye abaturanyi be ko yakoranaga n’abanyamahanga (Abashinwa) mu Mujyi wa Kigali, agakeka ko “bashobora  kuba baramwanduje”.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga Kayitare Jacqueline yabwiye Umuseke ko bashyizeho itsinda ry’Abaganga n’Abakozi bo mu ishami ry’Ubuzima bahoraho, bakaba basimburana ijoro n’amanywa bigisha abaturage kugira umuco w’isuku, ari na ko bakurikirana ikibazo cy’abakekwaho Coronavirus kugira ngo uwo igaragayeho ajyanwe kwa muganga i Kabgayi.
Kayitare yagize ati: “Ndagira abaturage inama yo gukaraba no kwimakaza isuku, ubwo bukangurambaga bukwiye kugera ku baturage bose.”
Dr. Nteziryayo Philippe Umuyobozi w’Ibitaro bya Kabgayi avuga ko hari inyubako y’ibyumba bibiri n’ubwiherero  bateganyirije kuba bashyiramo abagaragara bakekwaho Coronavirus, gusa avuga ko mu gihe umubare w’abayikekwaho wakwiyongera batayikwirwamo.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima nirwo rwego rwemerewe gutangaza amakuru mashya ku cyorezo cya Coronavirus mu Rwanda, igaragaza ko abantu 11 ari bo bamaze gupimwamo iyo virus.
Ku gicamunsi cyo ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 20 Werurwe 2020, ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Muhanga bwatangaje ko bariya bagabo bakekwagaho kiriya cyorezo basanzwe batakirwaye.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga.

Title: Uko hari abari gukorera mu rugo n’abanyeshuri bigire mu rugo- REB
Body:
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo gishinzwe guteza imbere uburezi (REB/Rwanda Education Board), Dr Irene Ndayambaje yibukije abanyeshuri ko nubwo batashye ariko badakwiye kugenda ngo biyicarire ahubwo ko bakwiye gukomeza kwiyungura ubumenyi.
Mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, Abanyeshuri basanzwe bacumbitse mu bigo bigamo baracyuwe mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) cyari kimaze kugaragara mu Rwanda muri iyo minsi.
Iki gikorwa cyatangiriye ku banyeshuri biga mu bigo by’amashuri byo mu ntara y’Amajyepfo, Minisiteri y’Uburezi itangaza ko ubu abanyeshuri bose bamaze kugera mu rugo.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere ry’Uburezi (REB), Dr Irene Ndayambaje avuga ko kiki cyorezo cyahinduye ubuzima busanzwe bw’abatuye Isi muri rusange bityo ko “N’abashinzwe uburezi ntabwo twicaye.”
Avuga ko abanyeshuri bajya gutaha basabwe gutahana ibikoresho by’ibanze bakenera bikabafasha gukomeza kwihugura mu masomo, ndetse ubu ku ikoranabuhanga rya murandasi hakaba hariho amakusanyirizo y’ubumenyi yashyizweho amasomo yose ndetse n’integanyanyigisho byakunganira aba banyeshuri n’abarezi babo.
Hakimara kugaraga umuntu wa mbere ufite ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo mu Rwanda, Guverinoma yahise isaba abaturarwanda kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa ndetse ubu bimwe mu bigo na Minisiteri bya Leta byabaye bihagaritse ibikorwa byo kwakira ababigana.
Izi ngamba kandi zirimo no kuba abashobora gukorera mu rugo akazi basanzwe bakora, baguma mu rugo akaba ari ho buzuriza inshingano zabo.
Dr Irene Ndayambaje avuga ko ubu buryo bukwiye kuyobokwa n’abanyeshuri. Ati “Dutangiye gutekereza ngo ‘ni gute abantu bakomeza kwiga kandi baticaye imber eya mwarimu mu ishuri runaka.”
Akomeza agaruka ku ngamba ziri gufatwa na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda nk’uburyo bwo kwishyurana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, akavuga ko ubu mu bice byinshi by’igihugu bigeramo iri koranabuhanga ku buryo abanyeshuri bari mu rugo bashobora kuryifashisha bagakomeza kwiyungura ubumenyi.
Ati “Nta mpamvu rero y’uko twavuga ko uburezi bubaho gusa ari uko umuntu yicaye mu cyumba cya Groupe Scolaire runaka imbere ya mwarimu, tugomba no gutekereza kandi tukanashyira mu bikorwa ingamba z’ikoranabuhanga mu burezi.”
Agaruka ku bari mu bice bitageramo ririya koranabuhanga cyangwa abadafite amikoro yo kurigeraho, avuga ko hatekerezwa n’ubundi buryo bwakunganira ubw’Ikoranabuhanga kandi bugera kuri benshi.
Muri iki kiganiro yagiranye na Radio Flash FM yagize ati “Ese nk’iyi radiyo turi kuganira ko na yo ikurikirwa n’abantu benshi nta buryo twaganira namwe mukajya muduha n’iyo yaba iminota mirongo itanu (50) ku munsi, na Radio ishobora kwifashishwa mu kwigisha.”
Abanyeshuri bagitaha, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko iki cyemezo ari icy’ibyumweru bibiri ndetse ko n’ubundi bari bagiye kujya mu bizamini ku buryo bazasubirayo bahita babikora ubundi bagakomerezaho amasomo y’igihembwe cya kabiri.
Avuga ko igihe abanyeshuri bazasubirira ku Ishuri bose batazaba bari ku rwego rumwe kuko hazaba hari ababashije kwiyungura ubumenyi abandi bataragize ayo mahirwe bityo ko hazabanza kubaho igihe cyo kubanza kubashyira ku murongo umwe ubundi hakorwe ibizamini.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abafana ba Rayon bamaze kwitanga Miliyoni 1Frw, Sadate  ati “turashaka 20”
Body:
Abafana ba Rayon Sports bakusanyije amafaranga arenga miliyoni 1 Frw mu gikorwa cyatangajwe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe cyo gushyigikira iyi kipe mu gihe itari gukina.
Ejo hashize umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate yatanze ubutumwa busaba abakunzi b’iyi kipe kwitanga uko bifite kugira ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritse ibikorwa byinshi bihuza abantu benshi birimo n’umupira w’amaguru.
Kuva hatangazwa iyi ntabaza ya Sadate, abafana b‘iyi kipe bamaze gutanga miliyoni 1 y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Mu butumwa yanyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Sadate yavuze  abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bamaze  gutanga arenga miliyoni 1 abasaba gukomeza gufasha iyi kipe.
Yagize ati “Nyuma y’uko ejo mbasabye gutera inkunga Équipe yanyu ariyo yacu, duhereye ku giceri cy’ijana ndagira ngo mbamenyeshe ko mwakoze igikorwa gikomeye kuko mwegeranyije amafaranga 1.045.752frw mwikomere amashyi kadi igikorwa kirakomeje turashaka kugera kuri 20 millions.”
Ubusanzwe Rayon Sports amafaranga yayo menshi ikoresha mu bikorwa byayo bya buri munsi iyakura mu bafana bayo bab abitanga ndetse n’abaza kuyishyigikira ku kibuga mu mikino iba yakiriye.
Kugeza ubu ntabwo bizwi igihe shampiyona izasubukurirwa, abantu bakaba bakomeje gukangurirwa kwirinda aho bishoboka bakaguma mu rugo, mu kurinda ikwirakwiza rya COVID-19.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muri ‘One Dollar Campaign’ hari abasohotse bagarutse barabirukana ngo batanduza abandi
Body:
Bamwe mu rubyiruko baba mu nyubako izwi nka ‘One Dollar Campaign’ yubakiwe abana barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi badafite imiryango, baraye hanze buracya nyuma yo kwangirwa kwinjira ngo kugira ngo batanduza bagenzi babo icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19). Bari barenze ku mabwiriza yo kudasohoka, bo bavuga ko bari bagiye gushaka imibereho kuko hariya badahabwa byose.
Bavuga ko kuva ku cyumweru baburiwe kudakora ingendo zitari ngombwa kugira ngo birinde icyorezo icyo gihe cya Coronavirus cyari kimaze umunsi umwe kigeze mu Rwanda.
Umwe muri bo utifuje ko atangazwa, avuga ko hariya baba babagenera amafaranga y’ishuri, amafunguro ndetse n’icumbi ku buryo iyo hari ubonye akaraka yagakora kugira ngo abone n’akenda ko kwambara.
Ngo ku cyumweru habaye inama y’umuburo yo kwitwararika kugira ngo batandura ariko ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 18 Werurwe haba inama idasanzwe isaba abafite akazi kuba bagahagaritse kandi ngo hakaba hari benshi bagafite.
Umwe mu baraye barajwe hanze avuga ko batumvikanye kuri iki cyemezo kuko abayobozi bakibafatiye na bo ubwabo bataha hanze ndetse hariya bakaba bafite abakozi bo mu gikoni k’uburyo bose bashobora kubazanira iki cyorezo.
Ati “Ntabwo tuzi aho baba bagiye, barara hanze, bafite abagore, hari abakora isuku na bo baraza bakinjira bagakoropa, tuti rero ntabwo turi kubyumva ukuntu twebwe muzaduha akato mugatuma tutajya gukora kandi mwe muza n’abakora isuku n’abateka bakiza.”
Avuga ko abafite akazi banze kugahagarika batamenyesheje abakoresha babo bityo bakora ibishoboka byose basohoka mu gipangu bajya gukora nk’ibisanzwe.
Ngo ejo mu masaha yo gufata ifunguro ry’amanywa, bakoze igenzura niba bose bahari, banzura ko abasohotse bagomba kwirukanwa kuko barenze ku mabwiriza ndetse babasaba kutinjiramo ngo kuko bashobora kuba bazanye kiriya cyorezo.
Avuga ko uyu mwanzuro wo kubirukana wafashwe nijoro nko mu ma saa tanu (23h00) ku buryo byari binagoye no kubona aho bajya gucumbika muri icyo gicuku.
Ni icyemezo kitakiriwe neza na bagenzi babo basanzwe babana muri iriya nyubako bahise bagaragaza ko batakishimiye barahaguruka barakirwanya.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kinyinya, Umuhoza Rwabukumba avuga ko hariya baba hari hafunzwe, ababirenzeho bagashaka inzira zitemewe kugira ngo basohoke.
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko iki kibazo bakimumenyesheje ejo hamaze kumenyekana batanu bari basohotse aho bagarukiye bakabuzwa kwinjira kuko batazi icyo bari bazanye ariko we akagira inama ubuyobozi bwa hariya gufata umwanzuro utabangamira bariya bana.
We avuga ko atari ashyigikiye icyemezo cyo kubirukana ahubwo ko yavugaga ko niba ubuyobozi bwari bufite impungenge ko bariya basohotse bashobora kuba bazanye kiriya cyorezo baba bashyizwe ahantu bagasuzumwa ubundi bakagaruka mu buzima basanzwemo.
Uyu muyobozi w’Umurenge wa Kinyinya avuga ko mu biganiro yagiranye n’ubuyobozi bwo muri iriya nyubako akabagira inama yo gukaza ingamba zo gukomeza kwirinda nko kuba bagabanya abakozi ba hariya bataha basanzwe bataha bakagaruka.
Ubwo twandikaga iyi nkuru, twamenye andi makuru ko kuri iriya nyubako iri i Kinyinya ubu hateranye inama yo kwiga iki kibazo.
Twagerageje kuvugisha ubuyobozi bwa AERG busanzwe bufite imicungire y’iriya nyubako ntibarabasha kutwitaba, turakomeza kugerageza.
Turakomeza gukurikirana iyi nkuru…
Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Kuva Coronavirus yagera mu Rwanda bwije hatabonetse umurwayi wayo
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kane, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko nta murwayi wagaragaweho ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo mu gihe kuva yagaragara ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize nta munsi wari waciyemo hatagaragaye ufite ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo.
Kuva tariki ya 14 Werurwe, mu masaaha y’umugoroba abanyarwanda babaga bategereje kumenya amakuru agezweho kuri iki cyorezo kuko ari bwo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatambutsaga uko byifashe n’abantu baba bagaragaweho iki cyorezo cyugarije Isi.
Ku wa 14 Werurwe ubwo hagaragaraga umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus, bwarakeye ku wa 15 Werurwe hongera kugaragara abandi bantu bane barimo abanyarwanda batatu bafite kiriya cyorezo.
Naho ku wa 16 Werurwe na bwo hagaragaye abandi bantu babiri barimo Umunyarwanda n’umudage bafite ubwandu bukeye bwaho tariki ya 17 haboneka umuntu umwe.
Ku itariki ya 18 bwo hagaragaye abarwayi batatu baje biyongera ku bandi umunani bahita baba 11 ari na bo ubu bamaze kwemezwa mu Rwanda ko barwaye iki cyorezo mu gihe ejo hashize tariki ya 19 Werurwe bwo nta murwayi wagaragaye.
Bamwe mu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bagiye bagaragaza ko bishimiye aya makuru bafashe nk’ihumure kuko bishobora kuba bitanga ikizere ko ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo rishobora kutazagira ubukana buri hejuru nk’uko byagenze mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itambutsa aya makuru mashya ku bafite ubwandi bw’iki cyorezo, aya makuru anaherekezwa no kwibutsa abaturarwanda ingamba zo gukomeza kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo.
Ikigo k’igihugu cy’Ubuzima RBC cyo kivuga ko abarwayi ba COVID-19 bari kwitabwaho mu kigo nderabuzima cya Kanyinya mu mujyi wa Kigali kandi ko bakomeje kumererwa neza ndetse ko harimo abatoye ka mitende ku buryo hari ababyuka bakora imyitozi ngororamubiri aho barwariye.
