Title: Perezida Kagame yakiriye ubutumwa bwa mugenzi we Sisi wa Misiri
Body:
Perezida Paul Kagame uyu munsi yakiriye Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Misiri, Sameh Shoukry wazanye ubutumwa bwa Perezida Abdel Fattah el-Sisi w’iki gihugu.
Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu byatangaje ko Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Egypt, Sameh Shoukry yakiriwe muri Village Urugwiro uyu munsi.
Perezida Abdel Fattah el-Sisi ni we wasimbuye Perezida Paul Kagame ku mwanya wo kuyobora umuryango wa Africa Yunze Ubumwe.
Mu ntangiro za Gashyantare 2019, Perezida Kagame yahererekanyije ububasha bwo kuyobora uyu muryango waranzwe n’impinduka ubwo Kagame yari awuyoboye dore ko ari na bwo hanasinywe amasezerano y’Isoko rusange rya Africa.
Icyo gihe Perezida Kagame yizeje mugenzi we Sisi ubufatanye mu buyobozi bw’uyu muryango ushyize imbere impinduka z’umugabane wa Africa ufatwa nk’uwasigaye inyuma ugereranyije n’indi yo ku mubumbe w’Isi.
Perezida Kagame kandi yavuze ko yizeye ko mugenzi we Abdel Fattah el-Sisi azakomeza kugeza Africa mu nzira iganisha uyu mugabane ku byiza.
Muri 2017, Perezida Abdel Fattah el-Sisi yagiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda rw’iminsi ibiri anasura ibikorwa binyuranye birimo gusura urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ruri ku Gisozi mu karere ka Gasabo.
Icyo gihe ubwo yazaga mu Rwanda yanagariye na mugenzi we Perezida Kagame ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi, hanasinywa amasezerano atandukanye arimo arebana n’ishoramari.
Umubano w’ibihugu byombi ugaragara cyane mu bijyanye n’ibya gisirikare kuko u Rwanda rwohereza abasirikare muri kiriya gihugu gukurikirana amasomo n’amahugurwa yihariye.
Mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi, u Rwanda rwohereza mu Misiri ibicuruzwa byiganjemo icyayi n’ikawa bifite agaciro kagera muri miliyoni 30 USD mu gihe Misiri yo yohereza mu Rwanda ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 64 USD.
Martin NIYONKURU
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muzasengere mu rugo ariko ntimuzibagirwe gutura-Pasiteri wo mu Badivantisiti
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Intara ya Gitarama mu itorero ry’Abadivantisiti w’Umunsi wa Karindwi Pasiteri Jean Franҫois Habyarimana  yasohoye itangazo ryibutsa abayoboye b’idini kuzakurikiza gahunda yo gusengera mu ngo zabo ariko bakibuka gutura. Ngo ibyera by’Uwiteka bazabimuhe, ndetse ababishoboye bakoreshe compte( account) ya banki ariko bimugere ho.
Ingingo ya mbere itangira yibutsa abayoboke ba ririya dini kuzakurikiza inama bahabwa n’inzego za Leta, bakita ku isuku, gusengera abatuye isi muri rusange n’abamaze kugerwaho na coronavirus by’umwihariko kandi bagahindukirira Imana bakareka Satani.
Ingingo ya gatanu igira iti: “ Ku isabato buri muryango uzateranira mu rugo kandi gahunda zose nk’uko zikorwa ku munsi w’isabato zizakurikizwe( Ishuri ry’isabato, indirimbo, gutanga icyacumi n’amaturo.) Buri muryango ni itorero. Ayo maraporo azashyikirizwe abayobozi b’igihande nabo bayashyikirize umubitsi. Abatabona uko bahura n’umubitsi ariko bakabona uburyo bagera kuri banki turabaha nomero za konti mwashyiraho Ibyera by’uwiteka. Mwakoresha n’ubundi buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga.”
Abajijwe icyo ‘Ibyera by’Uwiteka’ bivuze, Pasiteri Habyarimana ati: “ Birumvikana ko ari amafaranga.”
 
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Sadate yasabye abakunzi ba Rayon kwitanga ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa na Coronavirus
Body:
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate yatanze ubutumwa busaba abakunzi b’iyi kipe kwitanga uko bifite kugira ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyatumye Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru iba ihagaze.
Mu butumwa yanyijije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Sadate yavuze ko muri ibi bihe ikipe ya Rayon Sports ikeneye imbaraga z’abakunzi bayo.
Yagize ati  “Équipe wihebeye iragukeneye burya Inshuti nyanshuti uyibona mu bihe bikomeye, Turwanye Coronavirus tunaharanira ko itadusenyera Équipe ni wowe ni njyewe bo gufasha Rayon kudasenywa na Cov 19…”
Uyu muyobozi wa Rayon Sports yakomeje asaba abakunzi bayo kwitanga uko bifite ku buryo n’ufite igiceri cya 100 Frw yatanga umusanzu we.
Ati “…utanga icyo ushoboye, kanda *610# hera ku giceri cy’i 100 uraba…”
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports itari guhirwa muri Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru iherutse guhagarikwa kubera Coronavirus, biherutse gutangazwa ko ishobora gutandukana n’umufatanyabikorwa wayo w’imena Skol.
Ubusanzwe Rayon Sports amafaranga yayo menshi ikoresha mu bikorwa byayo bya buri munsi iyakura mu bafana bayo baba abitanga ndetse n’abaza kuyishyigikira ku kibuga mu mikino iba yakiriye ku buryo bishobora kuyigora muri ibi bihe Shampiyona yahagaze kandi abakinnyi n’abayobozi bayo bakaba bakomeje guhembwa.
Kuwa kabiri w’iki cyumweru kandi, Sadate na bwo yifashishije Twitter yari yavuze ko yumvise amakuru yatangajwe na bimwe mu bitangazamakuru byo mu Rwanda ko Rayon Sports imaze amezi ane idahemba abakinnyi bayo.
Uyu muyobozi wakunze kumvikana arengera ikipe ye cyane, yabeshyuje aya makuru, avuga ko nta mukinnyi n’umwe ibereyemo ikirarane.
Icyo gihe yagize ati “Wenda ntituzi imbere ariko aho tuva turahazi.”
Rayon Sports ifite igikombe cya shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru ya 2018-2019, yatangiye imikino ya shampiyona ya 2019-2020 iri mu zihatanira igikombe gusa bisa nk’ibiri kugenda bikomera kuko mukeba wayo APR FC iyirusha amanota atandatu ikaba ari na yo iyoboye urutonde rw’agateganyo n’amanota 57 mu gihe Rayon ifite 51.
Mu mukino iheruka gukinana na Gicumbi ya nyuma, Rayon Sports yanganyije n’iriya kipe y’akarere ka Gicumbi 1-1.
Sadate wanagarutse kuri uyu mukino, yavuze ku ifoto yacicikanye ku mbuga nkoranyambuga igaragaza bamwe mu bafana b’ikipe ya Rayon buriye ibiti ngo babashe kureba ikipe yabo kuko hari hamaze gusohoka amabwiriza abuza abantu kujya ku bibuga kureba imipira.
Yashimye ziriya nkoramutima z’ikipe yabo gusa avuga ko itababaniye kuko itatsinze, ndetse ko yabuze ibisobanuro atanga uretse kwisegura gusa.
Mu butumwa yatanze kuri uriya mukino, yasoje agira icyo asaba abakinnyi b’iyi kipe agira ati “Mwibuke ko Rayon Sports ari iy’abafana, ubwitange bwiyongere please [ndabinginze].”
Josiane UWANYIRIGIRA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gasabo-Rusororo: Bavuga ko inzu ziri kubakirwa abatishoboye zisondetse
Body:
*Ni inzu esheshatu zubatswe muri Two in One zigenewe abavanywe mu manegeka,
*Zubakishijwe amatafari ahiye arimo icyondo na ka sima gake inyuma,
* Amatafari amwe yatangiye kunogokamo, 
*Abazibonye bavuga ko zitazaramba, umuyobozi ku karere akibaza uko babimenye kandi batari abafundi…
 
Abaturiye n’abagenda hafi y’aho inzu ziri kubakirwa abavanywe mu manegeka batishobonye  ziri kubakwa mudugudu wa Kinyana, Akagari ka Kinyana mu murenge wa Rusororo bavuga ko nta sima n’umucanga bihagije byashyizwemo, bakavuga ko zizagwira abazazihabwa kuko abazubatse bazisondetse. Uyobora ishami ry’imiturire ijyanye n’umugi muri Gasabo Jonas Muzigura akibaza uko babimenye kandi batari abafundi.
Umwe mu baturage wo muri Kinyana utashatse ko amazina ye tuyatangaza avuga ko ‘bibabaje’ kubaka inzu, ugafata imodoka yuzuye umucanga hanyuma uwo mucanga ukavangwa n’umufuka umwe wa sima.
Avuga ko azi neza ko uriya mucanga ari uwo bayoraga mu muhanda.
Ati: “ Ubu ngubu zatangiye kuvamwo amatafari batarazituramo kandi zimaze umwaka hafi n’igice zuzuye bakazazimurika muri Kamena, 2020.”
Avuga ko gufata umuntu ukamushyira mu nzu idakomeye ari nko gucukura imva ugashyiramo umuntu muzima kuko aho imvura izagwira ishobora kuzatuma inzu zibahirimaho.
Abishingira ku ngingo y’uko amatafati bubakishije atigeze ashyirwa mu ifuru ngo ashye neza bityo ko atakwizerwa.
Uyu muturage avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge wa Rusororo aribwo bwakurikiranaga uko ziriya nzu zubakwa.
Amakuru Umuseke ufite avuga ko kuri uyu wa Kabiri taliki 17, Werurwe, 2020 hari itinda rigizwe n’abakozi bo ku rwego rw’Umurenge,  urw’Akarere ka Gasabo no ku rwego rw’ umujyi wa Kigali bagiye gusura ziriya nzu.
 
Rwiyemezamirimo uzubaka ati: “Hari indi mirimo igikorwa…”
Augustin Bavakure uyobora imirimo yo kubaka ziriya nzu esheshatu zubatswe mu buryo bwa Two in One avuga ko mu by’ukuri ziriya nzu zitasondetswe kuko ngo zitararangira.
Bavakure yemeza ko hakiri indi mirimo iri gukorwa, bityo ko ntawukwiye kwemeza ko zasondetswe.
Yabwiye Umuseke ko amafaranga yo kubaka ziriya nzu yatanzwe n’Akarere ka Gasabo.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko avuga ko ingengo y’imari yagenewe inzu ariyo iherwaho umuntu avuga ko izaba ikomeye cyangwa idakomeye.
Ati: “ Amafaranga yagenewe kubaka inzu niyo agena niba izaba ikomeye cyangwa idakomeye gusa ku byerekeye ayo dukoresha twubaka izi nzu, yo mwayabaza Akarere ka Gasabo.
Ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge wa Rusororo buvuga ko akazi kenshi kakozwe n’umuganda w’abaturage…
Mu magambo make, Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Rusororo Alfred Nduwayezu yabwiye Umuseke ko inzu zicyubakwa, ko hakiri akazi.
Abajijwe ingengo y’imari zagenewe yagize ati: “Dukoresha imiganda itandukanye Tugashaka amafaranga yo guhemba  aba techniciens.”
Iyo witegereje uko izo nzu zibutswe ukazigereranya n’izindi ziri kubakwa na reserve force hafi aho ubona ko harimo itandukanuro haba mu gukoremera no mu kuramba.
Ushinzwe imyubakire yazo yibaza ukuntu abaturage bamenye ko zidakomeye…
Umukozi Akarere ka Gasabo ushinze gukurikirana imyubakire ya ziriya nzu by’umwihariko ndetse n’imyubakire ibereye umujyi  witwa Jonas Muzigura yabajije umunyamakuru w’Umuseke uko abaturage bamenye ko zidakomeye kandi atari bo bazubaka.
Nyuma yo kubwirwa ko abaturage babonye uburyo zubatswe babwiye Umuseke ko zidakomeye, Jonas Muzigura yabajije ati : “ Abo bavuga ko zidakomeye  nibo bazubaka…?
Asabwe kugira icyo avuga ku byo abo baturage bavuga, yasubije ko tugomba kujya kubibaza Akarere ka Gasabo kuko nta burenganzira kamuhaye bwo kukavugira.
Umukozi w’Akarere ka Gasabo ushinzwe itumanaho no kuvugira Akarere ka Gasabo Josephine Mitali Umuseke wamuhamagaye ngo agire icyo avuga kuri ibi ariko ntiyafata telefoni ye igendanwa.
Ubutumwa twamwandikiye kuri WhatsApp nabwo ntiyabusubije.
Pauline Umwali uyobora Akarere ka Gasabo nawe twamuhamagaye tunamuha ubutumwa kuri WhatsApp bumubaza icyo avuga ku kibazo cy’inzu ziri kubakwa mu kagari ka Kinyana, Umurenge wa Rusororo bivugwa ko zitubakishijwe ibintu bizaramba ariko ntiyatwitabye cyangwa ngo adusubize mu nyandiko.
 
Inzu ziri kubakwa huti huti kugira ngo bazahuze n’igihe bijeje Minaloc…
Mu nama yabaye taliki 23, Gashyantare, 2020 yahuje Minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu n’Akarere ka Bugesera( yabereye muri imwe muri Hotel ziri mu karere ka Kicukiro) yarangiye hafashwe imyanzuro irimo uw’uko bitarenze Kamena, 2020 abaturage bose batuye ahabateza akaga bazaba bubakiwe.
Iri sezerano inzego z’ibanze zagiranye na Minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu ryazishyizeho igitutu…
 Bamwe mu baturage bo mu tundi turere tw’Intara y’Amajyepfo n’Uburengerazuba nabo bavuga ko inzu zagenwe abari basanzwe batuye mu manegeka zibatswe huti huti ndetse ngo hari n’aho abaturage barangije kuzitaha.
Rumwe mu ngero nyinshi ni izubatswe mu kagari ka Nyabimata, Umurenge wa Nyabimata muri Nyaruguru, mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo.
Izi nzu zibakishijwe icyondo n’ibiti inyuma bateraho sima ariko ngo si zose.
Umuturage w’aho avuga ko byibura hariya bashyizeho sima ariko ngo hari ahandi mu karere hari inzu abaturage barangije gutaha zihomye n’ibyondo, zitararangira kubakwa neza.
Avuga ko ikibabaje kurushaho ari uko iyo abaturage barangije kuzitaha, birangirira aho ubuyobozi ntibukurikirane ngo burebe niba inzu yubatswe ikuzura neza.
Ati: “ Kutuzura neza kw’inzu baba bahaye abaturage bituma zitaramba. Zinyagirwa igihe gito zikaba zirasenyutse.”
Nyamasheke:
Urundi rugero ni urwo mu mirenge imwe n’imwe y’Akarere ka  Nyamasheke mu Ntara y’i Burengerazuba.
Umwe mu rubyiruko rw’abakorerabushake mu gukumira ibyaha mu murenge wa Karambi mu Karere ka Nyamasheke ariko akaba akorera mu karere kose nawe avuga ko kubaka huti huti  ziriya nzu ari byo biri gukorwa kandi bishobora kuzateza akaga abazazijyamo
Mugenzi we wo mu murenge wa Mahembe avuga ko bagize amahirwe bakubakisha amatafari ya rukarakara kuko ubutaka bwaho ari bwiza .
Ati: “ Twararebye dusanga kubakisha ibiti ari ibintu bitaramba kuko inzu yubakishije ibiti hari ubwo ihengama duhitamo kubakisha amatafari. Iwacu rwose biragenda neza.”
Avuga ariko ko bakomwe mu nkokora n’ingamba zo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus bituma batitabira akazi neza.
Uyu musore nawe uri mu rubyiruko rw’abakorera bushake mu gukumira ibyaha avuga ko atakwizera niba inzu nka ziriya ziri kubakwa mu mirenge ya Bushenge, Shangi, Nyabitekeri n’ahandi zizaba zikomeye kuko ngo kubumba amatafari bigoye bitewe n’imiterere y’ubutaka.
N’ubwo Umuseke wafashe ingero muri utu turere ‘birashoboka’ ko ikibazo cyo kubaka inzu zidakomeye zo gutuzamo ababaga mu manegeka kiri n’ahandi.
Kubaka huti huti, gukoresha amafaranga make mu kubaka…biri mu bituma inzu zubatswe zitaramba bikaba byashyira mu kaga ubuzima bw’abaturage bazihawe.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abanyarwanda tuzabarinda Coronavirus nk’uko twarwanyije SIDA na Ebola- Ambasaderi wa USA
Body:
Ambasaderi wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za America mu Rwanda, Peter Vrooman yavuze ko gihugu cye kizeza u Rwanda gukomeza guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) cyugarije Isi.
Amb. Peter Vrooman avuga ko ku ubu bufatanye buzatanga umusaruro mu kurinda Abanyarwanda n’Abanyamerika iki cyorezo cya COVID-19 nk’uko iki gihugu cyagize uruhare runini mu kurwanya Virus itera SIDA n’icyorezo cya Ebola kigeze kumara igihe gihangayikishije Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ihana imbibi n’u Rwanda.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe za America zibinyujije mu kigo cyayo kita ku Iterambere Mpuzamahanga USAID gisanzwe gifasha u Rwanda mu mishinga inyuranye irimo iy’ubuzima, uburezi ndetse n’Ubuhinzi. Iki kigo kandi cyatanze umusanzu mu gufasha u Rwanda kurinda ko icyorezo cya Ebola kigera mu Rwanda.
Peter Vrooman yatangaje ibi mu gihe hashize amasaha macye Guverinoma y’u Rwanda itangaje ko kuva ejo tariki ya 20 Werurwe ingendo z’indege ziva cyangwa zerekeza mu Rwanda zizahagarara mu gihe k’iminsi 30.
Birashoboka ko hari Abanyamerika baba mu Rwanda bifuzaga gutaha cyangwa abari mu gihugu cyabo bifuzaga kugenderera u Rwanda.
Ambasaderi Peter Vrooman yabwiye Abanyamerika baba mu Rwanda ko bazakomeza kubamenyesha amakuru arebana n’iki cyemezo cyaraye gifashwe na Leta y’u Rwanda mu rwego rwo gukomeza kwirinda izamuka ry’imibare y’abarwayi ba Coronavirus.
Avuga ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za America zishyira imbere umutekano n’ituze by’abaturage bayo bityo ko iki cyemezo kije kirengera n’abanyamerika baba mu Rwanda.
Ati “Leta Zunze Ubumwe za America ziteguye gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo zihe ubufasha abaturage ba US aho bari hose mu bihugu byamaze guhagarika ingendo zo mu kirere.”
Hari za ambasade zitandukanye zamaze gufunga ibikorwa byazo mu Rwanda zirimo iya Israel n’iy’Ububiligi na bwo bwugarijwe n’iki cyorezo kimaze gufatayo abagera ku 1 400 mu gihe kimaze guhitana 14 muri kiriya gihugu.
Minisiteri n’ibigo byiganjemo ibya Leta byo byamaze guhagarika ibikorwa byabyo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’iki cyorezo cyakangaye Isi.
Mu ijoro ryakeye, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda yaraye itangaje ko ejo hashize hagaragaye abarwayi ba Coronavirus batatu baje biyongera ku bandi umunani bari bahari bivuze ko ubu bamaze kuba 11.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Muhanga: Umukwe, umugeni na gafotozi ni bo bemerewe kugera aho basezeranira
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga Kayitare Jacqueline avuga ko  Serivisi yo gusezeranya abashaka  kurushinga, izahabwa umukwe n’umugeni  ndetse n’ubafotora. Iki kemezo ngo kiri mu rwego rwo kurinda ko abantu bakwanduzanya COVID-19.
Kuva Minisiteri y’Ubuzima  isohoye itangazo ryo gufunga ahantu hose hahurira abantu benshi, bamwe mu bari  bafite ubukwe muri Werurwe bakaba bari baratumiye abantu benshi ubu bibaza uko bizagenda.
Hari abafashe umwanzuro wo kubusubika.
Abageni 54 mu Mirenge ya Nyamabuye, Muhanga, Shyogwe na Cyeza mu Karere ka Muhanga, nibo bari bafite ibirori by’ubukwe muri Werurwe 2020.
Bavuga ko batewe impungenge no kuba bataramenyeshwa ko ibirori  byabo bisubitswe cyangwa    ko buzabasezeranya.
Abarangije kumva ko ziriya ngamba zafashwe harimo uwitwa Ndayisenga Pierre akaba ari umwe mu babyeyi bafite abana biteguraga kurushinga muri Werurwe, 2020.
Avuga ko   ingamba zashyizweho zo gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus ari nziza kuko zigamije kurinda Abanyarwanda.
Yemeza ko yarangije gutegura ingengo y’imari nke azakoresha yakira abantu bake bazataba ubukwe bw’umwana.
Yagize ati: “ Jye ndateganya kwakira abantu bake cyane mu bukwe kandi bizakorwa hubahirijwe amabwiriza Minisiteri y’ubuzima.”
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyamabuye, Gakwerere Eraste, yabwiye Umuseke ko hari serivisi zindi batanga, akavuga ko bemerewe kujya  basezeranya umugeni n’ umukwe   n’abaje n’ababahagarariye  baje kubasinyira bonyine.
Yagize ati: “Hari Serivisi  duha abaturage zitahagaze kandi  abaza ku murenge babanza gukaraba intoki bagera mu Murenge bakicara bahanye intera.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga Kayitare Jacqueline, avuga ko  abafite ubukwe bagomba gutegereza ibyumweru bibiri Minisanté yatanze kugira ngo hasuzumwe  niba abaturage bataranduye  indwara ya  Coronavirus.
Ati: “Umugeni n’umukwe babyemeye twabaseranya, bagaherekezwa nubafotora gusa.”
Kayitare yavuze ko abagomba kubabera abahamya bakababasinyira bo bagomba kuza mbere y’uko gusezeranya nyiri izina bikorwa hanyuma bagasubira mu ngo zabo.  bakaza mbere y’ibirori gato hanyuma bagasubira mu rugo.
Yagiriye inama abakozi benshi bakorera mu cyumba kimwe, ko bagomba gusimburana bamwe bagakorera mu rugo bifashishije ikoranabuhanga kugira ngo birinde  kwegerana no  gukoranaho.
MUHIZI ELISÉE
UMUSEKE.RW/Muhanga.

Title: Imana iri hose, dusengere mu rugo twime amahirwe coronavirus – Museveni
Body:
*Coronavirus yahitanye Umunyafurika wa mbere munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara
Mu ijambo yagejeje ku batuye Uganda, Perezida Yoweri Museveni yavuze ko igihugu kigiye guhagarika gusengera mu makoraniro ahuza abantu benshi, abasenga bakabikorera mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko Coronavirus igera muri iki gihugu.
Museveni yagarutse ku ngamba zitandukanye zirimo no gufunga amashuri.
Ati “Amasengesho arakomeza ariko abere mu ngo, Imana iba ahantu hose. Ni byo twasengeraga hamwe kandi tuzi ibyiza byabyo, ariko ntitwakomeza kubitsimbararaho twugarijwe n’amakuba.”
Yasabye abafite insengero gukoresha Radio na Televiziyo mu gukomeza umurimo wo kubwiriza ijambo ry’Imana.
Yagize ati “Papa Francis yaretse umuhimbazo yigishagamo kuri Kiliziya St. Pierre akomeza kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana akoresheje televiziyo. Yatanze urugero rwiza.”
Perezida Yoweri Museveni yatangaje ko kuva ku wa Gatanu w’iki cyumweru, amashuri azafungwa kuva ku y’incuke, amashuri abanza no kugera kuri Kaminuza.
Igikorwa cyo kuyafunga kizaba ku manywa ku wa gatanu, azafungwa by’agateganyo mu gihe cy’ukwezi.
Ati “Tuzabikora mu rwego rwo kwima amahirwe coronavirus.”
Perezida Museveni yavuze ko Abanya-Uganda bavuye hanze batazigera bafungwa ariko ngo bazashyirwa mu kato mu rwego rwo kurengera ubuzima bwabo.
Ati “Abanyamahanga bajya ahandi nta we uzabahagarika, bapfa kuba batazagaruka mu gihe k’iminsi 32.”
 
Abantu 10 barahagije ubukwe bukaba…
Ku bukwe bwo muri Uganda, bubamo abasangwa n’abavumbyi, Museveni yasabye ko byahinduka mu minsi 32 yashyizweho.
Ati “Niba abageni bashaka cyane gushyingirwa, bashobora gukora ubukwe bwa gihanga “scientific wedding” burimo ab’ingenzi muri bwo gusa, umukwe, umugeni we, umubyeyi uhagarariye umugeni (Marraine), n’ubasezeranya, nibura ntibarenge abantu 10.”
 
Umuntu wa mbere muri Africa yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara yazize Covid-19
Coronavirus ikomeje kuba icyorezo gihangayikishije Isi, umuntu wa mbere wo muri Africa yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara yapfuye azize iki cyorezo.
Ni umugore wo muri Burkina Faso wari Visi Perezida wa kabiri w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’iki gihugu witwa Mme. Marie Rose Compaoré w’imyaka 62.
Urupfu rwe rwatangajwe na Martial Ouedraogo, Umuhuzabikorwa wo kurwanya Covid-19 muri kiriya gihugu.
Zambia yabaye igihugu cya 31 muri Africa cyatangaje ko hari abarwayi ba coronavirus. Perezida Edgar Lungu yavuze ko ari umugabo n’umugore bamaze iminsi mu biruhuko mu gihugu cy’Ubufaransa, bari bajyanyeyo n’abana babo.
Coronavirus imaze kwandura abasaga ibihumbi 200 ku Isi, yahitanye abarenga 7500 ariko hari na benshi bavuwe barakira muri bariya yafashe.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Kamonyi: Imvura yasenye inzu zigwira abantu, yangiza imihanda n’imyaka
Body:
Mu mirenge itandukanye y’Akarere ka Kamonyi haraye haguye imvura nyinshi isenya inzu zigwira abaturage mu murenge wa Ngamba ahitwa Kabuga, yangiza imihanda n’imyaka ihinze kuri hegitari zirenga enye n’igice.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa wa Ngamba witwa Obed Niyobuhungiro avuga ko imvura yaraye iguye yabangirije cyane.
Avuga ko yasenye inzu ebyiri, ziragwa, isenya uruzitiro n’inkuta z’inzu.
Ati: “ Ikindi ni uko ni umugezi wa Nyamagana wimutse uta inzira yawo ucamo kabiri umuhanda.”
Avuga kandi ko imyaka y’abaturage yuzuye, hakaba hangiritse zirenga 4.5
Niyobuhungiro  avuga ko umuhanda wangijwe n’amazi ya Nyamagana wari usanzwe uri ho ikiraro.
Avuga ko amazi yaciye indi nzira ajya mu mirima y’abaturage.
Kubera ko uriya muhanda usanzwe ukomeza ujya mu murenge wa Runda, abaturage ntibari kuwukoresha kuko wangiritse.
Kugeza ubu umugore umwe niwe urukuta rwagwiriye  ruramuhusha rufata ukuboko ariko yajyanywe kwa muganga ku kigo nderabuzima cya Kabuga mu murenge wa Ngamba.
Iriya mvura kandi yangije ibindi bintu mu mirenge ya Runda na Rukoma.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gukunda Igihugu ntibirangirira mu kubivuga gusa
Body:
Iyi nyandiko ni ibitekerezo bwite bya CYUZUZO Aimé Christian; Umunyeshuri muri ULK
Urubuga Wikipedia rugaragaza amatariki y’igihe Ibihugu byo ku isi byizihizaho iminsi ngarukamwaka y’Ubwigenge cyangwa indi bifitanye isano. Mu nshuro zigera kuri 194 iyo minsi yizihizwa buri mwaka muri ibyo bihugu, Nyakanga na Kanama ari amezi yizihizwamo cyane iyo minsi. Nyakanga ubwayo buri mwaka hizihizwamo iminsi n’iyi inshuro 29 mu gihe Kanama yizihizwamo inshuro 27.
Iyi mibare igaragaza ko ukwezi kwa Nyakanga n’ukwa Kanama ari  amezi yo Gukunda igihugu.
Mu kwezi kwa Nyakanga u Rwanda rwizihizamo iminsi ibiri ifatwa nk’ikomeye nk’umunsi w’Ubwigenge wizihizwa ku wa 01 Nyakanga n’umunsi wo Kwibohora wizihizwa ku wa 04 Nyakanga.
Ni iminsi ifite kandi byinshi ihishura ku hashize h’Igihugu cyacu, ikaba yanagira uruhare mu kugena ahazaza hacyo.
Kugira ngo Ubwigenge cyangwa Kwibohora byizihizwe n’igihugu cyabigezeho bisaba kubanza kubigeraho mbere na mbere. Mu kubigeraho ntabwo ari ibintu bihanuka mu kirere ahubwo biraharanirwa naho ababigizemo uruhare bakaba bagororerwa mu buryo butandukanye.
Kubona ubwigenge bw’igihugu cyangwa kubohorwa kwacyo ni ibikorwa bifatwa nk’ibihambaye mu gihugu, Itariki byabereyeho irazirikanwa buri mwaka, igahabwa agaciro na buri wese mu gihugu –uhereye ku mukuru w’Igihugu ukagera kuri Rubanda rwo hasi.
Mu gihe hagize ukora urutonde rw’abantu bakunda Igihugu cyangwa abo ubuzima bwabo bwaranzwe no gukora ibikorwa bigaragaza urwo bakunze Ibihugu byabo; yaba umuntu ku giti cye, ibinyamakuru, n’abandi;  abiganza kuri urwo rutonde niba atari na bose ni ba bandi usanga baragiye baharanira ubwigenge cyangwa ukubohorwa kw’ibihugu byabo; bamwe muri bo  bagashyirwa mu Ntwari z’Igihugu ku bw’ibyo bikorwa byamaze gufatwa nk’ibiza imbere mu kugaragaza umuntu ukunda Igihugu bya nyabyo.
Abanditse indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu, Rwanda nziza, bunze mu rya babandi; mu gika cyayo cya gatatu bahisemo kuzirikana Abakurambere b’Igihugu cyacu bahanze igihugu ndetse n’abatsinze abakoloni bikageza Igihugu cyacu ku bwigenge.
Igika cya gatatu kigira giti“Abakurambere b’intwari Bitanze batizigama;Baraguhanga uvamo ubukombe; Utsinda ubukoroni na mpatsibihugu; Byayogoje Afurika yose; None uraganje mu bwigenge; Tubukomeyeho uko turi twese.”
Iki ni ikimenyetso kingaragariza agaciro gahabwa abakoze bene ibi bikorwa.
Mu binyejana byinshi byatambutse, igihe Abageriki, Abaromani, Abongereza basaga nk’aho bigaruriye isi, wasangaga kwitanga ku rugamba bisa nk’aho cyari cyo gipimo cyo kureba ukunda Igihugu cye.
Nyuma, igihe cy’ubukoloni cyarageze kinamara igihe kirekire mu bice hafi ya byose by’isi, ndetse busiga n’ingaruka kugeza na n’uyu munsi ibisigisigi byabwo hari benshi bagihanganye nabyo.
Gusa Abanyamerika, Abanyafurika n’abandi barahagurutse bagatangiza inkundura yo guharanira Ubwigenge bw’ibihugu byabo. Benshi muri bo bahasize ubuzima, gusa ibikorwa byabo byatumye bafatwa nk’intwari mu bihugu byabo; maze icyo gihe kurwanya ubukoloni, guharanira ubwigenge bw’ibihugu byabo biba nk’ibipimo fatizo ku kureba uko umuntu akunda Igihugu cye.
Iki gihe, aho ubukoloni byitwa ko bwarangiye, gukunda Igihugu ntabwo bikireberwa ku warwanye intambara nyinshi cyangwa se k’uri kurwanya Abakoloni.
Mu gitabo “The Trouble With Nigeria”, cyanditswe na Chinua ACHEBE mu 1986, yagaragaje ibiranga umuntu ukunda Igihugu cye by’ukuri muri iki kiragano. Ku rupapuro rwa 15 yanditse ati: “Ni inde ukunda Igihugu? Ni umuntu ufitiye urukundo igihugu cye. Ntabwo ari umuntu uvuga ko akunda igihugu cye. Ntabwo ari umuntu kandi usakuza, urahira, usubiramo kenshi cyangwa akaririmba urukundo akunda Igihugu cye. Ahubwo umuntu ukunda Igihugu cye,  ni urazwa ishinga n’uko Igihugu cye n’abagituye bose barangwa n’ibyishimo n’imibereho myiza. Gukunda Igihugu ni amarangamutima ayobowe n’ubushishozi. Ukunda Igihugu cye by’ukuri ni uhora iteka asaba ko Igihugu cyagera ku rwego ruhanitse ndetse ntagire icyo yifuza ku Gihugu cye n’abagituye ku giti cye uretse inyungu z’Igihugu muri rusange n’iz’abaturage mu buryo bwihariye.”
Twavutse dusanga ibihugu twavukiyemo biriho; abatubanjirije kimwe n’abazakurikira twaba cyangwa baba ibihangange, tuzagera igihe tugende ariko igihugu kizagumaho. Ibi nta bushobozi dufite bwo kugira icyo tubihinduraho. Ni uko twabisanze kandi ni ko tuzabisiga! Gusa ubushobozi dufite ni ubwo gukunda igihugu cyacu bikagaragarira mu bikorwa aho kuba mu magambo. Guharanira no guha agaciro Igihugu bikaza imbere ya buri  kimwe cyose na buri umwe wese.
Mu gihe ibi nabigeraho, nawe ukabigeraho; igihe cyo kugenda kwacu cyazagera twizeye neza ko dusigiye umurage ufite agaciro gusumbye kure aka zahabu, maze abato bagahora iteka baharanira gutera ikirenge mu cyacu.
Kuvumirwa ku gahera cyangwa gushimirwa byose biri mu maboko yacu!
CYUZUZO Aimé Christian;
Umunyeshuri muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali (ULK), mu ishami ry’Ububanyi n’Amahanga (International Relations).

Title: CNLG yabaye ihagaritse ibyo gusura inzibutso mu matsinda, nihaza umwe azakirwa
Body:
Mu rwego rwo kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus, Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG) yabaye ihagaritse ibikorwa byo gusura inzibutso abantu bari mu matsinda ariko ko nihazajya haza umwe umwe azajya yakirwa.
Bikubiye mu itanganzo CNLG yashyize hanze kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020 mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19).
CNLG ivuga ko iki cyemezo kireba abanyamahanga n’abanyarwanda basura inzubutso za Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bazaga mu matsinda y’abantu benshi ko batemerewe gusura muri ibi byumweru bibiri biri imbere.
Iyi komisiyo ivuga ko abazasura ari umwe umwe bazakomeza kwakira nk’ibisanzwe ariko na bwo akubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda kiriya cyorezo bityo ko utazayubahiriza atazakirwa.
Iki cyemezo gifashwe mu gihe habura ibyumeru bitatu ngo Abanyarwanda binjire mu cyumweru cyahariwe Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku nshuro ya 26.
Muri iki cyumweru gisanzwe kibamo ibikorwa binyuranye bigamije kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi birimo ibiganiro bitangwa buri munsi mu midugudu.
Mu gihe iki cyorezo cya Coronavirus cyakomeza kugaragara kugeza muri biriya bihe byo kwibuka bishobora kugira ingaruka ku migendekere y’ibikorwa byo kwibuka kuko kugeza ubu abantu batemerwe kujya ahantu bahurira ari benshi.
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus gisa cyahinduye imibereho y’abatuye Isi, cyatumye bimwe mu bigo na Minisiteri bya Leta bihindura imikorere kuko ubu abakozi bari gukorera mu ngo zabo.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda kandi iburira abaturarwanda kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa no kwitwararika by’umwihariko ku bijyanye n’isuku y’intoki.
Kugeza ubu, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima imaze gutangaza ko mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abarwaye Coronavirus umunani biganjemo Abanyarwanda.
Ejo hashize, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima RBC cyatangaje ko abarwayi ba COVID-19 bari kwitabwaho mu kigo Nderabuzima cya Kanyinya muri Kigali kandi ko bakomeje kumererwa neza ngo ndetse bari gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri ku buryo batanga ikizere ko bazakira bakaba basezererwa bagataha mu gihe kiri imbere.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: VIDEO-Coronavirus: Abamotari ngo ntibifuza ko hari umugenzi wandurira kuri moto
Body:
Abakora umwuga wo gutwara abagenzi kuri moto (Abamotari) mu mujyi wa Kigali baravuga ko bahagurukiye kubahiriza amabwiriza agamije kwirinda ikwirakwiza ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ku buryo batifuza ko hari uwakwandurira kuri moto yabo.
Ejo hashize, umuyobozi Mukuru w’Urwego Ngezaramikorere RURA, Lt Col Nyirishema Patrick yazindukiye kuri RBA gusobanura amabwiriza yashyiriweho abamotari arimo gukura ikirahure kuri Casque ndetse n’areba abagenzi yo kwitwaza agatambaro ko gushyira imbere ya Casque.
Abasanzwe bakora umwuga wo gutwara abantu kuri moto mu mujyi wa Kigali bavuga ko na bo bahangayikishijwe n’iki cyorezo ariko bakaba banahangayikiye abo batwara.
Bana Nshuti Jean Paul avuga ko hakenewe ubukangurambaga ku bagenzi bagashishikarizwa kwitwaza ibikoresho by’ibanze birimo udupfukamunwa ndetse n’igitambaro gitwikira umutwe, aho bishoboka bakagura ingofero (casque) zabo bwite.
Ati “Abagenzi na bo bagomba kugira uruhare mu kwirinda iki cyorezo. Hari nk’umuntu utega moto bimutunguye, buri muntu aguze ingofero (casque) ye bwite byafasha cyane muri uru rugamba rwo kwirinda coronavirus.”
Misago Mariko avuga ko kuba abagenzi basangira casque ari ikibazo, akavuga ko igikenewe ari uko bakoroherezwa uburyo bwo kubona imiti iterwa mu ngofero yikica udukoko dushobora kuba twasigayemo nyuma yo gukoresha n’umugenzi.
Ati “Ariko kandi natwe dukangukire kwita ku isuku ya casque zacu, twibuke kuzihanagura buri munsi.”
Hari n’abandi bamotari bavuga ko umuti nyawo wo kurinda abagenzi kwandurira coronavirus kuri moto, ari uko abagenzi bakurirwaho kwambara Casque.
Uwitwa Esidori ari “Muri iki gihe k’ibyumweru bibiri hakuweho kwambara casque ku bagenzi byafasha mu kurinda ko abagenzi banduzanya. Ubwo natwe (abamotari) twakwitwararika tugakoresha umuvuduko wo hasi.”
Itangazo Minisiteri y’ubuzima mu Rwanda yaraye ishyize hanze, rigaragaza ko ubu mu Rwanda hari abarwayi umunani bafite ubwandu bwa Coronavirus barimo Umurundi waraye agaragaweho iki cyorezo gisa nk’icyahagaritse ubuzima busanzwe bw’abatuye Isi.

Dieudonnee NSHIMIYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gasabo:Umuturage ati: ‘Niba mutantabaye byibura nimuze musane itiyo’
Body:
Umuturage witwa Silas Ndayobotse amaze igihe asaba ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge wa Remera n’umujyi wa Kigali kubatabara bagakubakira ruhurura imanukamo amazi ava muri Kigali Arena, Hotel Sportsview n’ahandi kuko iri hafi kumusenyera. Ubu aratabaza kurushaho kuko amazi yayo yaciye itiyo mo kabiri amazi aba ameneka ari menshi.
Taliki 04, Gashyantare, 2020 Ndayobotse hamwe n’abaturanyi be bo mu mudugudu wa Marembo I, Akagari ka Nyabisindu, Umurenge wa Remera mu karere ka Gasabo babwiye Umuseke ko babangamiwe n’ariya mazi kuko yasenye ruhurura k’uburyo n’inzu zabo ziri hafi kugwa.
Bavuze ko bafite kandi impungenge z’uko abana babo bazagwamo.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Remera Patricie Murakatete icyo gihe yabwiye Umuseke ko abaturage bo muri kariya gace bagombye kwishakamo amafaranga yo kubakira iriya ruhurura uko yaba angana kose hanyuma umurenge cyangwa akarere kakazabongerera.
Yagize ati: “Ikindi nk’uko n’ahandi bagenda bunganira ingengo y’imari,  nabo bareba ubushobozi bwaboneka hagati yabo Leta ikazaza wenda haricyo begeranyije nayo ikabunganira.”
Itiyo yacitse amazi aba make mu baturage…
Silas Ndayobotse yabwiye Umuseke ko ikibazo cyarushijeho gukomera kuko amazi amanuka muri ruhurura yaciye itiyo amazi akaba ari kumeneka.
Ngo byatumye amazi abura mu ngo nyinshi mu gace atuyemo.
Ati: “Niba batantabaye baramire namazi kuko yabuze hose muri quartier.”

Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: A.Kagame yagaragaje uko wasukura ibiganza ashimira Umubyeyi we wabimusabye
Body:
Ange Ingabire Kagame ubuheta bwa Perezida Paul Kagame na we yinjiye mu bukangurambaga ‘Safe Hands’ bw’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima bugamije kwirinda icyorezo COVID-19, ashimira Umubyeyi we wamuhaye uyu mukoro wo guha abandi urugero muri iki gikorwa.
Mu cyumweru gishize ubwo mu Rwanda hari hamaze kugaragara umuntu wa mbere ufite ubwandu bwa Coronavirus, Perezida Paul Kagame yatanze ubutumwa bukomeye asaba Abanyarwanda kudaheranwa n’ubwoba ahubwo bagahagurukira kwirinda iki cyorezo n’ikwirakwizwa ryacyo.
Perezida Kagame kandi ari mu ba mbere binjiye mu bukangurambaga bwiswe ‘Safe hands’ bwo kugaragaza uburyo abantu basukura ibiganza mu rwergo rwo kwirinda kwandura no kwanduzanya iki cyorezo.
Muri butumwa yanyijije kuri Twitter buherekejwe n’amashusho ari gukaraba ibiganza n’amazi meza ndetse n’isabune, hari abo yasabye na bo kwinjira muri ubu bukangurambaga barimo Perezida Uhuru Kenyatta wa Kenya, Cyril Ramaphosa wa Africa y’Epfo ndetse n’umukobwa we Ange Ingabire Kagame.
Ange Ingabire Kagame na we wagaragaje uburyo abantu bakwiye gusukura ibiganza, yavuze ko yakiriye uyu mukoro yahawe na se ndetse ko amushimira.
Mu butumwa na we yanyijije kuri Twitter, Ange Ingabire Kagame yavuze ko gusukura neza ibiganza biri mu buryo bwizewe bwo kwirinda kwandura icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Muri ubu butumwa buherekejwe n’amashuri agaragza Ange Kagame arimo gusukura ibiganza n’amazi meza ndetse n’isabune, agenda akuba ibiganza avuga ko nta gice umuntu akwiye kubagirwa mu bigize ibiganza.
Avuga ko iki gikorwa cyo gusukura intoki kigomba kumara nibura igihe kiri hagati y’amasegonda 40 na 60.
Ange Kagame kandi yasabye abandi bantu na bo kwinjira muri ubu bukangurambaga barimo Clare Akamanzi uyobora RDB, Dr Anges Binagwaho wabaye Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Miss Sonia Rolland, uwahoze ari umukinnyi wa Tennis Maria Sharapova ndetse n’umuririmbyi Gael Faye.
Dr Binagwaho wahise anamusubiza yavuze ko na we yakiriye uyu mukoro ndetse ko mu gihe cya vuba aza kuyoboka ubu bukangurambaga.
Mu bandi Perezida Kagame yasabye kwinjira muri ubu bukangurambaga barimo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa OIF, Louise Mushikiwabo na we ejo watambukije ubutumwa bwe bushishikariza abantu gukaraba intoki.
I am participating in the @WHO & @DrTedros #SafeHands challenge. 
Thank you dad @PaulKagame. Challenge accepted!❤️

— Ange.I. Kagame (@AngeKagame) March 17, 2020

Title: Coronavirus: Yateje ingaruka ku biciro, MINICOM iratanga gasopo
Body:
*Undi mugabo w’Umurundi yatahuweho coronavirus muri rusange abarwayi bayo baba 8
(VIDEO) Kuva indwara ya coronavirus imaze iminsi igaragaye mu Rwanda yateje ikibazo ku masoko hamwe na hamwe mu gihugu ibintu byarahenze, bamwe mu baguzi bataha amaramasa. Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yasohoye itangazo ririmo ibiciro by’ibiribwa, ubirengaho akabyuriza uko ashaka yaburiwe.
Umuseke waganiriye na Mukeshimana Claire umwe mu bahahira ku isoko rya Ziniya mu Karere ka Kicukiro bavuga ko ibiciro byazamutse ku masoko kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ati “Indwara ya coronavirus ikimara kugaragara mu gihugu, ibiciro bahise babizamura. Uretse abacuruza imboga ni bo batarazamura ariko abacuruza imiceri, ifu y’ubugari, kawunda ibiciro babizamuye.”
Mukeshimana  avuga ko ibiciro biri hejuru kuko niba ubugari bwari ku Frw 350, ubu bari kubugurisha Frw 500 na Frw 600, ibyo avuga ko bitoroshye.
Ati “Turasaba Leta kutuvuganira abacuruzi bareke kuzamura ibiciro kugira ngo tubone icyo kurya.”
Umuseke waganiriye  n’abacuruzi bavuga ko na bo aho barangurira ibiribwa ibiciro byazamutse.
Kiroso ni umwe mu bacuruzi agira ati “Umuceri wa Tanzania dusanzwe turangura Frw 27 000 ubu twasanze bari kuwugurisha Frw 28 000, ubu natwe turimo kuwugurisha Frw 30 000.”
 Uyu mucuruzi avuga ko nta kindi kibazo gihari cyateye izamuka ry’ibiciro uretse Coronavirus.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (MINICOM), yasohoye itangazo ku wa mbere tariki 16 Werurwe 2020, riburira abacuruzi batangiye kuzamura ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa, cyane cyane ibyo kurya, bitwaje icyorezo cya Coronavirus ko abazabifatirwamo bazahanwa hakurikijwe itegeko.
Minisiteri ivuga ibi ishingiye ku itegeko nomero 36/2012 ryo ku wa 21 Nzeri 2012 rigenga ihiganwa mu bucuruzi no kurengera abaguzi.
Yaboneyeho kugaragaza ibiciro bya bimwe mu biribwa, ababicuruza batagomba kurenza haba mu masoko no mu mabutike.

 
Ibyo bicuruzwa ni ibi bikurikira:
Umuceri wa Tanzaniya (25Kg), igiciro cyo kurangura ntikigomba kurenga Frw 25 500, naho ku badandaza igiciro ntikirenge Frw 1 200 ku kilo. Umuceri w’umunyarwanda (Kigori 25Kg), ntawemerewe kurenza Frw 18,500 ku barangura na Frw 800 ku kilo ku badandaza.
Umuceri w’umunyarwanda (muremure 25Kg), ni Frw 19,700 kurangura na Frw 850 ku kilo ku badandaza, naho umuceri wa Pakistan (25Kg) urangurwa ku Frw 21,000 ukadandazwa ku giciro kitarenze Frw 900 ku kilo, mu gihe uwa Tayilande utagomba kurenza Frw 26.500 kurangura na Frw 1,200 ku kilo ku badandaza.
Ibishyimbo by’umutuku ku barangura ntibigomba kurenza Frw 600 ku kilo, naho kudandaza ntibirenze Frw 650 ku kilo, mu gihe ibya Colta kurangura ni Frw 850 ku kilo na Frw 1,000 ku kilo ku badandaza.
Kawunga (MINIMEX na Iraboneye 25Kg), ntizigomba kurenza Frw 17,000 kurangura na Frw 800 ku kilo ku badandaza, naho izindi kawunga zikarangurwa ku Frw 15,000 zikadandazwa kuri Frw 620 ku kilo.
Ibirayi bya Kinigi ku barangura ntibigomba kurenza Frw 380 ku kilo, naho abadandaza ntibagomba kurenza Frw 420 ku kilo, mu gihe ibirayi by’umweru birangurwa Frw 280 bigacuruzwa kuri Frw 300 ku kilo.
Amavuta yo kurya (5L) arangurwa ku atarenga Frw 9,000 akadandazwa ku Frw 2,200 kuri litiro, naho igitoki kikarangurwa atarenze Frw 280 ku kilo kigacuruzwa kuri Frw 300 ku kilo.
Ifu y’imyumbati ku badandaza, ikilo kimwe kigomba kugura hagati ya Frw 400 na 800, naho ifu ya Kinazi (40Kg) kurangura ntigomba kurenza Frw 23,000, ikagurishwa atarenga Frw 900 ku kilo ku badandaza.
Isukari iva hanze (50Kg) ntigomba kurenza Frw 39,500 ku barangura na Frw 900 ku badandaza, mu gihe iya Kabuye (50Kg) itagomba kurenza Frw 42,000 ku barangura na Frw 1,000 ku kilo ku badandaza.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda  irasaba abaguzi gutanga amakuru mu gihe babona izamuka rikabije ry’ibiciro aho ari ho hose kugira ngo hafatwe ingamba byihuse, bahamagara ku murongo utishyurwa 3739, bakaba banawuherwaho n’andi makuru bifuza.
 
Amakuru mashya kuri Coronavirus mu Rwanda
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itanga amakuru mashya ku bwandu bushya bw’iyi virus, mu itangazo yasohoye mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 16, yavuze ko umugabo w’Umurundi wanyuze mu Rwanda avuye i Dubai yapimwemo coronavirus.
Muri rusange abarwaye coronavirus ku butaka bw’u Rwanda babaye 8.

Daddy SADIKI RUBANGURA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rubavu: Gitifu w’Akagari n’abaturage bateye amabuye Gitifu w’Umurenge
Body:
Mu Murenge wa Rugerero, Akagari ka Rwaza abaturage bateye Gitifu w’Umurenge amabuye bafatanyije na Gitifu w’Akagari, hari mu gikorwa cyo kubuza kubaka mu kajagari.
Umuyobozi w’Umurenge avuga ko byose byatewe n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Rubona mu Murenge wa Nyamyumba wahagarikiye abaturage bakamutera amabuye.
Igikorwa cyo kubuza kubaka mu kajagari cyarimo Gitifu w’Umurenge hamwe na ba DASSO n’abakozi b’umurenge.
Ahagana saa kenda n’igice mu Kagari ka Rwaza mu Mudugudu wa Mushoko, nibwo Umunyamabanga Nhingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Rugerero, Nkurunziza Faustin yari mu gikorwa cyo gukuraho inzu yubakwa mu kajagari.
Abayobozi batunguwe no guterwa amabuye n’abaturage bahagarariwe n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabilorwa w’Akagarai ka Rubabona, Nshimiyimana Thacien batabarwa n’umuyobozi wa Polisi ku rwego rw’Akarere.
Umuturage wabonye ibi yabwiye Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke ko habaye akavuyo biturutse ku nzu yubakwaga kuko ba DASSO batangiye kuyisenya, ba nyirayo babibonye habaho guterana amagambo, mu kanya gato batangira  gufatana mu mashati.
Ati “Sinamenye ngo ni nde watangiye kuko bari benshi, Polisi yahise iza ihagarika imirwano.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Rugerero, Nkurunziza Faustin yadutangarije ko bahawe amakuru ko hari abari kubaka mu kajagari nta byangombwa bafite, asaba Gitifu w’Akagari kubihagarika ntiyabikora.
Ati “Nyuma y’uko Gitifu w’Akagari ka Rwaza atabikoze twe twafashe umwanzuro wo kujya gukuraho izo nyubako  ariko twatunguwe no kubona Gitifu w’Akagari ka Rubona mu wundi Murenge wa Nyamyumba, azanye n’abaturage  batangira kudutera amabuye dukizwa n’umuyobozi wa Polisi ku rwego rw’Akarere kuko twari tumaze kumutabaza.”
Yavuze ko uriya Gitifu w’Akagari kari mu Murenge wa Nyamyumba ari we umaze iminsi ahagarariye inyubako basenye kuko bakimara kuhagera (Gitifu w’Umurenge) bahamagaye Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Rwaza  na Mudugudu bose banga kwitaba, ariko nyuma baza kuhagera.
Ati “Bigaragara ko bakoranaga n’uwo Gitifu w’Akagari kari mu wundi Murenge.”
Polisi yahise ifata uriya Gitifu imushyikiriza Ubugenzacyaha (RIB), Gitufu w’Umurenge wa Rugerero twavuganye avuye gutanga ikirego.
Bamwe mu Banyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa b’Imirenge mu Karere ka Rubavu bavuga ko batereranwa mu bikorwa byo gukuraho inzu zubatswe mu kajagari, bavuga ko nta rwego na rumwe rwisumbuyeho rubafasha. Iyo umuturage wasenyewe areze mu Nkiko agatsinda, Gitufu wamusenye ngo yishyura ku giti ke kandi ajya gusenya mu nyungu rusange za Leta.
Patrick MAISHA
UMUSEKE.RW/I Rubavu
